globals
//globals from Playercolors:
constant boolean LIBRARY_Playercolors=true
//endglobals from Playercolors
//globals from SimpleTriggerData:
constant boolean LIBRARY_SimpleTriggerData=true
hashtable SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank= null


constant integer SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY= 10000
//endglobals from SimpleTriggerData
//globals from Table:
constant boolean LIBRARY_Table=true
integer Table__less= 0
integer Table__more= 8190
    //Configure it if you use more than 8190 "key" variables in your map (this will never happen though).
   
hashtable Table__ht= InitHashtable()
constant integer Table__sizeK=9
constant integer Table__listK=11
//endglobals from Table
//globals from TimerUtils:
constant boolean LIBRARY_TimerUtils=true
        //How to tweak timer utils:
        // USE_HASH_TABLE = true  (new blue)
        //  * SAFEST
        //  * SLOWEST (though hash tables are kind of fast)
        //
        // USE_HASH_TABLE = false, USE_FLEXIBLE_OFFSET = true  (orange)
        //  * kinda safe (except there is a limit in the number of timers)
        //  * ALMOST FAST
        //
        // USE_HASH_TABLE = false, USE_FLEXIBLE_OFFSET = false (red)
        //  * THE FASTEST (though is only  faster than the previous method
        //                  after using the optimizer on the map)
        //  * THE LEAST SAFE ( you may have to tweak OFSSET manually for it to
        //                     work)
        //
constant boolean TimerUtils__USE_HASH_TABLE= true
constant boolean TimerUtils__USE_FLEXIBLE_OFFSET= false

constant integer TimerUtils__OFFSET= 0x100000
integer TimerUtils__VOFFSET= TimerUtils__OFFSET
              
        //Timers to preload at map init:
constant integer TimerUtils__QUANTITY= 256
        
        //Changing this  to something big will allow you to keep recycling
        // timers even when there are already AN INCREDIBLE AMOUNT of timers in
        // the stack. But it will make things far slower so that's probably a bad idea...
constant integer TimerUtils__ARRAY_SIZE= 8190

// processed:         integer array TimerUtils__data[TimerUtils__ARRAY_SIZE]
hashtable TimerUtils__ht
// processed:         timer array TimerUtils__tT[TimerUtils__ARRAY_SIZE]
integer TimerUtils__tN= 0
constant integer TimerUtils__HELD=0x28829022
        //use a totally random number here, the more improbable someone uses it, the better.
        
boolean TimerUtils__didinit= false
//endglobals from TimerUtils
//globals from UpgradedHero:
constant boolean LIBRARY_UpgradedHero=true
trigger UpgradedHero__upgradeHero= null
conditionfunc UpgradedHero__heroUpgradeCondition= null
integer array UpgradedHero__upgradedHero
integer UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount= 0
integer UpgradedHero__currentUpgradedHeroIndex= 0
//endglobals from UpgradedHero

constant boolean DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE= true
constant integer DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE= 10
constant integer DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE= 10
constant string DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS= "CombatSoundsEAX"
constant integer DEFAULT_SOUND_VOLUME= 127
constant integer DEFAULT_SOUND_PITCH= 1
constant integer SoundTools__SOUND_CHANNEL= 5
constant integer SoundTools__SOUND_MIN_DIST= 600
constant integer SoundTools__SOUND_MAX_DIST= 10000
constant integer SoundTools__SOUND_DIST_CUT= 3000
//endglobals from SoundTools
//globals from TimedHandles:
constant boolean LIBRARY_TimedHandles=true
        // If you don't want a timer to be ran each instance
        // set this to true.
constant boolean TimedHandles__SINGLE_TIMER= true
        // If you chose a single timer then this will be the speed
        // at which the timer will update
constant real TimedHandles__UPDATE_PERIOD= 0.05
//endglobals from TimedHandles

    if (this!=0) then
        set si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_F=si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_V[this]
    else
        set si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_I=si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_I+1
        set this=si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_I
    endif
    if (this>8190) then
        return 0
    endif

    set si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_V[this]=-1
 return this
endfunction

//Generated destructor of UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero
function s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_deallocate takes integer this returns nothing
    if this==null then
        return
    elseif (si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_V[this]!=-1) then
        return
    endif
    set si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_V[this]=si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_F
    set si__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_F=this
endfunction
function sc___prototype1_execute takes integer i returns nothing

    call TriggerExecute(st___prototype1[i])
endfunction
function sc___prototype1_evaluate takes integer i returns nothing

    call TriggerEvaluate(st___prototype1[i])

endfunction

//library Playercolors:

function Playercolors__onInit takes nothing returns nothing

set udg_ColorStrings[1]="|cffff0303"
set udg_ColorStrings[2]="|cff0042ff"
set udg_ColorStrings[3]="|cff1ce6b9"
set udg_ColorStrings[4]="|cff540081"
set udg_ColorStrings[5]="|cfffffc01"
set udg_ColorStrings[6]="|cfffe8a0e"

set udg_ColorStrings[8]="|cffe55bb0"

set udg_ColorStrings[10]="|cff7ebff1"
set udg_ColorStrings[11]="|cff106246"
set udg_ColorStrings[12]="|cff4e2a04"
set udg_ColorStrings[13]="|cff9B0000"
set udg_ColorStrings[14]="|cff0000C3"
set udg_ColorStrings[15]="|cff00EAFF"
set udg_ColorStrings[16]="|cffBE00FE"
set udg_ColorStrings[17]="|cffEBCD87"
set udg_ColorStrings[18]="|cffF8A48B"
set udg_ColorStrings[19]="|cffBFFF80"
set udg_ColorStrings[20]="|cffDCB9EB"

set udg_ColorStrings[22]="|cffEBF0FF"
set udg_ColorStrings[23]="|cff00781E"
set udg_ColorStrings[24]="|cffA46F33"

set udg_ColorStrings[PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE + 1]="|c00272727"
set udg_ColorStrings[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM + 1]="|c00272727"
set udg_ColorStrings[bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA + 1]="|c00272727"

//library Playercolors ends
//library SimpleTriggerData:


    function NewTriggerEx takes integer data returns trigger
        local trigger newTrigger= CreateTrigger()
        
        call SaveInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId(newTrigger), data)
        
        return newTrigger
    endfunction

    function ReleaseTrigger takes trigger whichTrigger returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId(whichTrigger))
        
        call DestroyTrigger(whichTrigger)
    endfunction

    function GetTriggerData takes trigger whichTrigger returns integer
        return LoadInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId(whichTrigger))
    endfunction

    function SimpleTriggerData__onInit takes nothing returns nothing
        set SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank=InitHashtable()
    endfunction


//library SimpleTriggerData ends
//library Table:
   
   
    function s__Table__dex__get_size takes nothing returns integer
        return Table__sizeK
    endfunction
    function s__Table__dex__get_list takes nothing returns integer
        return Table__listK
    endfunction
   
    function s__Table__handles_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__handles_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
   
    function s__Table__agents__setindex takes integer this,integer key,agent value returns nothing
        call SaveAgentHandle(Table__ht, this, key, value)
    endfunction
   
   
   
//Run these textmacros to include the entire hashtable API as wrappers.
//Don't be intimidated by the number of macros - Vexorian's map optimizer is
//supposed to kill functions which inline (all of these functions inline).
//textmacro instance: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("Real", "Real", "real")
    function s__Table__reals__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns real
        return LoadReal(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__reals__setindex takes integer this,integer key,real value returns nothing
        call SaveReal(Table__ht, this, key, value)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__reals_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedReal(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__reals_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedReal(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
//end of: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("Real", "Real", "real")
//textmacro instance: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("Boolean", "Boolean", "boolean")
    function s__Table__booleans__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return LoadBoolean(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__booleans__setindex takes integer this,integer key,boolean value returns nothing
        call SaveBoolean(Table__ht, this, key, value)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__booleans_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedBoolean(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__booleans_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedBoolean(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
//end of: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("Boolean", "Boolean", "boolean")
//textmacro instance: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("String", "Str", "string")
    function s__Table__strings__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns string
        return LoadStr(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__strings__setindex takes integer this,integer key,string value returns nothing
        call SaveStr(Table__ht, this, key, value)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__strings_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedString(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__strings_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedString(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
//end of: NEW_ARRAY_BASIC("String", "Str", "string")

    function s__Table__trackables_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__trackables_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
//end of: NEW_ARRAY("Trackable", "trackable")
//textmacro instance: NEW_ARRAY("Dialog", "dialog")
    function s__Table__dialogs__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns dialog
        return LoadDialogHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__dialogs__setindex takes integer this,integer key,dialog value returns nothing
        call SaveDialogHandle(Table__ht, this, key, value)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__dialogs_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
    function s__Table__dialogs_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedHandle(Table__ht, this, key)
    endfunction
//end of: NEW_ARRAY("Dialog", "dialog")

        return this
    endfunction
   
    //set this = tb[GetSpellAbilityId()]
    function s__Table__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns integer
        return LoadInteger(Table__ht, this, key) //return this.integer[key]
    endfunction
   
    //set tb[389034] = 8192
    function s__Table__setindex takes integer this,integer key,integer tb returns nothing
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, this, key, tb) //set this.integer[key] = tb
    endfunction
   
    //set b = tb.has(2493223)
    function s__Table_has takes integer this,integer key returns boolean
        return HaveSavedInteger(Table__ht, this, key) //return this.integer.has(key)
    endfunction
   
    //call tb.remove(294080)
    function s__Table_remove takes integer this,integer key returns nothing
        call RemoveSavedInteger(Table__ht, this, key) //call this.integer.remove(key)
    endfunction
   
    //Remove all data from a Table instance
    function s__Table_flush takes integer this returns nothing
        call FlushChildHashtable(Table__ht, this)
    endfunction
   
    //local Table tb = Table.create()
    function s__Table_create takes nothing returns integer
        local integer this= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (0))) // INLINED!!
       
        if this == 0 then
            set this=Table__more + 1
            set Table__more=this
        else
            call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (0), ( (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (this))))) // INLINED!!
            call RemoveSavedInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (this)) //Clear hashed memory // INLINED!!
        endif
       
        return this
    endfunction
   
    // Removes all data from a Table instance and recycles its index.
    //
    //     call tb.destroy()
    //
    function s__Table_destroy takes integer this returns nothing
       
        call FlushChildHashtable(Table__ht, (this)) // INLINED!!
       
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (this), ( (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (0))))) // INLINED!!
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__listK)), (0), ( this)) // INLINED!!
    endfunction
   
//ignored textmacro command: TABLE_BC_METHODS()
   
//ignored textmacro command: TABLE_BC_STRUCTS()
   
   
    //Returns a new TableArray to do your bidding. Simply use:
    //
    //    local TableArray ta = TableArray[array_size]
    //
    function s__TableArray__staticgetindex takes integer array_size returns integer
        local integer tb= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), (array_size))) // INLINED!!
        local integer this= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (0))) // INLINED!!
       
       
        if this == 0 then
            set this=Table__less - array_size
            set Table__less=this
        else
            call SaveInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (0), ( (LoadInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (this))))) //Set the last destroyed to the last-last destroyed // INLINED!!
            call RemoveSavedInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (this)) //Clear hashed memory // INLINED!!
        endif
       
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), (this), ( array_size)) //This remembers the array size // INLINED!!
        return this
    endfunction
   
    //Returns the size of the TableArray
    function s__TableArray__get_size takes integer this returns integer
        return (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), (this))) // INLINED!!
    endfunction
   
    //This magic method enables two-dimensional[array][syntax] for Tables,
    //similar to the two-dimensional utility provided by hashtables them-
    //selves.
    //
    //ta[integer a].unit[integer b] = unit u
    //ta[integer a][integer c] = integer d
    //
    //Inline-friendly when not running in debug mode
    //
    function s__TableArray__getindex takes integer this,integer key returns integer










        return this + key
    endfunction
   
    //Destroys a TableArray without flushing it; I assume you call .flush()
    //if you want it flushed too. This is a public method so that you don't
    //have to loop through all TableArray indices to flush them if you don't
    //need to (ie. if you were flushing all child-keys as you used them).
    //
    function s__TableArray_destroy takes integer this returns nothing
        local integer tb= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), ((LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), ((this))))))) // INLINED!!
       
       
        if tb == 0 then
            //Create a Table to index recycled instances with their array size
            set tb=s__Table_create()
            call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), ((LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), ((this))))), ( tb)) // INLINED!!
        endif
       
        call RemoveSavedInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), (this)) //Clear the array size from hash memory // INLINED!!
       
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (this), ( (LoadInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (0))))) // INLINED!!
        call SaveInteger(Table__ht, (tb), (0), ( this)) // INLINED!!
    endfunction
   
   
    //Avoids hitting the op limit
    function s__TableArray_clean takes nothing returns nothing
        local integer tb= s__TableArray_tempTable
        local integer end= tb + 0x1000
        if end < s__TableArray_tempEnd then
            set s__TableArray_tempTable=end
            call ForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], function s__TableArray_clean)
        else
            set end=s__TableArray_tempEnd
        endif
        loop
            call FlushChildHashtable(Table__ht, (tb)) // INLINED!!
            set tb=tb + 1
            exitwhen tb == end
        endloop
    endfunction
   
    //Flushes the TableArray and also destroys it. Doesn't get any more
    //similar to the FlushParentHashtable native than this.
    //
    function s__TableArray_flush takes integer this returns nothing
        set s__TableArray_tempTable=this
        set s__TableArray_tempEnd=this + (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((Table__sizeK)), ((this)))) // INLINED!!
        call ForForce(bj_FORCE_PLAYER[0], function s__TableArray_clean)
        call s__TableArray_destroy(this)
    endfunction
   
   
//NEW: Added in Table 4.0. A fairly simple struct but allows you to do more
//than that which was previously possible.

    //Enables myHash[parentKey][childKey] syntax.
    //Basically, it creates a Table in the place of the parent key if
    //it didn't already get created earlier.
    function s__HashTable__getindex takes integer this,integer index returns integer
        local integer t= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((this)), (index))) // INLINED!!
        if t == 0 then
            set t=s__Table_create()
            call SaveInteger(Table__ht, ((this)), (index), ( t)) //whoops! Forgot that line. I'm out of practice! // INLINED!!
        endif
        return t
    endfunction

    //You need to call this on each parent key that you used if you
    //intend to destroy the HashTable or simply no longer need that key.
    function s__HashTable_remove takes integer this,integer index returns nothing
        local integer t= (LoadInteger(Table__ht, ((this)), (index))) // INLINED!!
        if t != 0 then
            call s__Table_destroy(t)
            call RemoveSavedInteger(Table__ht, ((this)), (index)) // INLINED!!
        endif
    endfunction
   
    //Added in version 4.1
    function s__HashTable_has takes integer this,integer index returns boolean
        return (HaveSavedInteger(Table__ht, ((this)), (index))) // INLINED!!
    endfunction
   
    //HashTables are just fancy Table indices.
    function s__HashTable_destroy takes integer this returns nothing
        call s__Table_destroy((this))
    endfunction
   
    //Like I said above...
    function s__HashTable_create takes nothing returns integer
        return s__Table_create()
    endfunction



//library Table ends
//library TimerUtils:
//*********************************************************************
//* TimerUtils (red+blue+orange flavors for 1.24b+) 2.0
//* ----------
//*
//*  To implement it , create a custom text trigger called TimerUtils
//* and paste the contents of this script there.
//*
//*  To copy from a map to another, copy the trigger holding this
//* library to your map.
//*
//* (requires vJass)   More scripts: htt://www.wc3c.net
//*
//* For your timer needs:
//*  * Attaching
//*  * Recycling (with double-free protection)
//*
//* set t=NewTimer()      : Get a timer (alternative to CreateTimer)
//* set t=NewTimerEx(x)   : Get a timer (alternative to CreateTimer), call
//*                            Initialize timer data as x, instead of 0.
//*
//* ReleaseTimer(t)       : Relese a timer (alt to DestroyTimer)
//* SetTimerData(t,2)     : Attach value 2 to timer
//* GetTimerData(t)       : Get the timer's value.
//*                         You can assume a timer's value is 0
//*                         after NewTimer.
//*
//* Multi-flavor:
//*    Set USE_HASH_TABLE to true if you don't want to complicate your life.
//*
//* If you like speed and giberish try learning about the other flavors.
//*
//********************************************************************

//================================================================

    //==================================================================================================
    
    

    //It is dependent on jasshelper's recent inlining optimization in order to perform correctly.
    function SetTimerData takes timer t,integer value returns nothing

            // new blue
            call SaveInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId(t), value)
            

















    endfunction

    function GetTimerData takes timer t returns integer

            // new blue
            return LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId(t))
            

















    endfunction

    //==========================================================================================

    //==========================================================================================
    // I needed to decide between duplicating code ignoring the "Once and only once" rule
    // and using the ugly textmacros. I guess textmacros won.
    //

    function NewTimerEx takes integer value returns timer
        if ( TimerUtils__tN == 0 ) then
            if ( not TimerUtils__didinit ) then
                //This extra if shouldn't represent a major performance drawback
                //because QUANTITY rule is not supposed to be broken every day. 
                call TriggerEvaluate(st___prototype1[(1)]) // INLINED!!
                set TimerUtils__tN=TimerUtils__tN - 1
            else
                //If this happens then the QUANTITY rule has already been broken, try to fix the
                // issue, else fail.
                set s__TimerUtils__tT[0]= CreateTimer()















            endif
        else
            set TimerUtils__tN=TimerUtils__tN - 1
        endif
        call SaveInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((s__TimerUtils__tT[TimerUtils__tN] )), ( value)) // INLINED!!
     return s__TimerUtils__tT[TimerUtils__tN]
    endfunction
    
    function NewTimer takes nothing returns timer
        return NewTimerEx(0)
    endfunction


    //==========================================================================================
    function ReleaseTimer takes timer t returns nothing
        if ( t == null ) then
            return
        endif
        if ( TimerUtils__tN == TimerUtils__ARRAY_SIZE ) then
            //stack is full, the map already has much more troubles than the chance of bug
            call DestroyTimer(t)
        else
            call PauseTimer(t)
            if ( (LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((t)))) == TimerUtils__HELD ) then // INLINED!!
                return
            endif
            call SaveInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((t )), ( TimerUtils__HELD)) // INLINED!!
            set s__TimerUtils__tT[TimerUtils__tN]= t
            set TimerUtils__tN=TimerUtils__tN + 1
        endif
    endfunction

    function TimerUtils__init takes nothing returns nothing
     local integer i=0
     local integer o=- 1
     local boolean oops= false
        if ( TimerUtils__didinit ) then
            return
        else
            set TimerUtils__didinit=true
        endif
     

            set TimerUtils__ht=InitHashtable()
            loop
                exitwhen ( i == TimerUtils__QUANTITY )
                set s__TimerUtils__tT[i]= CreateTimer()
                call SaveInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((s__TimerUtils__tT[i] )), ( TimerUtils__HELD)) // INLINED!!
                set i=i + 1
            endloop
            set TimerUtils__tN=TimerUtils__QUANTITY










































    endfunction
    

//library TimerUtils ends
//library UpgradedHero:


  function s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_create takes integer unitID,integer itemID returns integer

   local integer this= s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero__allocate()

			set s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_itemID[this]=itemID
			set s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_unitID[this]=unitID

			return this

  endfunction




 function UpgradedHero__UpgradeHero takes nothing returns nothing
  local integer thisHero= UpgradedHero__upgradedHero[UpgradedHero__currentUpgradedHeroIndex]
  local integer index= 0
  local real angle= AngleBetweenPoints(udg_PlayerHero_Start_Position, udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
  local unit oldHero= GetTriggerUnit()
  local player owner= GetOwningPlayer(oldHero)
  local unit newHero= CreateUnitAtLoc(owner, s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_unitID[thisHero], udg_PlayerHero_Start_Position, angle)
  local item currentItem= null

		loop
			exitwhen index > 5

			set currentItem=UnitItemInSlot(oldHero, index)

			if GetItemTypeId(currentItem) == s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_itemID[thisHero] then
				call RemoveItem(currentItem)
			else
				call UnitAddItem(newHero, currentItem)
			endif

			set index=index + 1
		endloop
		
		call RemoveUnit(oldHero)
		set udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(owner)]=newHero
		call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "Player " + GetPlayerName(owner) + " Has Selected the " + GetUnitName(newHero) + " And Entered The Arena")
		call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(owner, udg_Map_Center_StartPoint, 0)

		call s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_deallocate(thisHero)
		set UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount=UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount - 1
		set UpgradedHero__upgradedHero[UpgradedHero__currentUpgradedHeroIndex]=UpgradedHero__upgradedHero[UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount]


	endfunction

 function UpgradedHero__DoesUnitHaveItem takes nothing returns nothing
  local integer inventoryIndex= 0
  local integer index= 0
  local boolean result= false
  local unit whichUnit= GetTriggerUnit()

		loop
			exitwhen index >= UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount

			set inventoryIndex=0

			loop
				exitwhen inventoryIndex > 5

				if GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlot(whichUnit, inventoryIndex)) == s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_itemID[UpgradedHero__upgradedHero[index]] then
					set result=true
					set UpgradedHero__currentUpgradedHeroIndex=index
				endif

				set inventoryIndex=inventoryIndex + 1
			endloop
			
			set index=index + 1
		endloop

		if result then
			set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(whichUnit))
			call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level)
			call UpgradedHero__UpgradeHero()
		endif

	endfunction

 function UpgradedHero__HeroUpgradeCondition takes nothing returns boolean

		if not ( udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] == GetTriggerUnit() ) then
			return false
		else
			return true
		endif

	endfunction

 function UpgradedHero__onInit takes nothing returns nothing
		set UpgradedHero__upgradeHero=CreateTrigger()
		set UpgradedHero__heroUpgradeCondition=Condition(function UpgradedHero__HeroUpgradeCondition)

		call TriggerAddAction(UpgradedHero__upgradeHero, function UpgradedHero__DoesUnitHaveItem)
		call TriggerAddCondition(UpgradedHero__upgradeHero, UpgradedHero__heroUpgradeCondition)
		call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(UpgradedHero__upgradeHero, gg_rct_Altar_of_Power)
	endfunction

 function UpgradedHero_Register takes integer unitID,integer itemID returns nothing
		set UpgradedHero__upgradedHero[UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount]=s__UpgradedHero__UpgradedHero_create(unitID , itemID)
		set UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount=UpgradedHero__upgradedHeroCount + 1
	endfunction


//library UpgradedHero ends
//library SoundTools:
   
    
   
   
   
    
   
       
       
       
       
        function s__Sound_createEx takes string fileName,integer dur,boolean loopng,boolean isTD,boolean stop,integer fadeInRate,integer fadeOutRate,string eax returns integer
            local integer this= s__Sound_index
            set s__Sound_index=s__Sound_index + 1
           
            set s__Sound_file[this]=fileName
            set s__Sound_duration[this]=dur
            set s__Sound_looping[this]=loopng
            set s__Sound_is3D[this]=isTD
            set s__Sound_stopOnLeaveRange[this]=stop
            set s__Sound_fadeIn[this]=fadeInRate
            set s__Sound_fadeOut[this]=fadeOutRate
            set s__Sound_eaxSetting[this]=eax
            set s__Sound_pitch[this]=1
           
            set s__Sound_stack[this]=s__Table_create()
           
            return this
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_create takes string fileName,integer dur,boolean loopng,boolean isTD returns integer
            return s__Sound_createEx(fileName , dur , loopng , isTD , DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS)
        endfunction
       
        // Credits to Zwiebelchen for this function
        // He discovered a bug with sound pitches and this function was written to fix that.
        function s__Sound_setSoundPitch takes integer this,sound s,real newPitch returns nothing
            if GetSoundIsPlaying(s) or GetSoundIsLoading(s) then
                call SetSoundPitch(s, 1 / s__Sound_pitch[this])
                call SetSoundPitch(s, newPitch)
                set s__Sound_pitch[this]=newPitch
            elseif newPitch == 1 then
                call SetSoundPitch(s, 1.0001)
                set s__Sound_pitch[this]=1.0001
            else
                call SetSoundPitch(s, newPitch)
                set s__Sound_pitch[this]=newPitch
            endif
        endfunction
       
       
        function s__Sound_get takes integer this returns sound
            if s__Sound_count[this] == 0 then
           
                
                set s__Sound_snd=CreateSound(s__Sound_file[this], s__Sound_looping[this], s__Sound_is3D[this], s__Sound_stopOnLeaveRange[this], s__Sound_fadeIn[this], s__Sound_fadeOut[this], s__Sound_eaxSetting[this])
                call SaveInteger(Table__ht, (s__Sound_pt), (GetHandleId(s__Sound_snd)), ( this)) // INLINED!!
               
                
                call SetSoundDuration(s__Sound_snd, s__Sound_duration[this])
                call SetSoundChannel(s__Sound_snd, SoundTools__SOUND_CHANNEL)
                call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, DEFAULT_SOUND_VOLUME)
                call s__Sound_setSoundPitch(this,s__Sound_snd , DEFAULT_SOUND_PITCH)
               
                
                if s__Sound_is3D[this] then
                    call SetSoundDistances(s__Sound_snd, SoundTools__SOUND_MIN_DIST, SoundTools__SOUND_MAX_DIST)
                    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff(s__Sound_snd, SoundTools__SOUND_DIST_CUT)
                    call SetSoundConeAngles(s__Sound_snd, 0, 0, DEFAULT_SOUND_VOLUME)
                    call SetSoundConeOrientation(s__Sound_snd, 0, 0, 0)
                endif
               
                return s__Sound_snd
            endif
           
            
            set s__Sound_count[this]=s__Sound_count[this] - 1
            return (LoadSoundHandle(Table__ht, (((s__Sound_stack[this]))), (s__Sound_count[this]))) // INLINED!!
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_push takes integer this,sound s returns nothing
            call SaveSoundHandle(Table__ht, (((s__Sound_stack[this]))), (s__Sound_count[this]), ( s)) // INLINED!!
            set s__Sound_count[this]=s__Sound_count[this] + 1
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_recycle takes nothing returns nothing
            local timer t= GetExpiredTimer()
            local sound s= (LoadSoundHandle(Table__ht, (((s__Sound_tb))), (GetHandleId(t)))) // INLINED!!
           
            
            call StopSound(s, false, true)
            call s__Sound_push(((LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((t))))),s) // INLINED!!
            call ReleaseTimer(t)
           
            set t=null
            set s=null
        endfunction
       
       
        function s__Sound_runSounds takes nothing returns nothing
            local integer this= s__Sound_next[0]
            local timer t
           
            call ReleaseTimer(GetExpiredTimer())
           
            loop
                exitwhen this == 0
               
                
                call StartSound(s__Sound_media[this])
               
                
                if not s__Sound_looping[this] then
                    set t=NewTimerEx(this)
                    call SaveSoundHandle(Table__ht, (((s__Sound_tb))), (GetHandleId(t)), ( s__Sound_media[this])) // INLINED!!
                    call TimerStart(t, s__Sound_duration[this] * 0.001, false, function s__Sound_recycle)
                endif
               
                set s__Sound_media[this]=null
                set this=s__Sound_next[this]
            endloop
           
            set s__Sound_next[0]=0
           
            set t=null
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_run takes integer this returns sound
           
            if s__Sound_next[0] == 0 then
                call TimerStart((NewTimerEx(0)), 0, false, function s__Sound_runSounds) // INLINED!!
            endif
           
            if s__Sound_media[this] == null then
                set s__Sound_next[this]=s__Sound_next[0]
                set s__Sound_next[0]=this
                set s__Sound_media[this]=s__Sound_get(this)
            endif
           
            return s__Sound_media[this]
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runEx takes integer this,integer volume,integer newPitch returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_run(this)
            call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, volume)
            call s__Sound_setSoundPitch(this,s__Sound_snd , newPitch)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_release takes sound s returns boolean
            local integer id= GetHandleId(s)
           
            if s == null then
                return false
            elseif (LoadInteger(Table__ht, (s__Sound_pt), (id))) == 0 then // INLINED!!
                return false
            endif
           
            
            call StopSound(s, false, true)
            call s__Sound_push(((LoadInteger(Table__ht, (s__Sound_pt), (id)))),s) // INLINED!!
           
            return true
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runUnit takes integer this,unit whichUnit returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_run(this)
            call AttachSoundToUnit(s__Sound_snd, whichUnit)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runUnitEx takes integer this,unit whichUnit,integer volume,integer newPitch returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_runUnit(this,whichUnit)
            call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, volume)
            call s__Sound_setSoundPitch(this,s__Sound_snd , newPitch)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runPoint takes integer this,real x,real y,real z returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_run(this)
            call SetSoundPosition(s__Sound_snd, x, y, z)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runPointEx takes integer this,real x,real y,real z,integer volume,integer newPitch returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_runPoint(this,x , y , z)
            call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, volume)
            call s__Sound_setSoundPitch(this,s__Sound_snd , newPitch)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runPlayer takes integer this,player p returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_run(this)
            if GetLocalPlayer() != p then
                call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, 0)
            endif
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
       
        function s__Sound_runPlayerEx takes integer this,player p,integer volume,integer newPitch returns sound
            set s__Sound_snd=s__Sound_runPlayer(this,p)
            call SetSoundVolume(s__Sound_snd, volume)
            call s__Sound_setSoundPitch(this,s__Sound_snd , newPitch)
            return s__Sound_snd
        endfunction
   
    function NewSoundEx takes string fileName,integer duration,boolean looping,boolean is3D,boolean stop,integer fadeInRate,integer fadeOutRate,string eax returns integer
        return s__Sound_createEx(fileName , duration , looping , is3D , stop , fadeInRate , fadeOutRate , eax)
    endfunction
   
    function NewSound takes string fileName,integer duration,boolean looping,boolean is3D returns integer
        return (s__Sound_createEx((fileName ) , ( duration ) , ( looping ) , ( is3D) , DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS)) // INLINED!!
    endfunction
   
    function RunSound takes integer this returns sound
        return s__Sound_run(this)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundEx takes integer this,integer volume,integer pitch returns sound
        return s__Sound_runEx(this,volume , pitch)
    endfunction
   
    function ReleaseSound takes sound s returns boolean
        return s__Sound_release(s)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundOnUnit takes integer this,unit whichUnit returns sound
        return s__Sound_runUnit(this,whichUnit)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundOnUnitEx takes integer this,unit whichUnit,integer volume,integer pitch returns sound
        return s__Sound_runUnitEx(this,whichUnit , volume , pitch)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundAtPoint takes integer this,real x,real y,real z returns sound
        return s__Sound_runPoint(this,x , y , z)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundAtPointEx takes integer this,real x,real y,real z,integer volume,integer pitch returns sound
        return s__Sound_runPointEx(this,x , y , z , volume , pitch)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundForPlayer takes integer this,player p returns sound
        return s__Sound_runPlayer(this,p)
    endfunction
   
    function RunSoundForPlayerEx takes integer this,player p,integer volume,integer pitch returns sound
        return s__Sound_runPlayerEx(this,p , volume , pitch)
    endfunction
   

//library SoundTools ends
//library TimedHandles:



    // here you may add or remove handle types
//textmacro instance: TIMEDHANDLES("effect", "DestroyEffect")
       
       
           




           
            function s__effectTimed_destroy takes integer this returns nothing
                call DestroyEffect(s__effectTimed_effect_var[this])
                set s__effectTimed_effect_var[this]=null
               

                    set s__effectTimed_elapsed[this]=0

               
                call s__effectTimed_deallocate(this)
            endfunction
           
            function s__effectTimed_remove takes nothing returns nothing

                    local integer i= 0
                    local integer this
                    loop
                        exitwhen i > s__effectTimed_index
                        set this=s__effectTimed_instance[i]
                        set s__effectTimed_elapsed[this]=s__effectTimed_elapsed[this] + TimedHandles__UPDATE_PERIOD
                        if ( s__effectTimed_elapsed[this] >= s__effectTimed_duration[this] ) then
                            set s__effectTimed_instance[i]=s__effectTimed_instance[s__effectTimed_index]
                            set i=i - 1
                            set s__effectTimed_index=s__effectTimed_index - 1
                            call s__effectTimed_destroy(this)
                            if ( s__effectTimed_index == - 1 ) then
                                call PauseTimer(s__effectTimed_timer)
                            endif
                        endif
                        set i=i + 1
                    endloop













            endfunction
           
            function s__effectTimed_create takes effect h,real timeout returns integer
                local integer this= s__effectTimed__allocate()
               

                    set s__effectTimed_index=s__effectTimed_index + 1
                    set s__effectTimed_instance[s__effectTimed_index]=this
                    if ( s__effectTimed_index == 0 ) then
                        call TimerStart(s__effectTimed_timer, TimedHandles__UPDATE_PERIOD, true, function s__effectTimed_remove)
                    endif
                    set s__effectTimed_duration[this]=timeout










               
                set s__effectTimed_effect_var[this]=h
               
                return this
            endfunction
           
       
        function DestroyEffectTimed takes effect h,real duration returns integer
            return s__effectTimed_create(h , duration)
        endfunction

//end of: TIMEDHANDLES("effect", "DestroyEffect")

            function s__ubersplatTimed_destroy takes integer this returns nothing

                    set s__ubersplatTimed_elapsed[this]=0

//*
//***************************************************************************


function InitGlobals takes nothing returns nothing
    local integer i= 0
    set udg_Team1=CreateForce()
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Easy=0
    set i=0
    loop
        exitwhen ( i > 1 )
        set udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavedAngle[i]=0
        set i=i + 1
    endloop

    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Time_Timer=CreateTimer()

    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Hard=0

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************
//***************************************************************************
//*  Playercolors


//***************************************************************************
//*  Table
//***************************************************************************
//*  SoundTools


//***************************************************************************
//*  SimpleTriggerData
//***************************************************************************
//*  TimerUtils
//***************************************************************************
//*  TimedHandles
//***************************************************************************
//*  Earth Shattering









    
    function s__EarthShattering_newTarget takes nothing returns nothing
        local integer this= (LoadInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId((GetTriggeringTrigger())))) // INLINED!!
        local unit triggerUnit= GetTriggerUnit()

         if ( not IsUnitAlly(triggerUnit, GetOwningPlayer(s__EarthShattering_caster[this])) ) and UnitAlive(triggerUnit) then

            call GroupAddUnit(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this], triggerUnit)
            call UnitDamageTarget(s__EarthShattering_caster[this], triggerUnit, s__EarthShattering_damage[this], false, false, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN, WEAPON_TYPE_WHOKNOWS)

        endif

        set triggerUnit=null

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_enteredRegion takes nothing returns nothing

        local integer this= (LoadInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId((GetTriggeringTrigger())))) // INLINED!!
        local unit triggerUnit= GetTriggerUnit()

        if ( not IsUnitAlly(triggerUnit, GetOwningPlayer(s__EarthShattering_caster[this])) ) and UnitAlive(triggerUnit) then

            call GroupAddUnit(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this], triggerUnit)

        endif

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_leftRegion takes nothing returns nothing

        local integer this= (LoadInteger(SimpleTriggerData__triggerDataBank, SimpleTriggerData__TRIGGER_DATA_KEY, GetHandleId((GetTriggeringTrigger())))) // INLINED!!

        call GroupRemoveUnit(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this], GetTriggerUnit())

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_damageTick takes nothing returns nothing
        local integer this= (LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((GetExpiredTimer())))) // INLINED!!
        local integer index= 0
        local integer endIndex= BlzGroupGetSize(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this])

        set s__EarthShattering_duration[this]=s__EarthShattering_duration[this] - s__EarthShattering_period[this]

        call s__Sound_runPoint(s__EarthShattering_soundEffect2,GetRectCenterX(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this]) , GetRectCenterY(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this]) , 0.00)

        loop
            exitwhen index >= endIndex
            
            call UnitDamageTarget(s__EarthShattering_caster[this], BlzGroupUnitAt(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this], index), s__EarthShattering_damagePerPeriod[this], false, false, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNKNOWN, WEAPON_TYPE_WHOKNOWS)

            set index=index + 1
        endloop

        if ( s__EarthShattering_duration[this] > 0.00 and s__EarthShattering_period[this] <= s__EarthShattering_duration[this] ) then
            call TimerStart(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this], s__EarthShattering_period[this], false, function s__EarthShattering_damageTick)
        else
            call sc__EarthShattering_destroy(this)
        endif

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_move takes nothing returns nothing

        local integer this= (LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((GetExpiredTimer())))) // INLINED!!
        local real dummyX= GetUnitX(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]) + s__EarthShattering_velocity[this] * Cos(s__EarthShattering_angle[this])
        local real dummyY= GetUnitY(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]) + s__EarthShattering_velocity[this] * Sin(s__EarthShattering_angle[this])
        local real calculatedTime
        local effect dummyEffect= null
        local ubersplat dummyUbersplat= null

        call SetUnitX(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this], dummyX)
        call SetUnitY(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this], dummyY)
        
        set s__EarthShattering_timedLife[this]=s__EarthShattering_timedLife[this] - s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_PERIOD
        
        call MoveRectTo(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this], dummyX, dummyY)
        call RegionAddRect(s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this], s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this])

        set s__EarthShattering_counter[this]=s__EarthShattering_counter[this] + 1

        if s__EarthShattering_timedLife[this] > 0.00 then

            if s__EarthShattering_counter[this] >= s__EarthShattering_RARETY_OF_EFFECTS then
                set s__EarthShattering_counter[this]=0

                set calculatedTime=s__EarthShattering_timedLife[this] + s__EarthShattering_duration[this] - s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_TIMED_LIFE

                set dummyEffect=AddSpecialEffect(s__EarthShattering_EFFECT_PATH, dummyX, dummyY)
                call BlzSetSpecialEffectYaw(dummyEffect, s__EarthShattering_angle[this])

call s__effectTimed_create((dummyEffect ) , (( calculatedTime)*1.0)) // INLINED!!
                
                set dummyUbersplat=CreateUbersplat(dummyX, dummyY, s__EarthShattering_UBERSPLAT_NAME, 255, 255, 255, 255, false, true)
                call SetUbersplatRender(dummyUbersplat, true)
                call ShowUbersplat(dummyUbersplat, true)

call s__ubersplatTimed_create((dummyUbersplat ) , (( calculatedTime)*1.0)) // INLINED!!

                call s__Sound_runPoint(s__EarthShattering_soundEffect,dummyX , dummyY , BlzGetLocalUnitZ(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]))

                set dummyEffect=null

            endif

            call TimerStart(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this], s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_PERIOD, false, function s__EarthShattering_move)

        else

            call RemoveUnit(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this])

        endif

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_create takes unit caster,real damage,real damagePerPeriod,real period,real duration,real radius,real range,real angle returns integer

        local integer this= s__EarthShattering__allocate()
        local real casterX= GetUnitX(caster)
        local real casterY= GetUnitY(caster)
        local real smallRadius= radius / SquareRoot(2)

        set s__EarthShattering_damage[this]=damage
        set s__EarthShattering_damagePerPeriod[this]=damagePerPeriod
        set s__EarthShattering_period[this]=period
        set s__EarthShattering_duration[this]=duration
        set s__EarthShattering_angle[this]=angle * bj_DEGTORAD

        set s__EarthShattering_velocity[this]=range * s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_PERIOD
        set s__EarthShattering_timedLife[this]=s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_TIMED_LIFE
        set s__EarthShattering_counter[this]=0

        set s__EarthShattering_caster[this]=caster
        set s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]=CreateUnit(GetOwningPlayer(caster), s__EarthShattering_DUMMY_ID, casterX, casterY, angle)

        set s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this]=CreateGroup()
        set s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this]=Rect(smallRadius, smallRadius, smallRadius, smallRadius)
        set s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this]=CreateRegion()
        call MoveRectTo(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this], casterX, casterY)

        set s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this]=NewTriggerEx(this)
        set s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this]=NewTriggerEx(this)
        set s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this]=NewTriggerEx(this)

        set s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this]=NewTimerEx(this)
        set s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this]=NewTimerEx(this)
        
        call TriggerAddAction(s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this], function s__EarthShattering_newTarget)
        call TriggerAddAction(s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this], function s__EarthShattering_enteredRegion)
        call TriggerAddAction(s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this], function s__EarthShattering_leftRegion)
        call TriggerRegisterEnterRegion(s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this], s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this], null)
        call TriggerRegisterLeaveRegion(s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this], s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this], null)
        call TriggerRegisterUnitInRange(s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this], s__EarthShattering_dummy[this], radius, null)
    
        call TimerStart(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this], s__EarthShattering_MOVEMENT_PERIOD, false, function s__EarthShattering_move)
        call TimerStart(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this], RMinBJ(duration, period), false, function s__EarthShattering_damageTick)

        return this

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_destroy takes integer this returns nothing

        call DestroyGroup(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this])
        call RemoveRegion(s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this])
        call RemoveRect(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this])
        call RemoveUnit(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this])
        call PauseTimer(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this])
        call PauseTimer(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this])

        set s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_caster[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this]=null

        call s__EarthShattering_deallocate(this)

    endfunction

    function s__EarthShattering_onInit takes nothing returns nothing

        set s__EarthShattering_soundEffect=(s__Sound_createEx(((s__EarthShattering_SOUND_EFFECT_PATH ) ) , ( ( 2818 ) ) , ( ( false ) ) , ( ( true)) , DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS)) // INLINED!!
        set s__EarthShattering_soundEffect2=(s__Sound_createEx(((s__EarthShattering_SOUND_EFFECT2_PATH ) ) , ( ( 1500 ) ) , ( ( false ) ) , ( ( true)) , DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS)) // INLINED!!

    endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*  Homing Magic






    function s__HomingMagic_chooseNextTarget takes integer this returns nothing

        local unit currentUnit= null
        local player casterOwner= GetOwningPlayer(s__HomingMagic_caster[this])
        local integer index= 0
        local integer endIndex= 0

        call GroupAddUnit(s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this], s__HomingMagic_target[this])
        call GroupEnumUnitsInRange(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this], GetUnitX(s__HomingMagic_target[this]), GetUnitY(s__HomingMagic_target[this]), s__HomingMagic_range[this], null)

        set endIndex=BlzGroupGetSize(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this])

        loop
            exitwhen index >= endIndex

            set currentUnit=BlzGroupUnitAt(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this], index)

            if IsUnitInGroup(currentUnit, s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this]) or not UnitAlive(currentUnit) or IsUnitAlly(currentUnit, casterOwner) then

                call GroupRemoveUnit(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this], currentUnit)

                set index=index - 1
                set endIndex=endIndex - 1

            endif

            set index=index + 1
        endloop

        set casterOwner=null

        set bj_groupRandomConsidered=0
        set bj_groupRandomCurrentPick=null
        call ForGroup(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this], function GroupPickRandomUnitEnum)

        set s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]=s__HomingMagic_target[this]
        set s__HomingMagic_target[this]=bj_groupRandomCurrentPick
        
    endfunction

    function s__HomingMagic_spellStrike takes nothing returns nothing

        local integer this= (LoadInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((GetExpiredTimer())))) // INLINED!!
        local real damage= s__HomingMagic_initialDamage[this] * ( 1.00 - s__HomingMagic_damagePercentLossAfterJump[this] * I2R(s__HomingMagic_totalJumpAmount[this] - s__HomingMagic_jumps[this]) )
        local real targetX= GetUnitX(s__HomingMagic_target[this])
        local real targetY= GetUnitY(s__HomingMagic_target[this])
        local real targetZ= BlzGetLocalUnitZ(s__HomingMagic_target[this]) + GetUnitFlyHeight(s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]) + s__HomingMagic_LIGHTNING_Z_OFFSET
        
        call UnitDamageTarget(s__HomingMagic_caster[this], s__HomingMagic_target[this], damage, false, false, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_LIGHTNING, WEAPON_TYPE_WHOKNOWS)
call s__lightningTimed_create((AddLightningEx(s__HomingMagic_lightningCode[this], true, GetUnitX(s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]), GetUnitY(s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]), BlzGetLocalUnitZ(s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]) + GetUnitFlyHeight(s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]) + s__HomingMagic_LIGHTNING_Z_OFFSET, targetX, targetY, targetZ) ) , (( 1.00)*1.0)) // INLINED!!

        call s__Sound_runPoint(s__HomingMagic_soundEffect,targetX , targetY , targetZ)

        set s__HomingMagic_jumps[this]=s__HomingMagic_jumps[this] - 1

        if s__HomingMagic_jumps[this] > 0 then
        
            call s__HomingMagic_chooseNextTarget(this)

            if s__HomingMagic_target[this] == null then
                call sc__HomingMagic_destroy(this)
            else
                call TimerStart(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this], s__HomingMagic_delay[this], false, function s__HomingMagic_spellStrike)
            endif
            
        else
            call sc__HomingMagic_destroy(this)
        endif

    endfunction

    function s__HomingMagic_create takes unit caster,unit target,real initialDamage,real damagePercentLossAfterJump,real range,integer jumps,real delay,string lightningCode returns integer

        local integer this= s__HomingMagic__allocate()

        set s__HomingMagic_damagePercentLossAfterJump[this]=damagePercentLossAfterJump
        set s__HomingMagic_totalJumpAmount[this]=jumps + 1
        set s__HomingMagic_jumps[this]=s__HomingMagic_totalJumpAmount[this]
        set s__HomingMagic_range[this]=range
        set s__HomingMagic_delay[this]=delay
        set s__HomingMagic_initialDamage[this]=initialDamage
        set s__HomingMagic_lightningCode[this]=lightningCode

        set s__HomingMagic_caster[this]=caster
        set s__HomingMagic_target[this]=target
        set s__HomingMagic_previousTarget[this]=caster
        set s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this]=CreateGroup()
        set s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this]=CreateGroup()

        set s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this]=NewTimerEx(this)
        call TimerStart(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this], 0.00, false, function s__HomingMagic_spellStrike)

        return this

    endfunction

    function s__HomingMagic_destroy takes integer this returns nothing

        call PauseTimer(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this])
        call DestroyGroup(s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this])
        call DestroyGroup(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this])

        set s__HomingMagic_caster[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_target[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this]=null

    endfunction
    
    function s__HomingMagic_onInit takes nothing returns nothing

        set s__HomingMagic_soundEffect=(s__Sound_createEx(((s__HomingMagic_SOUND_EFFECT_PATH ) ) , ( ( 2136 ) ) , ( ( false ) ) , ( ( true)) , DEFAULT_SOUND_STOPS_ON_LEAVE_RANGE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_IN_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_FADE_OUT_RATE , DEFAULT_SOUND_EAX_SETTINGS)) // INLINED!!

    endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*  Ice Slash




    function s__IceSlash_execute takes unit caster,real radius,real angle,real angleOfEffect,real damage returns nothing

        local integer unitAmount
        local integer unitIndex= 0
        local real casterX= GetUnitX(caster)
        local real casterY= GetUnitY(caster)
        local real targetX
        local real targetY
        local real angleDifference
        local unit target

        call GroupEnumUnitsInRange(s__IceSlash_damageGroup, casterX, casterY, radius, null)
        set unitAmount=BlzGroupGetSize(s__IceSlash_damageGroup)
        set angleOfEffect=angleOfEffect * bj_DEGTORAD / 2.00
        set angle=angle * bj_DEGTORAD

        loop

            exitwhen unitIndex >= unitAmount

            set target=BlzGroupUnitAt(s__IceSlash_damageGroup, unitIndex)
            set targetX=GetUnitX(target)
            set targetY=GetUnitY(target)
            set angleDifference=angle - Atan2(targetY - casterY, targetX - casterX)

            if ( angleDifference <= angleOfEffect ) and ( angleDifference >= - angleOfEffect ) then
                call UnitDamageTarget(caster, target, damage, false, false, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_COLD, WEAPON_TYPE_WHOKNOWS)
            endif

            set unitIndex=unitIndex + 1
        endloop

        set target=null

    endfunction

    function s__IceSlash_onInit takes nothing returns nothing

        set s__IceSlash_damageGroup=CreateGroup()

    endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*  Upgraded Hero




//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Item Tables
//*
//***************************************************************************

function ItemTable000000_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem(ChooseRandomItem(7), 15)
        call RandomDistAddItem('I00L', 20)
        call RandomDistAddItem('I00I', 20)
        call RandomDistAddItem(- 1, 45)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

        call RandomDistAddItem('I00E', 25)

        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif

            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('IC90', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000045_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I007', 45)
        call RandomDistAddItem(- 1, 55)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I005', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I00Y', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

function Unit000129_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I005', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I05H', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I01C', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

        else

            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I031', 50)
        call RandomDistAddItem(- 1, 50)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I05N', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

function Unit000273_DropItems takes nothing returns nothing
    local widget trigWidget= null
    local unit trigUnit= null
    local integer itemID= 0
    local boolean canDrop= true

    set trigWidget=bj_lastDyingWidget
    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I033', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I03K', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I04O', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

    if ( trigWidget == null ) then
        set trigUnit=GetTriggerUnit()
    endif

    if ( trigUnit != null ) then
        set canDrop=not IsUnitHidden(trigUnit)
        if ( canDrop and GetChangingUnit() != null ) then
            set canDrop=( GetChangingUnitPrevOwner() == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
        endif
    endif

    if ( canDrop ) then
        // Item set 0
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I041', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 1
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I04O', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

        // Item set 2
        call RandomDistReset()
        call RandomDistAddItem('I03Y', 100)
        set itemID=RandomDistChoose()
        if ( trigUnit != null ) then
            call UnitDropItem(trigUnit, itemID)
        else
            call WidgetDropItem(trigWidget, itemID)
        endif

    endif

    set bj_lastDyingWidget=null
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Sound Assets
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitSounds takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\ArrangedTeamInvitation.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation, 2914)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_BattleNetTick=CreateSound("Sound\\Interface\\BattleNetTick.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_BattleNetTick, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_BattleNetTick, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_BattleNetTick, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_BattleNetTick, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_convert=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\convert.wav", false, true, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_convert, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_convert, 1)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_convert, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_convert, 1.0)
    call SetSoundDistances(gg_snd_convert, 0.0, 10000.0)
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff(gg_snd_convert, 3000.0)
    call SetSoundConeAngles(gg_snd_convert, 0.0, 0.0, 127)
    call SetSoundConeOrientation(gg_snd_convert, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    set gg_snd_Credits="Sound\\Music\\mp3Music\\Credits.mp3"
    set gg_snd_demoniclaugh=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\soundeffectHELL13.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_demoniclaugh, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_demoniclaugh, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_demoniclaugh, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_demoniclaugh, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_firelaunch2=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\firelaunch2.wav", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_firelaunch2, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_firelaunch2, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_firelaunch2, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_firelaunch2, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_firstblood=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\firstblood.mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_firstblood, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_firstblood, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_firstblood, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_firstblood, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_fountainloop=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\fountainloop.wav", true, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_fountainloop, 476)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_fountainloop, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_fountainloop, 100)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_fountainloop, 1.0)
    call SetSoundDistances(gg_snd_fountainloop, 0.0, 10000.0)
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff(gg_snd_fountainloop, 3000.0)
    call SetSoundConeAngles(gg_snd_fountainloop, 0.0, 0.0, 127)
    call SetSoundConeOrientation(gg_snd_fountainloop, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    set gg_snd_H09Guardian08=CreateSound("Sound\\Dialogue\\HumanCampaign\\Human09\\H09Guardian08.mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_H09Guardian08, 9313)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_H09Guardian08, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_H09Guardian08, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_H09Guardian08, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_HCancelBuilding=CreateSound("Sound\\Buildings\\Death\\HCancelBuilding.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 2818)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 1.0)
    call SetSoundDistances(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 0.0, 10000.0)
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 3000.0)
    call SetSoundConeAngles(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 0.0, 0.0, 127)
    call SetSoundConeOrientation(gg_snd_HCancelBuilding, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    set gg_snd_headshot=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\headshot.mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_headshot, 2818)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_headshot, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_headshot, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_headshot, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_Humiliation=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\Humiliation.mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_Humiliation, 2818)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_Humiliation, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_Humiliation, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_Humiliation, 1.0)
    set gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5=CreateSound("Units\\NightElf\\Illidan\\IllidanMorphedPissed5.wav", false, true, true, 10, 10, "HeroAcksEAX")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 2635)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, - 1)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 1.0)
    call SetSoundDistances(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 0.0, 10000.0)
    call SetSoundDistanceCutoff(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 3000.0)
    call SetSoundConeAngles(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 0.0, 0.0, 127)
    call SetSoundConeOrientation(gg_snd_IllidanMorphedPissed5, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    set gg_snd_Jingle_Bells_original_song__mp3cut_net_u=CreateSound("war3mapImported\\Jingle Bells original song (mp3cut.net).mp3", false, false, false, 10, 10, "DefaultEAXON")
    call SetSoundDuration(gg_snd_Jingle_Bells_original_song__mp3cut_net_u, 2635)
    call SetSoundChannel(gg_snd_Jingle_Bells_original_song__mp3cut_net_u, 0)
    call SetSoundVolume(gg_snd_Jingle_Bells_original_song__mp3cut_net_u, 127)
    call SetSoundPitch(gg_snd_Jingle_Bells_original_song__mp3cut_net_u, 1.0)

function CreateAllDestructables takes nothing returns nothing
    local destructable d
    local trigger t
    local real life
    set gg_dest_ATg3_3032=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('ATg3', - 832.0, - 6976.0, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ATg3')
    set gg_dest_ATg3_3033=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('ATg3', 896.0, - 6976.0, 0.000, 0.900, 0, 'ATg3')
    set gg_dest_ATg4_0343=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('ATg4', 9952.0, 12768.0, 180.000, 1.000, 0, 'ATg4')
    set gg_dest_ITig_0389=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('ITig', 3264.0, - 6400.0, 323.000, 2.000, 0, 'ITig')
    set gg_dest_LTe1_0000=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTe1', 0.0, 3840.0, 270.000, 0.900, 0, 'LTe1')
    set gg_dest_LTg1_3493=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg1', - 1664.0, 2944.0, 270.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg1')
    set gg_dest_LTg1_3539=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg1', - 1600.0, - 2880.0, 270.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg1')
    set gg_dest_LTg1_3495=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg1', 1664.0, 2944.0, 270.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg1')
    set gg_dest_LTg1_3532=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg1', 1664.0, - 2880.0, 270.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg1')
    set gg_dest_LTg3_3498=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg3', - 5504.0, - 1472.0, 0.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg3')
    set gg_dest_LTg3_3496=BlzCreateDestructableWithSkin('LTg3', 5504.0, - 1408.0, 0.000, 2.100, 0, 'LTg3')

//===========================================================================
function CreateBuildingsForPlayer0 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p= Player(0)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_n04P_0017=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'n04P', - 10240.0, 1408.0, 270.000, 'n04P')
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateUnitsForPlayer0 takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p= Player(0)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set gg_unit_h02J_0107=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h02J', 9202.0, 8155.5, 32.411, 'h02J')
    set gg_unit_o000_0235=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'o000', - 18.0, 7311.0, 272.538, 'o000')
    set gg_unit_h02J_0452=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h02J', 9599.2, 8134.1, 315.032, 'h02J')
    set gg_unit_h02J_0574=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h02J', 10003.7, 8112.8, 270.547, 'h02J')
    set gg_unit_h02J_0575=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h02J', 9221.8, 7701.0, 110.691, 'h02J')
