//===========================================================================
function CreateNeutralHostileBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    local player p= Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)
    local unit u
    local integer unitID
    local trigger t
    local real life

    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nwgt', - 9920.0, - 6784.0, 270.000, 'nwgt')
    call WaygateSetDestination(u, GetRectCenterX(gg_rct_Gateway_4), GetRectCenterY(gg_rct_Gateway_4))
    call WaygateActivate(u, true)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h01M', - 9088.0, - 2688.0, 270.000, 'h01M')
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000141_DropItems)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', - 5664.0, - 2592.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', 5664.0, - 2592.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', - 5664.0, 2592.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', 5664.0, 2592.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', 1568.0, 4640.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', - 1568.0, 4640.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 3552.0, 11424.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'ncp2', - 5152.0, - 3360.0, 270.000, 'ncp2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h01M', - 10560.0, - 5568.0, 270.000, 'h01M')
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000011_DropItems)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h01M', 10496.0, - 7232.0, 270.000, 'h01M')
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000616_DropItems)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nwgt', - 5760.0, 5760.0, 270.000, 'nwgt')
    call WaygateSetDestination(u, GetRectCenterX(gg_rct_Gateway_1), GetRectCenterY(gg_rct_Gateway_1))
    call WaygateActivate(u, true)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nwgt', 10368.0, - 8960.0, 270.000, 'nwgt')
    call WaygateSetDestination(u, GetRectCenterX(gg_rct_Gateway_3), GetRectCenterY(gg_rct_Gateway_3))
    call WaygateActivate(u, true)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 7584.0, 2144.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000172_DropItems)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 6496.0, 2912.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 6944.0, 2016.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', - 6880.0, 2720.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set t=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, u, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000170_DropItems)
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', - 8160.0, 2272.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', - 7456.0, 2016.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 3744.0, 11040.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'h01M', 10496.0, - 6528.0, 270.000, 'h01M')

    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 5152.0, 11168.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 3360.0, 10656.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 4704.0, 11680.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 3808.0, 11680.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 3232.0, 11424.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 5216.0, 11744.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set u=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nef2', 5536.0, 11296.0, 270.000, 'nef2')
    set gg_unit_nfgo_0466=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'nfgo', 11328.0, 2816.0, 270.000, 'nfgo')
    set t=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(t, gg_unit_nfgo_0466, EVENT_UNIT_CHANGE_OWNER)
    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000285_DropItems)
endfunction

    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_UC95_0190, 'A07K')

    call TriggerAddAction(t, function Unit000215_DropItems)
    set gg_unit_H00I_0192=BlzCreateUnitWithSkin(p, 'H00I', - 141.6, 6540.2, 88.000, 'H00I')

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerBuildings takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer0()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer1()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer2()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer3()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer4()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer5()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer6()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer7()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer8()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer9()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer10()
    call CreateBuildingsForPlayer11()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreatePlayerUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer0()
    call CreateUnitsForPlayer6()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function CreateAllUnits takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNeutralHostileBuildings()
    call CreateNeutralPassiveBuildings()
    call CreatePlayerBuildings()
    call CreateNeutralHostile()
    call CreateNeutralPassive()
    call CreatePlayerUnits()
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Regions
//*
//***************************************************************************

function CreateRegions takes nothing returns nothing
    local weathereffect we

    set gg_rct_1=Rect(- 9632.0, - 8224.0, - 9504.0, - 8096.0)
    set gg_rct_10=Rect(- 10496.0, - 8928.0, - 10368.0, - 8800.0)
    set gg_rct_11=Rect(- 10496.0, - 8608.0, - 10368.0, - 8480.0)
    set gg_rct_12=Rect(- 10400.0, - 8352.0, - 10272.0, - 8224.0)
    set gg_rct_13=Rect(- 10176.0, - 8256.0, - 10048.0, - 8128.0)
    set gg_rct_14=Rect(- 9920.0, - 8160.0, - 9792.0, - 8032.0)

    set gg_rct_Arma_Exit=Rect(- 9984.0, - 8000.0, - 9728.0, - 7776.0)
    set gg_rct_Armageddon=Rect(- 10240.0, - 9024.0, - 9440.0, - 8352.0)
    set gg_rct_Armageddon_invincible=Rect(- 11328.0, - 9888.0, - 8448.0, - 7456.0)
    set gg_rct_Assassin_of_AC=Rect(6592.0, - 8256.0, 6784.0, - 8064.0)
    set gg_rct_Ballistic=Rect(- 5888.0, - 8160.0, - 5760.0, - 8000.0)

function CreateCameras takes nothing returns nothing

    set gg_cam_Camera_001=CreateCameraSetup()
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ZOFFSET, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ROTATION, 90.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ANGLE_OF_ATTACK, 304.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 2657.3, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_FIELD_OF_VIEW, 70.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_FARZ, 5000.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_NEARZ, 100.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_PITCH, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_YAW, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetField(gg_cam_Camera_001, CAMERA_FIELD_LOCAL_ROLL, 0.0, 0.0)
    call CameraSetupSetDestPosition(gg_cam_Camera_001, - 8475.6, 13698.9, 0.0)

    set gg_cam_Camera_002=CreateCameraSetup()

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Custom Script Code
//*
//***************************************************************************

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Triggers
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialization_Func016A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_R__gion_371)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Team1Base)
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Func017A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_R__gion_371)
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Team2Base)
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Func022A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD, 100)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 0.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Hashtable)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Destructables)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Players)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Units)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Locations)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Upgraded_Hero_Register)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Tavern_Heroes)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Regions)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Easy)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Special_Effects)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers)
    call MeleeStartingVisibility()
    call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Initialization_Func016A)
    call ForForce(udg_Team2, function Trig_Initialization_Func017A)
    call SetSkyModel("Skystars.mdx")
    call SetDoodadAnimationRectBJ("stand third", 'YOsw', gg_rct_Region_322)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_345)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Initialization_Func022A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // ----------------------
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Updates_and_Info)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_491")
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius03)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_PursuitTheme)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialization=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialization, function Trig_Initialization_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Camera Setup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Camera_Setup_Func001002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Camera_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Camera_Setup_Func001002)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Camera_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Camera_Setup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Camera_Setup, 0.10)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Camera_Setup, function Trig_Camera_Setup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Updates and Info
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Updates_and_Info_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_1479", "TRIGSTR_1761", "war3mapImported\\BTNLeatherbound_TomeI.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_3238", "TRIGSTR_3249", "war3mapImported\\BTNLeatherbound_TomeII.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_3311", "TRIGSTR_3312", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNRune.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_3351", "TRIGSTR_3352", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNVillagerKid2.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_3566", "TRIGSTR_3567", "war3mapImported\\BTNLeatherbound_TomeIII.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_OPT_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_3989", "TRIGSTR_5219", "war3mapImported\\BTNLeatherbound_TomeV.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_8381", "TRIGSTR_8458", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHumanCaptureFlag.blp")
    call CreateQuestBJ(bj_QUESTTYPE_REQ_DISCOVERED, "TRIGSTR_9956", "TRIGSTR_10000", "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNArmorGolem.blp")
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Updates_and_Info takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Updates_and_Info=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Updates_and_Info, function Trig_Updates_and_Info_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Info And Feedback
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Info_And_Feedback_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 35.00, "TRIGSTR_4730")
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_10001")
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_REQUIREMENT, "TRIGSTR_7503")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_MISSIONFAILED, "TRIGSTR_10027")
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_10003")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Info_And_Feedback takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Info_And_Feedback=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Info_And_Feedback, 20.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Info_And_Feedback, function Trig_Info_And_Feedback_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Hashtable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Hashtable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call InitHashtableBJ()
    set udg_Hashtable=GetLastCreatedHashtableBJ()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Hashtable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Hashtable=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Hashtable, function Trig_Initialize_Hashtable_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Special Effects
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Special_Effects_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves1)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves2)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves3)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves4)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves5)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves6)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves7)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves8)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_leaves9)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\LeavesSmall.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Special_Effects takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Special_Effects=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Special_Effects, function Trig_Initialize_Special_Effects_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg3_3494, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg3_3498, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg1_3539, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg1_3532, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg3_3496, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg3_3497, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg1_3495, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTg1_3493, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_LTe1_0000, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_ATg4_0343, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_ATg3_3032, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_ATg3_3033, true)
    call SetDestructableInvulnerableBJ(gg_dest_ITig_0389, true)
endfunction

    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_3=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle3)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_4=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle4)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_5=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle5)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_6=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle6)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_7=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle7)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_8=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle8)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_9=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle9)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_10=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle10)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_11=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle11)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_12=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle12)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_13=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle13)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_14=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle14)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_15=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle15)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_16=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle16)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_17=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle17)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_18=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Circle18)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_1=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag1)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_2=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag2)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_3=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag3)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_4=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag4)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_5=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag5)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_6=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag6)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_7=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag7)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_8=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag8)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_9=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag9)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_10=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag10)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_11=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag11)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_12=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag12)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_13=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag13)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_14=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag14)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_15=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag15)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_16=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag16)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_17=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag17)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_18=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag18)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_19=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag19)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_20=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag20)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_21=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag21)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_22=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag22)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_23=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag23)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_24=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag24)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_25=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag25)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_26=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag26)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_27=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag27)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_28=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag28)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_29=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag29)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_30=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag30)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_31=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag31)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_32=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag32)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_33=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag33)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_34=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag34)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_35=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag35)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_36=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag36)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_37=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag37)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_38=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag38)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_39=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag39)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_40=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag40)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_Diag_41=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Diag41)
    set udg_Secret_Shop=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_SS)
    set udg_Altar_of_Power=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Altar_TP)
    set udg_Base_to_TOP=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_013)
    set udg_Base_to_BOT=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Base_to_BOT)
    set udg_Mid_to_TOP=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_331)
    set udg_BOT_to_TOP=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_335)
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer > 12
        set udg_Player_Stash_Position[udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer]=GetUnitLoc(udg_Player_Magic_Storage[udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer])
        set udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer=udg_Initializer_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Locations takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Locations=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Locations, function Trig_Initialize_Locations_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Regions
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Regions_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CA_Castle_Regions[0]=gg_rct_Castle2
    set udg_CA_Castle_Regions[1]=gg_rct_Castle3
    set udg_CA_Castle_Regions[2]=gg_rct_Castle4
    set udg_CA_Castle_Regions[3]=gg_rct_Castle5
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[1]=gg_rct_Plyr_One_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[2]=gg_rct_Plyr_Two_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[3]=gg_rct_Plyr_Three_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[4]=gg_rct_Plyr_Four_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[5]=gg_rct_Plyr_Five_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[6]=gg_rct_Plyr_Six_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[7]=gg_rct_Plyr_Seven_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[8]=gg_rct_Plyr_Eight_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[9]=gg_rct_Plyr_Nine_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[10]=gg_rct_Plyr_Ten_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[11]=gg_rct_Plyr_Eleven_Seat
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[12]=gg_rct_Plyr_Twelve_Seat
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Regions takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Regions=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Regions, function Trig_Initialize_Regions_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Players_Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Players_Func002Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer()) <= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Players_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerEventLeave(gg_trg_Leave_Game, GetEnumPlayer())
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Command_Zoom, GetEnumPlayer(), "-zoom", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Command_Repick, GetEnumPlayer(), "-repick", true)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerSelectionEventBJ(gg_trg_Fountain_Selected, GetEnumPlayer(), true)
    set udg_Hero_Revive_Timer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=CreateTimer()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Revive, udg_Hero_Revive_Timer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    if ( Trig_Initialize_Players_Func002Func007C() ) then
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Team1)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    else
        call ForceAddPlayerSimple(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Team2)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    endif
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED)
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Players_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_PlayerGroup=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Initialize_Players_Func001002001))
    call ForForce(udg_Initializer_Temp_PlayerGroup, function Trig_Initialize_Players_Func002A)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Neutrals)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_Neutrals)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_Neutrals)
    call ForceAddPlayerSimple(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Neutrals)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Players takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Players=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Players, function Trig_Initialize_Players_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Game Start Check Players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
endfunction

function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Func001A)
    call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Func002A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Game_Start_Check_Players takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Game_Start_Check_Players=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Game_Start_Check_Players, 0.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Game_Start_Check_Players, function Trig_Game_Start_Check_Players_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Timers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Timers_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Start_Duel_Random) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Timers_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Start_Team_Fight) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Timers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer, false, 120.00)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer, false, 2400.00)
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer, "TRIGSTR_2410")
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Death_Respawn_Timer, false, 300.00)
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Window=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    if ( Trig_Start_Timers_Func007C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer, false, 720.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer, "TRIGSTR_3611")
        set udg_GameEvent_Duel_TimerWindows=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Start_Timers_Func008C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer, false, 1140.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer, "TRIGSTR_3671")
        set udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_TimerWin=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    else
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Update_TimerWindows)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Timers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Timers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Start_Timers, 30.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Timers, function Trig_Start_Timers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pause Timers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pause_Timers_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pause_Timers_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pause_Timers_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pause_Timers_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pause_Timers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pause_Timers_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Pause_Timers_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Pause_Timers_Func003C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Pause_Timers_Func004C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pause_Timers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pause_Timers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pause_Timers, function Trig_Pause_Timers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Resume Timers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Resume_Timers_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resume_Timers_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resume_Timers_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resume_Timers_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer) > 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Resume_Timers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Resume_Timers_Func001C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Resume_Timers_Func002C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Resume_Timers_Func003C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Resume_Timers_Func004C() ) then
        call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Resume_Timers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Resume_Timers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Resume_Timers, function Trig_Resume_Timers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Update TimerWindows
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer) <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer) <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( TimerGetRemaining(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer) <= 600.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func002C() ) then
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Window)
    else
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Window)
    endif
    if ( Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func003C() ) then
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_Duel_TimerWindows)
    else
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_Duel_TimerWindows)
    endif
    if ( Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Func004C() ) then
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_TimerWin)
    else
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_TimerWin)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Update_TimerWindows takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Update_TimerWindows=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Update_TimerWindows)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Update_TimerWindows, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Update_TimerWindows, function Trig_Update_TimerWindows_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Units
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Units_Func028002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Units_Func029A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Player_Magic_Storage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Units_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // --------------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[0]=gg_unit_h02J_0107
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[1]=gg_unit_h02J_0452
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[2]=gg_unit_h02J_0574
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[3]=gg_unit_h02J_0575
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[4]=gg_unit_h02J_0578
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[5]=gg_unit_h02J_0579
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[6]=gg_unit_h02J_0580
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[7]=gg_unit_h02J_0613
    set udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[8]=gg_unit_h02J_0614
    // --------------------------
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[1]=gg_unit_n04P_0017
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[2]=gg_unit_n04P_0016
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[3]=gg_unit_n04P_0018
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[4]=gg_unit_n04P_0552
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[5]=gg_unit_n04P_0010
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[6]=gg_unit_n04P_0012
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[7]=gg_unit_n04P_0011
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[8]=gg_unit_n04P_0021
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[9]=gg_unit_n04P_0019
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[10]=gg_unit_n04P_0468
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[11]=gg_unit_n04P_0020
    set udg_Player_Magic_Storage[12]=gg_unit_n04P_0485
    // --------------------------
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner=gg_unit_U00K_0488
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00K_0488, true)
    // --------------------------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_PlayerGroup=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Initialize_Units_Func028002001))
    call ForForce(udg_Initializer_Temp_PlayerGroup, function Trig_Initialize_Units_Func029A)
    call DestroyForce(udg_Initializer_Temp_PlayerGroup)
    // --------------------------
    set udg_GameEvent_FC_Player=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_Team1)
    set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0233
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner)
    set udg_GameEvent_FC_Player=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_Team2)
    set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0261
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner)
    // --------------------------
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Units takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Units=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Units, function Trig_Initialize_Units_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Tavern Heroes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Tavern_Heroes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[1]='EC70'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[2]='EC69'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[3]='EC72'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[4]='E00F'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[5]='EC71'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[6]='EC73'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[7]='EC75'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[8]='EC76'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[9]='EC78'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[10]='E00H'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[11]='EC77'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[12]='EC74'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[13]='EC79'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[14]='EC83'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[15]='EC80'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[16]='E005'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[17]='EC81'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[18]='E007'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[19]='HC24'
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[20]='HC27'

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Item Manual Shops
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03K', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03J', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 315.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03L', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop5)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03F', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_337)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04R', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1ItemManualShop6)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03E', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // ======================================
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03K', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03J', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 225.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03L', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop5)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03F', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_338)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n04R', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    // -----------
    set udg_Initializer_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2ItemManualShop6)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n03E', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Initializer_Temp_Location, 90.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Initializer_Temp_Location)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops, function Trig_Initialize_Item_Manual_Shops_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Anti SpawnCamp Towers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate='n03H'
    set udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate='n03I'
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1AntiTower1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1AntiTower2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1AntiTower3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team1AntiTower4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 0.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2AntiTower1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2AntiTower2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2AntiTower3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    // ----------------------
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team2AntiTower4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate, Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_ASCT_Temp_Position, 180.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_ASCT_Temp_Position)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers, function Trig_Initialize_Anti_SpawnCamp_Towers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Host Clicked Dialog
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Host_Clicked_Dialog_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Host_AFK)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Host_Clicked_Dialog takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Host_Clicked_Dialog=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Host_Clicked_Dialog, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Host_Clicked_Dialog, function Trig_Host_Clicked_Dialog_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Host AFK
//
// Removed a useless variable "MODE", replaced by disabling a trigger and destroying it.
// Actions were indentical to "All Random" trigger, removed these actions and made the call to "All Random" trigger instead
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Host_AFK_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, Player(0))
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_5133")
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_All_Random)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Host_AFK takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Host_AFK=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Host_AFK, 15.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Host_AFK, function Trig_Host_AFK_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dialog TimeOut
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dialog_TimeOut_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameModeSetup_IsChosen == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dialog_TimeOut_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, Player(0))
    if ( Trig_Dialog_TimeOut_Func003C() ) then
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_All_Random)
    else
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Risk_Mode)
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dialog_TimeOut takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dialog_TimeOut=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Dialog_TimeOut, 45.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dialog_TimeOut, function Trig_Dialog_TimeOut_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Classic Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Classic_Mode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Classic_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4786")
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Up_Leaderboard)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Risk_Mode_Dialog_Setup)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Kill_Dialog_Setup)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Kill_LeaderBoard)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Classic_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Classic_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Classic_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Classic_Mode, Condition(function Trig_Classic_Mode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Classic_Mode, function Trig_Classic_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Until The End Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Until_The_End_Mode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Until_The_End_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4740")
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Up_Leaderboard)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Start_Team_Fight)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Start_Duel_Random)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Risk_Mode_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Until_The_End_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Until_The_End_Mode=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Until_The_End_Mode, Condition(function Trig_Until_The_End_Mode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Until_The_End_Mode, function Trig_Until_The_End_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Capture The Flag Mode
//
// Cleaned Up 2 Memory leaks (points/locations)
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Capture_The_Flag_Mode_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[9] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Capture_The_Flag_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_2028")
    call CreateItemLoc('stwp', udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_FlagPos)
    call CreateItemLoc('spro', udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_FlagPos)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Up_Multiboard)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_CTF_Submode_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Capture_The_Flag_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Capture_The_Flag_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Capture_The_Flag_Mode, Condition(function Trig_Capture_The_Flag_Mode_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Capture_The_Flag_Mode, function Trig_Capture_The_Flag_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Risk Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Risk_Mode_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Risk_Mode_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[4] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Risk_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_Risk_Mode_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4771")
        set udg_GameMode_Risk=true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Risk_Mode_Func004C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9722")
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hatw_0159)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hatw_0537)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Risk_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Risk_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Risk_Mode)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Risk_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Risk_Mode, function Trig_Risk_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gamble Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gamble_Mode_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[5] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gamble_Mode_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[6] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gamble_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_Gamble_Mode_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4772")
        set udg_GameMode_Gamble=true
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Gamble_Mode_Func004C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4787")
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hctw_0570)
        call RemoveUnit(gg_unit_hctw_0539)
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fog_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode, function Trig_Gamble_Mode_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Win Condition
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Win_Condition_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[10] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[11] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9723")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Time_Dialog_Setup)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Func004C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9724")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Points_Dialog_Setup)
    else
    endif
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Win_Condition=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Win_Condition, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Win_Condition, function Trig_Win_Condition_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Win Condition Time
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[12] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[13] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[14] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4547")
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer, false, 600.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func004C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9665")
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer, false, 1200.00)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Func005C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9683")
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer, false, 1800.00)
    else
    endif
    call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer, "TRIGSTR_4873")
    set udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer_Window=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer_Window)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Pick_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Win_Condition_Time takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Win_Condition_Time=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Time)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Time, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Time, function Trig_Win_Condition_Time_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Win Condition Points
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[15] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[16] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[17] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_CTF_Points2Win=5
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4841")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_CTF_Points2Win=10
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4842")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_CTF_Points2Win=15
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4843")
    else
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Points)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Points)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Pick_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Win_Condition_Points takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Win_Condition_Points=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Points)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Points, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Points, function Trig_Win_Condition_Points_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_Mode_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[7] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Mode_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[8] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    if ( Trig_Pick_Mode_Func002C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4781")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_All_Pick)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Pick_Mode_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4785")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_All_Random)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Pick_Mode)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Pick_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_Mode, function Trig_Pick_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kill Limit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[30] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[31] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[32] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[33] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[34] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[35] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_Limit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=20
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4844")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=40
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4845")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=60
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4846")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=80
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4848")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=100
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4850")
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_Limit_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win=120
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_4851")
    else
    endif
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kill_Limit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kill_Limit=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Kill_Limit)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Kill_Limit, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kill_Limit, function Trig_Kill_Limit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: All Pick
//
// Removed Player force leak, and point/location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_All_Pick_Func003002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_All_Pick_Func003002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_All_Pick_Func003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING), (GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_All_Pick_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n024', GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameModeSetup_TempLocation, bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

function Trig_All_Pick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameModeSetup_IsChosen=true
    set udg_GameMode=udg_GameMode_AllPick
    set udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_All_Pick_Func003002001))
    set udg_GameModeSetup_TempLocation=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_345)
    call ForForce(udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup, function Trig_All_Pick_Func005A)
    call DestroyForce(udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameModeSetup_TempLocation)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_All_Pick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_All_Pick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_All_Pick, function Trig_All_Pick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: All Random
//
// Cleared up 2 player force leaks and 2 point(location) leaks, fixed a player group condition by changing "picked player" with "matching player".
//===========================================================================
function Trig_All_Random_Func003002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetFilterPlayer())] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_All_Random_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player_Chooser=GetEnumPlayer()
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Random_Hero)
endfunction

function Trig_All_Random_Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_All_Random_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameModeSetup_IsChosen=true
    set udg_GameMode=udg_GameMode_AllRandom
    set udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_All_Random_Func003002001))
    call ForForce(udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup, function Trig_All_Random_Func004A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_All_Random_Func006002)
    call DestroyForce(udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_All_Random takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_All_Random=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_All_Random, function Trig_All_Random_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fog of War Mode
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[40] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[41] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    if ( Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Func002C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_5290")
        call FogEnableOn()
        call FogMaskEnableOn()
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Func003C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_5291")
        call FogEnableOff()
        call FogMaskEnableOff()
    else
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Pick_Dialog_Setup)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fog_of_War_Mode takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fog_of_War_Mode=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Fog_of_War_Mode)
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Fog_of_War_Mode, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fog_of_War_Mode, function Trig_Fog_of_War_Mode_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Untitled Trigger 005
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING )
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER )
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING), (GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetFilterPlayer())] == false )
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetBooleanAnd((GetPlayerSlotState(GetFilterPlayer()) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING), (GetPlayerController(GetFilterPlayer()) == MAP_CONTROL_USER))), (udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetFilterPlayer())] == false)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameModeSetup_PlayerGroup=GetPlayersMatching(Condition(function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Func001002001))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Untitled_Trigger_005 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_005=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_005, function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_005_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initial Dialog Setup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initial_Dialog_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DialogClearBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4753")
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4754")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[1]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4755")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[2]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_647")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[9]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, Player(0))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initial_Dialog_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initial_Dialog_Setup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Initial_Dialog_Setup, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initial_Dialog_Setup, function Trig_Initial_Dialog_Setup_Actions)
endfunction

    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_5194")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[3]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_5250")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[4]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, Player(0))

    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[31]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_9940")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[32]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_9941")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[33]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_9952")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[34]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_9953")
    set udg_GameModeSetup_DialogButton[35]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()

    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4155")
