    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fog_Dialog_Setup, function Trig_Fog_Dialog_Setup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Destroy Dialog Setup
//
// A trigger that will destroy all these game mode triggers after 1 minute of game time.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Destroy_Dialog_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Host_Clicked_Dialog)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Host_AFK)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Dialog_TimeOut)
    // -----------------------------------------------
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Classic_Mode)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Until_The_End_Mode)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Capture_The_Flag_Mode)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Risk_Mode)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Time)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Win_Condition_Points)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_All_Pick)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_All_Random)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Kill_Limit)
    // -----------------------------------------------
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Initial_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Risk_Mode_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Gamble_Mode_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_CTF_Submode_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Time_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Points_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Pick_Dialog_Setup)
    call DestroyTrigger(gg_trg_Kill_Dialog_Setup)
    // -----------------------------------------------
    call DialogClearBJ(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call DialogDestroy(udg_GameModeSetup_Dialog)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Destroy_Dialog_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Destroy_Dialog_Setup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Destroy_Dialog_Setup, 60.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Destroy_Dialog_Setup, function Trig_Destroy_Dialog_Setup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Generic Win Sequence
//
// Merged 2 triggers, fixed location memory leaks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameMode_TempLocation, 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Winners)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func016A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Losers)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func020002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func022002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomDefeatBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), "TRIGSTR_9736")
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func023002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call CustomVictoryBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), true, true)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, udg_GameMode_VictoryString)
    call TriggerSleepAction(23.00)
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ(false, udg_Leaderboard)
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_Duel_TimerWindows)
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    // ------------
    set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Gods_Stand)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_UC95_0190, udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
    // ------------
    set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_End_of_Game)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func012002)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
    // ------------
    call ForForce(udg_GameMode_WinningTeam, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func015A)
    call ForForce(udg_GameMode_LosingTeam, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func016A)
    // ------------
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitAnimation(gg_unit_UC95_0190, "Stand Victory")
    call ForForce(udg_GameMode_LosingTeam, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func020002)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call ForForce(udg_GameMode_LosingTeam, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func022002)
    call ForForce(udg_GameMode_WinningTeam, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Func023002)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_UndeadDefeat)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Generic_Win_Sequence takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence, function Trig_Generic_Win_Sequence_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Risk
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Risk_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()) == 'n01D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Risk_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Risk == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Risk_Number == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Risk_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Risk_Number=GetRandomInt(1, 2)
    if ( Trig_Risk_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetUnitLoc(GetBuyingUnit())
        call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(8, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call UnitAddItemSwapped(GetLastCreatedItem(), GetBuyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Risk takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Risk=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Risk, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Risk, Condition(function Trig_Risk_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Risk, function Trig_Risk_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Gamble
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Gamble_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()) == 'n01E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gamble_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Gamble == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Gamble_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Gamble_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_TempLocation=GetUnitLoc(GetBuyingUnit())
        call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(7, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call UnitAddItemSwapped(GetLastCreatedItem(), GetBuyingUnit())
    else
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Gamble takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Gamble=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Gamble, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Gamble, Condition(function Trig_Gamble_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Gamble, function Trig_Gamble_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team1 WinCondition Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills >= udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team1
    set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team2
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="Team 1 WINS!!! They are lords of the world for ETERNITY!"
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team1_WinCondition_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills, Condition(function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Kills, function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team2 WinCondition Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team2_WinCondition_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills >= udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team2_WinCondition_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team2
    set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team1
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="Team 2 WINS!!! They are lords of the world for ETERNITY!"
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team2_WinCondition_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills, Condition(function Trig_Team2_WinCondition_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Kills, function Trig_Team2_WinCondition_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: UTE WinCondition
//
// Merged 2 triggers, reduced a lot of indentical actions (if for each specific player then do same action), replaced if condition for a better condition.
// There were same actions happening in Generic Win (new trigger made from Classic Mode's win condition triggers) so did the run trigger call, and removed indentical actions.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hpal' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="|c00FF0000"
    if ( Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + "Team 1" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + "Team 2" )
    else
    endif
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + " killed the last boss and won the game : 30 seconds before game ending. GG" )
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_UTE_WinCondition takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition, Condition(function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_UTE_WinCondition, function Trig_UTE_WinCondition_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add points Team 1
//
// Removed Location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_points_Team_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'spro') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_points_Team_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points=( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points + 1 )
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'spro'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('spro', udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_FlagPos)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, I2S(udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Points)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_points_Team_1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_points_Team_1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_points_Team_1, Condition(function Trig_Add_points_Team_1_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_points_Team_1, function Trig_Add_points_Team_1_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Add points Team 2
//
// Removed Location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Add_points_Team_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'stwp') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Add_points_Team_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points=( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points + 1 )
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'stwp'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call CreateItemLoc('stwp', udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_FlagPos)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 2, I2S(udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Team2_WinCondition_Points)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Add_points_Team_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Add_points_Team_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Add_points_Team_2, Condition(function Trig_Add_points_Team_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Add_points_Team_2, function Trig_Add_points_Team_2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CTF WinCondition Time
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points == udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points > udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points > udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="|c00FF0000"
    if ( Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func002C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9759")
        return
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + "Team 1" )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + "Team 2" )
    else
    endif
    set udg_GameMode_VictoryString=( udg_GameMode_VictoryString + " wins the game : 30 seconds before game ending. GG" )
    call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer_Window)
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CTF_WinCondition_Time takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CTF_WinCondition_Time=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_CTF_WinCondition_Time, udg_GameMode_CTF_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CTF_WinCondition_Time, function Trig_CTF_WinCondition_Time_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Unable to take own flag
//
// Merged 2 triggers, changed for better condition, deleted excess actions.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'stwp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'spro' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetManipulatedItem(), GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Unable_to_take_own_flag takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Unable_to_take_own_flag=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Unable_to_take_own_flag, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Unable_to_take_own_flag, function Trig_Unable_to_take_own_flag_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team1 WinCondition Points
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points >= udg_GameMode_CTF_Points2Win ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team1
    set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team2
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Points, Condition(function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Points_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Team1_WinCondition_Points, function Trig_Team1_WinCondition_Points_Actions)
endfunction

    return true

    set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team1

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Gate Two Open
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Gate_Two_Open_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_LTe1_0000)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Gate_Two_Open takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Open=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Open, gg_rct_Region_016)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Open, function Trig_Open_Gate_Two_Open_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Gate Two Close
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Gate_Two_Close_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_CLOSE, gg_dest_LTe1_0000)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Gate_Two_Close takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Close=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterLeaveRectSimple(gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Close, gg_rct_Region_016)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Gate_Two_Close, function Trig_Open_Gate_Two_Close_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: XP Gain Periodic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerHandicapXPBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Multiplier)
endfunction

function Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Counter >= 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Multiplier=( udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Multiplier + 50.00 )
    set udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Counter=( udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Counter + 1 )
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Func003A)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, ( "Current XP Gain Multiplier: " + ( R2S(udg_GameEvent_XPGain_Multiplier) + "%" ) ))
    if ( Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Func005C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_441")
        call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_XP_Gain_Periodic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_XP_Gain_Periodic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_XP_Gain_Periodic, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_XP_Gain_Periodic, function Trig_XP_Gain_Periodic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summonder Start Animation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A09S' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation, gg_unit_U00K_0488, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation, Condition(function Trig_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation, function Trig_Armageddon_Summonder_Start_Animation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summoner Animation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitAnimation(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner, "spell slam")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation, function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summoner Stop Animation
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Animation)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation, gg_unit_U00K_0488, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_FINISH)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation, gg_unit_U00K_0488, EVENT_UNIT_SPELL_ENDCAST)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation, gg_unit_U00K_0488, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation, function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Stop_Animation_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summoner Vulnerable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_U00K_0488, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_5127")
    call CreateDestructableLoc('ITx3', GetRectCenter(gg_rct_PortalArmageddon), GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 5.00, 0)
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Portal=GetLastCreatedDestructable()
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_U00K_0488, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Point)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00K_0488, false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable, function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summoner Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_Armageddon_invincible
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Func002002)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I056', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc('I04Z', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc('I04S', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc('I024', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call RemoveDestructable(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Portal)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal)
    call TriggerSleepAction(540.00)
    call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_5125")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal)
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'U00K', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner, 10000, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04Z', udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I056', udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('k3m1', udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('glsk', udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04K', udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_090")
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_PortalArmageddon)
    call CreateDestructableLoc('ITx3', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, GetRandomDirectionDeg(), 5.00, 0)
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Portal=GetLastCreatedDestructable()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn, gg_unit_U00K_0488, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn, Condition(function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn, function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Armageddon Exit Portal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Arma_Exit)
    call CreateDestructableLoc('Volc', udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING, 2.00, 0)
    set udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_ExPortal=GetLastCreatedDestructable()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal, function Trig_Spawn_Armageddon_Exit_Portal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Summoner Loot
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_Armageddon_invincible
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Func002002)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(500, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
    call CreateItemLoc('I024', GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit()))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot, Condition(function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot, function Trig_Armageddon_Summoner_Loot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Enter Armageddon Portal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Enter_Armageddon_Portal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Enter_Armageddon_Portal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Arma_enter)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Armageddon, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Enter_Armageddon_Portal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal, gg_rct_PortalArmageddon)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal, Condition(function Trig_Enter_Armageddon_Portal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enter_Armageddon_Portal, function Trig_Enter_Armageddon_Portal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exit Armageddon Portal
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exit_Armageddon_Portal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exit_Armageddon_Portal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Return_To_Ring)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_Armageddon_Portal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal, gg_rct_Arma_Exit)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal, Condition(function Trig_Exit_Armageddon_Portal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_Armageddon_Portal, function Trig_Exit_Armageddon_Portal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, 0.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7712")
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(gg_unit_U00K_0488, false)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(gg_unit_U00K_0488)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Armageddon_Func004002)
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Window)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Armageddon_Heal_Timer, false, 10.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Summoner_Vulnerable)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon, udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon, function Trig_Armageddon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Secret Out
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Secret_Out_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Secret_Out_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvent_SecretShop_Point2)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_GameEvent_SecretShop_Point2, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Secret_Out=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Secret_Out, gg_rct_Secret_Zone_Out)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Secret_Out, Condition(function Trig_Secret_Out_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Secret_Out, function Trig_Secret_Out_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Secret_Shop_In_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Secret_Shop_In=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Secret_Shop_In, gg_rct_Region_251)

endfunction

endfunction

    set gg_trg_Secret_Shop_Out=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Secret_Shop_Out, function Trig_Secret_Shop_Out_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Item Cleaner Announcer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Func001Func001001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Duel_Arena, Condition(function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Func001Func001001001002))) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Func001C() ) then
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer, false, 60.00)
        call CreateTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_IC_Timer, "TRIGSTR_1240")
        set udg_GameEvent_IC_TimerWindow=GetLastCreatedTimerDialogBJ()
        call TimerDialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_GameEvent_IC_TimerWindow)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1241")
        call TriggerSleepAction(49.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1242")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1243")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1244")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1262")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1268")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1276")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1277")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1278")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1279")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1280")
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_UPDATED, "TRIGSTR_1281")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Item_Cleaner_Announcer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Item_Cleaner_Announcer, 1440.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Item_Cleaner_Announcer, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Announcer_Actions)
endfunction

function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DestroyTimerDialogBJ(udg_GameEvent_IC_TimerWindow)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_north, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func002A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_north1, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func003A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_410, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func004A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_411, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func005A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_412, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func006A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_413, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func007A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_414, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func008A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_south, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func009A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_417, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func010A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_418, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func011A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_419, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func012A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_420, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func013A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_421, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func014A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_422, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func015A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_north, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func017A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_north1, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func018A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_410, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func019A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_411, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func020A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_412, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func021A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_413, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func022A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_414, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func023A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_item_remove_south, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func024A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_417, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func025A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_418, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func026A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_419, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func027A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_420, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func028A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_421, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func029A)
    call EnumItemsInRectBJ(gg_rct_R__gion_422, function Trig_Item_Cleaner_Func030A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Losing Team Help
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills > udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills < udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills != udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_Two_Respawn)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Func002Func002C() ) then
            set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_One_Respawn)
        else
        endif
        call CreateItemLoc('tkno', udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call CreateItemLoc('tpow', udg_GameMode_TempLocation)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    else
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer, false, 120.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Losing_Team_Help takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Losing_Team_Help=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Losing_Team_Help, udg_GameEvent_LosingTeamHelp_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Losing_Team_Help, function Trig_Losing_Team_Help_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Activate Demonic Manifestation Respawn
//===========================================================================

    set udg_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn=true
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Activate_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Activate_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn, gg_unit_N03R_0317, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn, function Trig_Activate_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Activate Fire Elemental Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Fire_Elemental_Respawn=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn, gg_unit_N047_0484, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn, function Trig_Activate_Fire_Elemental_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Activate Elite Marine Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Elite_Marine_Respawn=true
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn, gg_unit_H01U_0487, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn, function Trig_Activate_Elite_Marine_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    set gg_trg_Activate_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Activate_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn, gg_unit_U00B_0260, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn, function Trig_Activate_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Switch Spawn Rate 10 Minutes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Respawn_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Fire_Elementals_Respawn_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_1)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Respawn_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Fire_Elementals_Respawn_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_2)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes, 600.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes, function Trig_Switch_Spawn_Rate_10_Minutes_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Switch Spawn Rate 20 Minutes
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Switch_Spawn_Rate_20_Minutes_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Respawn_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Fire_Elementals_Respawn_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_2)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_2)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Respawn_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Fire_Elementals_Respawn_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_3)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Switch_Spawn_Rate_20_Minutes, function Trig_Switch_Spawn_Rate_20_Minutes_Actions)
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_3)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_3)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Demonic_Respawn_4)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Fire_Elementals_Respawn_4)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Elite_Marine_Respawn_4)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Frost_Wyrm_Respawn_4)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Killed
//
// Merged a bunch of triggers.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Killed_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'ankh') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() != udg_Spells_LD_Dummy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerAlly(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) != true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) >= ( GetHeroLevel(GetKillingUnitBJ()) * 2 ) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(1000, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Killer, udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Killed_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + ( " Defeats " + GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) ))
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(3000, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
        if ( Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func005C() ) then
            call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Humiliation)
            call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "OMG!!! " + GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) ) + ( " u got |c00ff00ffOWNED & HUMILIATED|r by " + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + " on a Low Exp. Level that is 2x times less than yours. No offence man but |c00ff0000YOU SUCK!!!|r" ) ) ))
        else
        endif
        set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Killer=GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())
        set udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Killer)]=( udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))] + 1 )
        if ( Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008C() ) then
            set udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills=( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills + 1 )
            call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008Func004002)
        else
            set udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills=( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills + 1 )
            call ForForce(udg_Team2, function Trig_Hero_Killed_Func001Func008Func002002)
        endif
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Death)
    else
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " Dies to creeps." ))
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Killed takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Killed=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Killed, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Killed, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Killed_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Killed, function Trig_Hero_Killed_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'ankh') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_VillagerMaleDeath1)
    set udg_Hero_Revive_Handle=udg_Hero_Revive_Timer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]
    call SaveUnitHandleBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Hashtable_DeadHero, GetHandleIdBJ(udg_Hero_Revive_Handle), udg_Hashtable)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Hero_Revive_Timer[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], false, 5.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Death, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Death, function Trig_Hero_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Revive
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Revive_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Unit), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Revive_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Hero_Revive_Handle=GetExpiredTimer()
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Unit=LoadUnitHandleBJ(udg_Hashtable_DeadHero, GetHandleIdBJ(udg_Hero_Revive_Handle), udg_Hashtable)
    if ( Trig_Hero_Revive_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_One_Respawn)
    else
        set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_Two_Respawn)
    endif
    if not UnitAlive(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Unit) then
    call ReviveHeroLoc(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Unit, udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, true)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Unit), udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, 2.00)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Revive takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Revive=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Revive, function Trig_Hero_Revive_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Generic Setup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func009Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameEvents_Temp_Boolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameEvent_Duel_Center, 1.00)
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavedAngle[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetUnitFacing(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavePos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetUnitLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer])
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Boolean=not UnitAlive(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    if ( Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func009Func006C() ) then
        call ReviveHeroLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, true)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect()), 0)
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Center)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer=( udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func011Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameEvents_Temp_Boolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameEvent_Duel_Center, 1.00)
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavedAngle[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetUnitFacing(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavePos[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())]=GetUnitLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(udg_GameEvent_Duel_HeroSpots[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer])
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Boolean=not UnitAlive(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
    if ( Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func011Func006C() ) then
        call ReviveHeroLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, true)
        call SetUnitFacingToFaceLocTimed(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], GetRectCenter(GetPlayableMapRect()), 0)
    else
        call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Center)
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())], true)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer=( udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer + 1 )
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Pause_Timers)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Disable_Stuff)
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    set udg_Global_IsGamePaused=true
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Running=true
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer=1
    call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func009A)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer=7
    call ForForce(udg_Team2, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Func011A)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Duel_Generic_Setup takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Generic Setup2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup2_Func015A takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3855")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3927")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3940")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_BattleNetTick)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_PH1)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Prepare)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3951")
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Duel_Arena)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup2_Func015A)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_o000_0235)
    call PauseUnitBJ(false, gg_unit_o000_0236)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Time_Timer, false, 60.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Duel_Generic_Setup2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup2, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Setup2_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Generic End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer=GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_PlayerHero[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer], udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavePos[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer], udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavedAngle[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer])
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_PlayerHero[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer], false)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_GameEvent_Duel_SavePos[udg_GameEvents_Temp_Integer], 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func011002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(true)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func002A)
    if ( Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func003C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_mk3_iwin)
    else
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_mk3_laugh2)
    endif
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(6.00)
    set udg_Global_IsGamePaused=false
    call PauseAllUnitsBJ(false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Running=false
    set bj_wantDestroyGroup=true
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Duel_Arena), function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Func011002)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
    call PauseTimerBJ(false, udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Resume_Timers)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Enable_Stuff)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Duel_Generic_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Duel_Generic_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_End, function Trig_Duel_Generic_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Generic Death
//
// This is basically called through the Hero Dies trigger under Hero Death category.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( udg_GameEvent_Duel_Running == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Killer, udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Killer)]=( udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()))] + 2 )
    if ( Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills=( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills + 2 )
    else
        set udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills=( udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills + 2 )
    endif
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Duel_Generic_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Death, Condition(function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Death, function Trig_Duel_Generic_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Disable Stuff
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Disable_Stuff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Duel_Disable_Stuff=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Disable_Stuff, function Trig_Duel_Disable_Stuff_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Enable_Stuff_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Teleport)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
