    set gg_trg_Duel_Enable_Stuff=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Enable_Stuff, function Trig_Duel_Enable_Stuff_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Team Fight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1Point)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
    call UnitResetCooldown(GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2Point)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
    call UnitResetCooldown(GetEnumUnit())
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4200")
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    set udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team1=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team1Arena)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team1, function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Func006A)
    set udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team2=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team2Arena)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team2, function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Func008A)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Team_Fight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Team_Fight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Start_Team_Fight, udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Team_Fight, function Trig_Start_Team_Fight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Team Fight Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'ankh') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitGroupEmptyBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func001C() ) then
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team1)
        set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Team1Arena)
    else
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team2)
        set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Team2Arena)
    endif
    call ReviveHeroLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location, false)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetTriggerUnit(), true)
    call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    if ( Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func006C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3837")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Func007C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3836")
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Team_Fight_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death, Condition(function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death, function Trig_Team_Fight_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: End Team Fight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_End_Team_Fight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Team_Fight_Death)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_End)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team1)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Team2)
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_TeamDuel_Timer, false, 720.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_End_Team_Fight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_End_Team_Fight=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Time_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_End_Team_Fight, function Trig_End_Team_Fight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Start Duel Random
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Start_Duel_Random_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4211")
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team1Arena)
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero=GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team1Arena))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_One_Dueler)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero, udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero, 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero, 100)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero, false)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team2Arena)
    set udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero=GroupPickRandomUnit(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Team2Arena))
    call DestroyGroup(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Group)
    set udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Team_Two_Dueler)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero, udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_GameEvents_Temp_Location)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero, 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero, 100)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero, false)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team1_Hero)) + ( " Vs " + GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Team2_Hero)) ) ))
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_ArrangedTeamInvitation)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_4212")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Duel_Death)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_End_Duel)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_Setup2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Start_Duel_Random takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Start_Duel_Random=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Start_Duel_Random, udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Start_Duel_Random, function Trig_Start_Duel_Random_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Duel Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Duel_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_SUMMONED) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'ankh') == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Duel_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + " Wins the duel!" ))
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_End_Duel)
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Duel_Death)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Duel_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Duel_Death, Condition(function Trig_Duel_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Duel_Death, function Trig_Duel_Death_Actions)
endfunction

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Duel_Death)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Duel_Generic_End)
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_GameEvent_Duel_Timer, false, 720.00)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Weather change
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Weather_change_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RAlr')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNhs')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RAlr')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNbs')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'RLlr')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNbs')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1200.00)
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), false)
    call AddWeatherEffectSaveLast(GetPlayableMapRect(), 'SNls')
    call EnableWeatherEffect(GetLastCreatedWeatherEffect(), true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Weather_change takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Weather_change=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Weather_change, function Trig_Weather_change_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fountain Selected
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fountain_Selected_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n023_0261 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fountain_Selected_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == gg_unit_n023_0233 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetTriggerPlayer(), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fountain_Selected_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_GameEvent_FC_Player=GetTriggerPlayer()
    if ( Trig_Fountain_Selected_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0233
    else
        if ( Trig_Fountain_Selected_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0261
        else
            return
        endif
    endif
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fountain_Selected takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fountain_Selected=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fountain_Selected, function Trig_Fountain_Selected_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Change Fountain Owner
//
// Might be an easter egg later, who knows.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Change_Fountain_Owner_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain, udg_GameEvent_FC_Player, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Change_Fountain_Owner takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner, function Trig_Change_Fountain_Owner_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: First Blood
//===========================================================================
function Trig_First_Blood_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) != GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetKillingUnitBJ(), GetOwningPlayer(GetDyingUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_First_Blood_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_firstblood)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ())) + ( " has been awarded |c00ffff003000 Gold|r for defeating " + ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " for the first |c00ff0000KILL in the Game!!!|r |c0000ff00WELL DONE!|r" ) ) ))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(3000, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_First_Blood takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_First_Blood=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_First_Blood, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_First_Blood, Condition(function Trig_First_Blood_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_First_Blood, function Trig_First_Blood_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Daily Income
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Daily_Income_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4648")
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4649")
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(5000, Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Daily_Income takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Daily_Income=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterGameStateEventTimeOfDay(gg_trg_Daily_Income, GREATER_THAN, 9.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Daily_Income, function Trig_Daily_Income_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Attempt At Beating Elite 7
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + ( GetUnitName(GetTriggerUnit()) + " IS TRYING TO BEAT THE ELITE 7." ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7, gg_rct_Region_250)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7, function Trig_Attempt_At_Beating_Elite_7_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CC Switch
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Switch_Score == 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(ConvertedPlayer(S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 5, 6)))) == PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_PLAYING ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(ConvertedPlayer(S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 5, 6))), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Switch_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Switch_IsInCooldown == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Switch_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 3) == "-sw" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Switch_Func026C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-sw" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Switch_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CC_Switch_Func025C() ) then
        if ( Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_CC_Switch_Func025Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_Switch_IsInCooldown=true
                    set udg_Switch_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    set udg_Switch_Player=ConvertedPlayer(S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 5, 6)))
                    set udg_Switch_Score=0
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Create Messages
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "A voteswitch against [" + ( ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)] + GetPlayerName(udg_Switch_Player) ) + ( "|r] was initiated by [" + ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r]." ) ) ) ) ))
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "[reason = \"|c00FFFF00" + ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 40) + "|r\"] You have 10 seconds to think about it.." ) ))
                    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Create Dialog
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call DialogClearBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog)
                    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog, ( "Switch" + ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)] + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Switch_Player) + ( "|r [\"|c00FFFFFF" + ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 40) + "|r\"]?" ) ) ) ) ))
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4543")
                    set udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[0]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4549")
                    set udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[1]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4654")
                    set udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[2]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Switch_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4700")
                    set udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[3]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Show Dialog
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
                    loop
                        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_Switch_Dialog, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()))
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                    endloop
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Voting Time
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Switch_Player)
                    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
                    set udg_Switch_IsInCooldown=false
                    call TriggerSleepAction(90.00)
                    set udg_Switch_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4709")
                else
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4405")
                endif
            else
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4715")
            endif
        else
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4394")
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CC_Switch_Func026C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4719")
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4727")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CC_Switch takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CC_Switch=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(0), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(1), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(2), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(3), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(4), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(5), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(6), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(7), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(8), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(9), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(10), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(11), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(12), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(13), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(14), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(15), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(16), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(17), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(18), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(19), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(20), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(21), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(22), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Switch, Player(23), "-", false)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CC_Switch, function Trig_CC_Switch_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Switch Dialog
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[0] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Switch_Dialog_Buttons[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func001C() ) then
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_Switch_Dialog, GetTriggerPlayer())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r voted for Yes!" ) ))
        set udg_Switch_Score=( udg_Switch_Score + 1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func003C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r voted for No!" ) ))
        set udg_Switch_Score=( udg_Switch_Score - 1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Switch_Dialog_Func004C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r does not care.." ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Switch_Dialog takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Switch_Dialog=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Switch_Dialog, udg_Switch_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Switch_Dialog, function Trig_Switch_Dialog_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Switch Player
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Team1Base, udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(gg_rct_Team2Base, udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)]) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(udg_Switch_Player, udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Switch_PlayersNewForce) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(udg_Switch_Player, GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_ALLIED_VISION)
    else
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(udg_Switch_Player, GetEnumPlayer(), bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_n023_0233), udg_Switch_PlayersNewForce) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_n023_0261), udg_Switch_PlayersNewForce) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Switch_Score > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Switch_Player_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_Switch_Dialog, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()))
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002C() ) then
        if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001C() ) then
            call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_Switch_Player, udg_Team1)
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Switch_Player, udg_Team2)
            set udg_Switch_PlayersNewForce=udg_Team2
            if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001Func005C() ) then
                call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)], udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
            else
            endif
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
        else
            call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_Switch_Player, udg_Team2)
            call ForceAddPlayerSimple(udg_Switch_Player, udg_Team1)
            set udg_Switch_PlayersNewForce=udg_Team1
            if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func001Func011C() ) then
                call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)], udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
            else
            endif
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_NEUTRAL)
            call SetPlayerAllianceStateBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_EXTRA), udg_Switch_Player, bj_ALLIANCE_UNALLIED)
        endif
        call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func002A)
        if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func003C() ) then
            set udg_GameEvent_FC_Player=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_Team1)
            set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0233
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner)
        else
        endif
        if ( Trig_Switch_Player_Func002Func004C() ) then
            set udg_GameEvent_FC_Player=ForcePickRandomPlayer(udg_Team2)
            set udg_GameEvent_FC_Fountain=gg_unit_n023_0261
            call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Change_Fountain_Owner)
        else
        endif
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Switch_Player)] + GetPlayerName(udg_Switch_Player) ) + "|r was switched" ))
        set udg_Switch_Score=100
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Set_Up_Leaderboard)
        call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Switch_Player takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Switch_Player=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Switch_Player, function Trig_Switch_Player_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: CC Kick
//===========================================================================
function Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Votekick_Score == 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetPlayerSlotState(ConvertedPlayer(S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 5, 6)))) != PLAYER_SLOT_STATE_EMPTY ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Votekick_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Votekick_IsInCooldown == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Kick_Func025C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 1, 3) == "-vk" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Kick_Func026C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetEventPlayerChatString() == "-vk" ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_CC_Kick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_CC_Kick_Func025C() ) then
        if ( Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001C() ) then
            if ( Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001Func003C() ) then
                if ( Trig_CC_Kick_Func025Func001Func003Func001C() ) then
                    set udg_Votekick_IsInCooldown=true
                    set udg_Votekick_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
                    set udg_Votekick_Player=ConvertedPlayer(S2I(SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 5, 6)))
                    set udg_Votekick_Score=0
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Create Messages
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "A votekick against [" + ( ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Votekick_Player)] + GetPlayerName(udg_Votekick_Player) ) + ( "|r] was initiated by [" + ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r]." ) ) ) ) ))
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 20.00, ( "[reason = \"|c00FFFF00" + ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 40) + "|r\"] You have 10 seconds to think about it.." ) ))
                    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Create Dialog
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call DialogClearBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog)
                    call DialogSetMessageBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog, ( "Kick " + ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Votekick_Player)] + ( GetPlayerName(udg_Votekick_Player) + ( "|r [\"|c00FFFFFF" + ( SubStringBJ(GetEventPlayerChatString(), 8, 40) + "|r\"]?" ) ) ) ) ))
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4208")
                    set udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[0]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4209")
                    set udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[1]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4210")
                    set udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[2]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    call DialogAddButtonBJ(udg_Votekick_Dialog, "TRIGSTR_4213")
                    set udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[3]=GetLastCreatedButtonBJ()
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Show Dialog
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
                    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
                    loop
                        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
                        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_Votekick_Dialog, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()))
                        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
                    endloop
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    // Voting Time
                    // ----------------------------------------------
                    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
                    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Votekick_Kick)
                    call TriggerSleepAction(30.00)
                    set udg_Votekick_IsInCooldown=false
                    call TriggerSleepAction(90.00)
                    set udg_Votekick_IsPlayerInCooldown[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4214")
                else
                    call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4207")
                endif
            else
                call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4215")
            endif
        else
            call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4206")
        endif
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_CC_Kick_Func026C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4216")
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetForceOfPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer()), 10.00, "TRIGSTR_4238")
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_CC_Kick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_CC_Kick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(0), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(1), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(2), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(3), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(4), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(5), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(6), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(7), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(8), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(9), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(10), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(11), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(12), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(13), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(14), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(15), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(16), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(17), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(18), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(19), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(20), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(21), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(22), "-", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_CC_Kick, Player(23), "-", false)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_CC_Kick, function Trig_CC_Kick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Votekick Dialog
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[0] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetClickedButtonBJ() == udg_Votekick_Dialog_Buttons[3] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func001C() ) then
        call DialogDisplayBJ(true, udg_Votekick_Dialog, GetTriggerPlayer())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r voted for Yes!" ) ))
        set udg_Votekick_Score=( udg_Votekick_Score + 1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func003C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r voted for No!" ) ))
        set udg_Votekick_Score=( udg_Votekick_Score - 1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Func004C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] + ( GetPlayerName(GetTriggerPlayer()) + "|r does not care.." ) ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Votekick_Dialog takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Votekick_Dialog=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterDialogEventBJ(gg_trg_Votekick_Dialog, udg_Votekick_Dialog)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Votekick_Dialog, function Trig_Votekick_Dialog_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Votekick Kick
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Votekick_Kick_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Votekick_Score > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Votekick_Kick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=24
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        call DialogDisplayBJ(false, udg_Votekick_Dialog, ConvertedPlayer(GetForLoopIndexA()))
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Votekick_Kick_Func002C() ) then
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, ( ( udg_ColorStrings[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Votekick_Player)] + GetPlayerName(udg_Votekick_Player) ) + "|r was kicked!" ))
        call CustomDefeatBJ(udg_Votekick_Player, "TRIGSTR_4205")
        set udg_Votekick_Score=100
    else
        call DisplayTimedTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), 15.00, "TRIGSTR_4204")
        set udg_Votekick_Score=100
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Votekick_Kick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Votekick_Kick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Votekick_Kick, function Trig_Votekick_Kick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Command Zoom
//
// Events are initialized in initialization > Players > Initialize Players
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Command_Zoom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraFieldForPlayer(GetTriggerPlayer(), CAMERA_FIELD_TARGET_DISTANCE, 3000.00, 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Command_Zoom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Command_Zoom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Command_Zoom, function Trig_Command_Zoom_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Command Repick
//
// Merged 2 triggers, cleaned up group leak.and location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Command_Repick_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Commands_HasPlayerRepicked[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Func003Func001A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), true, GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()))
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER), function Trig_Command_Repick_Func003Func001A)
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode == udg_GameMode_AllRandom ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode == udg_GameMode_AllPick ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Command_Repick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Commands_HasPlayerRepicked[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=true
    set udg_Commands_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetTriggerPlayer(), Condition(function Trig_Command_Repick_Func002002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Commands_Temp_Group, function Trig_Command_Repick_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Commands_Temp_Group)
    if ( Trig_Command_Repick_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Player_Chooser=GetTriggerPlayer()
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Random_Hero)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Command_Repick_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())]=false
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Command_Repick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Command_Repick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Command_Repick, Condition(function Trig_Command_Repick_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Command_Repick, function Trig_Command_Repick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn Off Repick
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_Off_Repick_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Command_Repick)
    call DestroyTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_Off_Repick takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_Off_Repick=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Turn_Off_Repick, 180.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Turn_Off_Repick, function Trig_Turn_Off_Repick_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Untitled Trigger 003
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_003_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetKillingUnitBJ(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_003_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Untitled_Trigger_003_Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetKillingUnitBJ(), 100)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Untitled_Trigger_003 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(0), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(1), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(2), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(3), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(4), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(5), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(6), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(7), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(8), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(9), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(10), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, Player(11), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_003, function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_003_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deathwing Generic AOE
//===========================================================================

function Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - bosses_DW_damage ))
    endif
endfunction

function Deathwing_Yeets_Damage_Bombs takes location targetPoint,string sfxPath,real radius,real damage,real waitAmount returns nothing
 local group targetGroup= GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(radius, targetPoint)
    call DestroyEffect(AddSpecialEffectLoc(sfxPath, targetPoint))
    call TriggerSleepAction(waitAmount)
	set bosses_DW_damage=damage
    call ForGroupBJ(targetGroup, function Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(targetGroup)
endfunction

function Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
	call Deathwing_Yeets_Damage_Bombs(udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point , udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_SFX_Path , udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Radius , udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Damage , udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Wait)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE, function Trig_Deathwing_Generic_AOE_Actions)
endfunction


//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deathwing Portal
//
// A really stupid way of checking stuff, but whatever.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetTriggerUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( DistanceBetweenPoints(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, udg_Portal_End_Game_Right) <= 500.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect temp
    if ( Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Func002C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Portal_End_Game_Right, "war3mapImported\\Void Disc.mdx")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Portal_End_Game_Right)
    else
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Portal_End_Game_Left, "war3mapImported\\Void Disc.mdx")
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Portal_End_Game_Left)
    endif
    set temp=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_019, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_SFX=temp
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_SFX)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Deathwing_Portal takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal, gg_rct_endgame_portal_left)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal, gg_rct_endgame_portal_right)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal, Condition(function Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Deathwing_Portal, function Trig_Deathwing_Portal_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deathwing Fire Balls Rain1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Damage=1000000.00
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Radius=200.00
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_SFX_Path="war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx"
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Wait=0.50
    // ---------
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_1
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_2
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_3
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_4
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_5
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_6
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_7
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_8
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer > 3
        set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Shadow_Minion_Point[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer]
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1, 3.28)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1, function Trig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Rain1_Actions)
endfunction

    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_17
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_18
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_19
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_20
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_21
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Line_22

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deathwing Fire Balls Circle3
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Circle3_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Damage=1000000.00
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Radius=200.00
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_SFX_Path="war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx"
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Wait=0.50
    // ---------
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_13
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_14
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_15
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_16
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_17
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Point=udg_Bosses_DW_Circle_18
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Deathwing_Generic_AOE)
endfunction

    set udg_Bosses_DW_AOE_Damage=1000000.00

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Deathwing Fire Balls Ultimate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_1, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_2, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_3, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_4, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_5, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_6, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_7, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Fire_8, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer > 3
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Shadow_Minion_Point[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer], "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_1, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_3, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_4, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_2, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_5, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_6, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_7, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_8, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_9, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_10, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_11, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_12, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_13, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_14, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_DW_Line_15, "war3mapImported\\Cannonball D Rain.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
