//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate, Player(0), "1", true)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate, function Trig_Deathwing_Fire_Balls_Ultimate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Fight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Func159002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_firenova2))
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_1
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_2
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_3
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_4
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_5
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_6
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_7
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_8
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_9
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_10
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_11
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_12
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_13
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_14
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_1
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_2
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_3
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_4
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_5
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_6
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_7
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_8
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_9
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_10
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_11
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_12
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_13
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_14
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_Rain_of_Fire
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\HellFire.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Armageddon=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire)
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Armageddon)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor1
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor2
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor3
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor4
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor5
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor6
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor7
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor8
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor9
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor10
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor11
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor12
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor13
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor14
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor15
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor16
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_meteor17
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Meteors)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region=gg_rct_Rain_of_Fire
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\HellFire.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Armageddon=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire)
    call TriggerSleepAction(7.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Armageddon)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectOfPlayer(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Func159002)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Fight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Fight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon_Fight, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Armageddon_Fight, Condition(function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Fight, function Trig_Armageddon_Fight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Projectile
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Projectile_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Projectile_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fire_Projectile_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 1000000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Projectile_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Rain of Fire III.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(220.00, GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Fire_Projectile_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Projectile takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Projectile=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Projectile, function Trig_Fire_Projectile_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rain of Fire
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( RectContainsUnit(GetPlayableMapRect(), udg_GameEvent_Armageddon_Summoner) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 500000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Rain_of_Fire)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rain_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rain_of_Fire, function Trig_Rain_of_Fire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Nova spam
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func009Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func014Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func019Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Nova_1, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Fire_Nova_1)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Nova_2, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Fire_Nova_2)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Nova_3, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Fire_Nova_3)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Fire_Nova_4, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Fire_Nova_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Func019A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Nova_spam takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Nova_spam, function Trig_Dark_Nova_spam_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Meteors
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Meteors_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Meteors_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Meteors_Func009Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 1000000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Meteors_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\MagicCircle_Demon.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\MeteorStrike.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Armageddon_Region))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Meteors_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Meteors=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Meteors, function Trig_Meteors_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Summonned
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Summonned_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Fight)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Summonned=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Summonned, function Trig_Summonned_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Giving Flame Aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0C1', GetEnumUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\s_RunningFlame Aura.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Armageddon_2=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
endfunction

function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0C1', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'U00K')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Func003A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    set udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'U00K')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group, function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Func007A)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Armageddon_2)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Armageddon_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Giving_Flame_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Giving_Flame_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Giving_Flame_Aura, 21.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Giving_Flame_Aura, function Trig_Giving_Flame_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Attacked with Flame aura
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00J') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Func001C() ) then
        call KillUnit(GetAttacker())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Attacked_with_Flame_aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Attacked_with_Flame_aura, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Attacked_with_Flame_aura, Condition(function Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Attacked_with_Flame_aura, function Trig_Attacked_with_Flame_aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Heal Armageddon
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002Func001001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'U00K' )
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002Func001002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100)
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Armageddon_Players_Group) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Armageddon_Players_Group=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Armageddon_invincible, Condition(function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func001002002))
    if ( Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Armageddon_invincible, Condition(function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002Func001001002)), function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Func002Func001002)
    else
    endif
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Armageddon_Heal_Timer, false, 10.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Heal_Armageddon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Heal_Armageddon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Heal_Armageddon, udg_Armageddon_Heal_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Heal_Armageddon, function Trig_Heal_Armageddon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 1 spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 2, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_One)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Nalc', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Boss_1[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Func005A)
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_Two)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Nalc', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Boss_1[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Func009A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_1[2])
    call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_1[1])
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_1_spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_1_spawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Boss_1_spawn, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_1_spawn, function Trig_Boss_1_spawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 2 spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Boss_1[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func002Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 3, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Boss_1[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_One)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Nngs', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_2[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func001Func006A)
        call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_2[1])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_Two)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Nngs', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_2[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Func002Func006A)
        call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_2[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Boss_2_spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Boss_2_spawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Boss_2_spawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Boss_2_spawn, function Trig_Boss_2_spawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Boss 3 spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Boss_2[1] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func002Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 7, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Boss_2[2] ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func001C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_One)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Ntin', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_3[1]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func001Func006A)
        call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_3[1])
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func002C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
        set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Devils_Army_Two)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Ntin', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_3[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Boss_3_spawn_Func002Func006A)
        call SuspendHeroXPBJ(false, udg_Boss_3[2])
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Earth Lord
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Earth_Lord_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E00A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earth_Lord_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I073', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call TriggerSleepAction(180.00)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'E00A', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Earth_lord_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 1000, false)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04L', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03Y', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04C', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03T', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('k3m1', GetLastCreatedUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Earth_Lord takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Earth_Lord=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Earth_Lord, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Earth_Lord, Condition(function Trig_Earth_Lord_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Earth_Lord, function Trig_Earth_Lord_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malthael Summon
//
// Fixed location leaks
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'sneg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Malthael_full_area)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateFogModifierRectBJ(true, GetEnumPlayer(), FOG_OF_WAR_VISIBLE, gg_rct_Malthael_full_area)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Malthael, GetEnumPlayer(), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Malthael_IsSummoned == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001C() ) then
        call QuestMessageBJ(GetPlayersAll(), bj_QUESTMESSAGE_WARNING, "TRIGSTR_9371")
        call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func002A)
        call ForForce(udg_Team2, function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func003A)
        call SetTimeOfDay(0.00)
        call UseTimeOfDayBJ(false)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func006001002)), function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Func001Func006A)
        set udg_Malthael_IsSummoned=true
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z1)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[16]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z2)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[17]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z3)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[18]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z4)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[19]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z5)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[23]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z6)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[24]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z7)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[25]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Z8)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[26]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Malthael_spawn)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Hpal', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        set udg_Boss_Minions[20]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        // --------------
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04Z', udg_Boss_Minions[20])
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I056', udg_Boss_Minions[20])
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('k3m1', udg_Boss_Minions[20])
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('glsk', udg_Boss_Minions[20])
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04K', udg_Boss_Minions[20])
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Boss_Minions[20], 15000, false)
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Malthael_fight)
        call StartTimerBJ(udg_Malthael_Spells_Timer, false, 27.00)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malthael_Summon takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malthael_Summon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Malthael_Summon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Malthael_Summon, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malthael_Summon, function Trig_Malthael_Summon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malthael Zombie Damage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malthael_Zombie_Damage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'u00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Zombie_Damage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 70000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 70000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 70000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 70000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 70000.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malthael_Zombie_Damage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malthael_Zombie_Damage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Malthael_Zombie_Damage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Malthael_Zombie_Damage, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_Zombie_Damage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malthael_Zombie_Damage, function Trig_Malthael_Zombie_Damage_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Totems spawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Totems_spawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_spawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_1, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_3, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_4, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Totems_spawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Totems_spawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Totems_spawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Totems_spawn, Condition(function Trig_Totems_spawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Totems_spawn, function Trig_Totems_spawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_die_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Totems=( udg_Totems + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Totems_die=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Totems_die, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Totems_die, Condition(function Trig_Totems_die_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Totems_die, function Trig_Totems_die_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Totems respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Totems_respawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o017' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 75.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Totems == 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 50.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Totems == 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 25.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Totems == 12 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 0.01)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func003001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("overhead", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func006001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func006002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 100.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func007001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Center)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func008001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func008002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(GetEnumUnit(), false)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func010001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func010002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Center)
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Totems == 16 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Totems_respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_1, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_3, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_4, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func006001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func006002)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func007001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func003Func007002)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_1, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_3, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_4, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004Func006001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func004Func006002)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005C() ) then
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_1, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_3, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o017', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Malthael_Totem_4, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func006001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func006002)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func007001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func005Func007002)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Malthael_fight)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func002001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func002002)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func003001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func003002)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func006001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func006002)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func007001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func007002)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func008001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func008002)
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func010001002)), function Trig_Totems_respawn_Func006Func010002)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Totems_respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Totems_respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Totems_respawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Totems_respawn, Condition(function Trig_Totems_respawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Totems_respawn, function Trig_Totems_respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malthael fight
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func002001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Throne_1)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func047001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func047002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Throne_2)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func065Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func065A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_fight_Func065Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func068Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func068A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_fight_Func068Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func071Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func071A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_fight_Func071Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func074Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func074A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_fight_Func074Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func077Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func077A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_fight_Func077Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func080001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func080002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Throne_3)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func083001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) == 'Hpal' )
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func083002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Malthael_Throne_2)
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func087A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetEnumUnit(), "war3mapImported\\GreenPentagram.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Malthael_1=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_fight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func002001002)), function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func002002)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z1
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z2
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z3
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z4
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z5
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z6
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z7
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z8
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z9
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z10
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z11
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z12
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z13
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.25)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Z14
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_StormFall)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Poison_Nova)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func047001002)), function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func047002)
    set udg_Boss_Malthael_Region=gg_rct_Malthael_spawn
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Void_Vortex_1, "war3mapImported\\Void Rift II Purple.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Malthael_1=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Void_Vortex_2, "war3mapImported\\Void Rift II Purple.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Malthael_2=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Void_Vortex_3, "war3mapImported\\Void Rift II Purple.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Malthael_3=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Void_Vortex_4, "war3mapImported\\Void Rift II Purple.mdx")
    set udg_SFX_Malthael_4=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Void_Rift)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Void_Rift)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Malthael_1)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Malthael_2)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Malthael_3)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Malthael_4)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_1)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func065A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_2)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func068A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_3)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func071A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func074A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_5)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func077A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func080001002)), function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func080002)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_zombies)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Malthael_full_area, Condition(function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func083001002)), function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func083002)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_zombies)
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerAndTypeId(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), 'Hpal')
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Func087A)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_StormFall_All)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SFX_Malthael_1)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_StormFall_All)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Malthael_Spells_Timer, false, 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malthael_fight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malthael_fight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Malthael_fight, udg_Malthael_Spells_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malthael_fight, function Trig_Malthael_fight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Poison Nova
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Poison_Nova_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Poison_Nova_Func009Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func014Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_Poison_Nova_Func014Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func019Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func019A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Poison_Nova_Func019Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) * 0.50 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Poison_Nova_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Poison_Nova_1, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Poison_Nova_1)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func004A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Poison_Nova_2, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Poison_Nova_2)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Poison_Nova_3, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Poison_Nova_3)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Poison_Nova_4, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(600.00, udg_Poison_Nova_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Poison_Nova_Func019A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Poison_Nova takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Poison_Nova=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Poison_Nova)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Poison_Nova, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Poison_Nova, function Trig_Poison_Nova_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: StormFall
//===========================================================================
function Trig_StormFall_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StormFall_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_StormFall_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 1500000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_StormFall_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Malthael_Region)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Stormfall.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, GetRectCenter(udg_Boss_Malthael_Region))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Malthael_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_StormFall_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_StormFall takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_StormFall=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_StormFall, function Trig_StormFall_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: StormFall All
//===========================================================================
function Trig_StormFall_All_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_StormFall_All_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_StormFall_All_Func003Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Malthael_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Stormfall.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 750000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_StormFall_All_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(1000.00, udg_Malthael_Center)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_StormFall_All_Func003A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Malthael_Temp_Position)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_StormFall_All takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_StormFall_All=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_StormFall_All)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_StormFall_All, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_StormFall_All, function Trig_StormFall_All_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

function Trig_Void_Rift_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rift_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Void_Rift_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Void_Vortex_1)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rift_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif

    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then

        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Void_Vortex_4)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
