    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rift_Func014A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Void_Rift_Func014Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Void_Vortex_5)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Rift_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_1)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group, function Trig_Void_Rift_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_2)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2, function Trig_Void_Rift_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_2)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_3)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3, function Trig_Void_Rift_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_3)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_4)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4, function Trig_Void_Rift_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_4)
    set udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Void_Vortex_5)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5, function Trig_Void_Rift_Func014A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Malthael_Temp_Group_5)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Rift takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Rift=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Void_Rift)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Void_Rift, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Rift, function Trig_Void_Rift_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn zombies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func002Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_Malthael_Center)
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func003Func003002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_Malthael_Center)
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 70 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func004Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(GetEnumUnit(), "move", udg_Malthael_Center)
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 69 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 31 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Zombie_Spawn_1, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func002Func003002)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Zombie_Spawn_2, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func003Func003002)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Zombie_Spawn_3, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Func004Func004002)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_zombies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_zombies=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Spawn_zombies)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_zombies, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_zombies, function Trig_Spawn_zombies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Malthael Beaten
//
// Merged 3 triggers, removed a variable. Fixed Malthael unit-type condition.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'u00P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'Hpal' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Malthael_ZombiesKilled >= 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Malthael_IsSummoned == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Malthael_ZombiesKilled=( udg_Malthael_ZombiesKilled + 1 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Malthael_IsSummoned=false
        set udg_Totems=0
        call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Malthael_fight)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Malthael_ZombiesKilled=0
        call UseTimeOfDayBJ(true)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Malthael_Beaten takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Malthael_Beaten=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Malthael_Beaten, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Malthael_Beaten, function Trig_Malthael_Beaten_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: BurstFireLord Attacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'N047' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\Demon\\RainOfFire\\RainOfFireTarget.mdl")
        set udg_BurstFireLord_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 8000.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_BurstFireLord_Attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_BurstFireLord_Attacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_BurstFireLord_Attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_BurstFireLord_Attacked, Condition(function Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_BurstFireLord_Attacked, function Trig_BurstFireLord_Attacked_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sea Cyclop Attacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h025' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Func002C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\Water Pillar.mdx")
        set udg_SeaCyclop_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 2000.00 ))
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 2000.00 ))
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 2000.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_SeaCyclop_SFX)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked, Condition(function Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked, function Trig_Sea_Cyclop_Attacked_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Entry
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Entry_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Entry_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_thunder_norm_1)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_boss_2_entrance)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_006, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_thunder_norm_2)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Entry takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Entry=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Crypt_Entry, gg_rct_portal_to_the_crypt)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Crypt_Entry, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Entry_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Entry, function Trig_Crypt_Entry_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crypt Exit
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crypt_Exit_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crypt_Exit_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Return_To_Ring)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Return_To_Ring))
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_005, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crypt_Exit takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crypt_Exit=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Crypt_Exit, gg_rct_boss2_exit)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Crypt_Exit, Condition(function Trig_Crypt_Exit_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crypt_Exit, function Trig_Crypt_Exit_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Fight
//
// Cleaned up location leaks, SFX leak.
// Insanity Disabled, will come back to this.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Fight_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Fight_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Void_Pilar)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Thunder_Global)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Thunder_Global)
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Thunder_Global)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Thunder_Global)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Fight takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Fight=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Death_Fight, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Death_Fight, Condition(function Trig_Death_Fight_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Fight, function Trig_Death_Fight_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starfall
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starfall_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Starfall_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallCaster.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        set udg_Death_SFX[0]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Death_SFX[0])
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallTarget.mdl")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        set udg_Death_SFX[0]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 200000.00 ))
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 400000.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Death_SFX[0])
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starfall takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starfall=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Starfall, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Starfall, Condition(function Trig_Starfall_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starfall, function Trig_Starfall_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Void Pilar
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Void_Pilar_Func004Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Pilar_Func004Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Void_Pilar_Func004Func003Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 300000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Void_Pilar_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer > 9
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Death_SFX_Pos[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer], "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Starfall\\StarfallCaster.mdl")
        set udg_Death_SFX[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer > 9
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(udg_Bosses_Death_DummyUnits[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer])
        set udg_TheDeath_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(240.00, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_TheDeath_Temp_Group, function Trig_Void_Pilar_Func004Func003A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_TheDeath_Temp_Group)
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Death_SFX[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer])
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Death_SFX_Pos[udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer], "war3mapImported\\ShadowAssault.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer=udg_Bosses_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Void_Pilar takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Void_Pilar=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Void_Pilar)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Void_Pilar, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Void_Pilar, function Trig_Void_Pilar_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thunder single target
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thunder_single_target_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_single_target_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 95 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_single_target_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Thunder_single_target_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 200000.00 ))
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 400000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Thunder_single_target, Condition(function Trig_Thunder_single_target_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Thunder_single_target, function Trig_Thunder_single_target_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thunder Global
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thunder_Global_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) != 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Global_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Thunder_Global_Func002Func001C() ) then
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit()), "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) - 100000.00 ))
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Global_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_TheDeath_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_R__gion_426)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_TheDeath_Temp_Group, function Trig_Thunder_Global_Func002A)
endfunction

    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Thunder_Global, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Thunder_Global, function Trig_Thunder_Global_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Death
//
// Fixed Location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n05G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Death_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Death_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('sneg', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Thunder_Global)
    if ( Trig_Death_Death_Func005C() ) then
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Death_Respawn_Timer, false, 300.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Death_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Death_Death, Condition(function Trig_Death_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Death, function Trig_Death_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Death Respawn
//
// Fixed location leaks
// Changed respawn to work for a timer, not every 300 game-time seconds
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Death_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    // -------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_portal_to_the_crypt)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "Abilities\\Spells\\Other\\Monsoon\\MonsoonBoltTarget.mdl")
    set udg_Death_SFX[10]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    // -------------------
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Death_SFX[10])
    // -------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P1)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o015', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Boss_Minions[3]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // -------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P2)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o015', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Boss_Minions[4]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // -------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P3)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o015', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Boss_Minions[5]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // -------------------
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_P4)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'o015', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Boss_Minions[6]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // -------------------
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_demoniclaugh)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_boss_2_entrance)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n05G', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    set udg_Boss_Minions[2]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    // -------------------
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Death_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Death_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Death_Respawn, udg_Death_Respawn_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Death_Respawn, function Trig_Death_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pyramidhead Attacked
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Func001C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, "war3mapImported\\Stormfall Void.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        set udg_Pyramidhead_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetAttacker(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetAttacker()) - 200000.00 ))
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 200000.00 ))
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Pyramidhead_SFX)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pyramidhead_Attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Attacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Attacked, Condition(function Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Attacked, function Trig_Pyramidhead_Attacked_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pyramidhead Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pyramidhead_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'o015' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pyramidhead_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_pyramiddie)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pyramidhead_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Death, Condition(function Trig_Pyramidhead_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pyramidhead_Death, function Trig_Pyramidhead_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Idlow Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'E00B' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateItemLoc('I04A', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call TriggerSleepAction(350.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'E00B', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_Idlow_Respawn_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 355, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I036', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03I', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02W', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I059', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Idlow_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Idlow_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Idlow_Respawn, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Idlow_Respawn, Condition(function Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Idlow_Respawn, function Trig_Idlow_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Respawn_Ulquiorra=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Respawn_Ulquiorra, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Respawn_Ulquiorra, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Ulquiorra_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Ulquiorra, function Trig_Respawn_Ulquiorra_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn The Destructor
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'U00J' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call CreateItemLoc('I025', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call TriggerSleepAction(350.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'U00J', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Bosses_TD_Respawn_Point, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 300, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I05A', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I033', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I032', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02U', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_The_Destructor takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_The_Destructor=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Respawn_The_Destructor, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Respawn_The_Destructor, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_The_Destructor, function Trig_Respawn_The_Destructor_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Icy Illidan
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Icy_Illidan_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Icy_Illidan_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetTriggerUnit()) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Icy_Illidan_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Icy_Illidan_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
        call TriggerSleepAction(350.00)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H01P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Icy_Illidan_Respawn, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), 350, false)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I050', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04S', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04C', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I055', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04Q', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lunatra Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lunatra_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I06V', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_044)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_U00L_0446, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lunatra_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lunatra_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Lunatra_Dies, gg_unit_U00L_0446, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lunatra_Dies, function Trig_Lunatra_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Eclipse Elemental Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(360.00)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_H01W_0476, udg_Map_Center_StartPoint, true)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies, gg_unit_H01W_0476, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies, function Trig_Eclipse_Elemental_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Satan Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Satan_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_2716")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_R__gion_356)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_UC18_0193, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Satan_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Satan_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Satan_Move, 150.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Satan_Move, function Trig_Satan_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Satan Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Satan_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_UC18_0193) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(gg_unit_UC18_0193, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Satan_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(8, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call TriggerSleepAction(180.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_R__gion_356)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_UC18_0193, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Satan_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Satan_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Satan_Dies, gg_unit_UC18_0193, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Satan_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Satan_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Satan_Dies, function Trig_Satan_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: God Dies Copy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_God_Dies_Copy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_UC95_0190) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(gg_unit_UC95_0190, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_God_Dies_Copy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(8, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_God_Watching)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_UC95_0190, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_UC95_0190, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_God_Suck)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_God_Dies_Copy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_God_Dies_Copy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_God_Dies_Copy, gg_unit_UC95_0190, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_God_Dies_Copy, Condition(function Trig_God_Dies_Copy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_God_Dies_Copy, function Trig_God_Dies_Copy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: God Suck
//
// At around this point I just gave up on these comments.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_God_Suck_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_IsGamePaused == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_God_Suck_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_R__gion_355)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2=GetUnitLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_UC95_0190, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), true)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_3499")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_R__gion_355)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_UC95_0190, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_God_Suck takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_God_Suck=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(0), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(1), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(2), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(3), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(4), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(5), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(6), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(7), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(8), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(9), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(10), "god", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Suck, Player(11), "god", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_God_Suck, Condition(function Trig_God_Suck_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_God_Suck, function Trig_God_Suck_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: God Move
//===========================================================================
function Trig_God_Move_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(gg_unit_UC95_0190, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_God_Move_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_UC95_0190, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_God_Watching)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_UC95_0190, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_God_Suck)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_God_Move takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_God_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(0), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(1), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(2), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(3), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(4), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(5), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(6), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(7), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(8), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(9), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(10), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_God_Move, Player(11), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_God_Move, Condition(function Trig_God_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_God_Move, function Trig_God_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alucard Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alucard_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitDeadBJ(gg_unit_H00I_0192) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitAlly(gg_unit_H00I_0192, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alucard_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemExBJ(8, ITEM_TYPE_ANY), udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Lucifer_Watching)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_H00I_0192, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_H00I_0192, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), true)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alucard_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alucard_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Dies, gg_unit_H00I_0192, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alucard_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Alucard_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alucard_Dies, function Trig_Alucard_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alucard Suck
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alucard_Suck_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_IsGamePaused == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alucard_Suck_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StopMusicBJ(true)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2=GetUnitLoc(udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetTriggerPlayer())])
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingLocBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location2)
    call SetUnitOwner(gg_unit_H00I_0192, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), true)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_511")
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(gg_unit_H00I_0192, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck)
    call PlayMusicBJ(gg_snd_NightElf1)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alucard_Suck takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alucard_Suck=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(0), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(1), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(2), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(3), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(4), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(5), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(6), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(7), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(8), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(9), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(10), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Player(11), "There's no evil", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, Condition(function Trig_Alucard_Suck_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck, function Trig_Alucard_Suck_Actions)
endfunction

    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Suck)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Alucard_Move=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(0), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(1), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(2), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(3), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(4), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(5), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(6), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(7), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(8), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(9), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(10), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerChatEvent(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Player(11), "go to hell", false)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, Condition(function Trig_Alucard_Move_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alucard_Move, function Trig_Alucard_Move_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Alucard Patrol
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Alucard_Patrol_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetPlayerController(GetOwningPlayer(gg_unit_H00I_0192)) == GetPlayerController(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Alucard_Patrol_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Lucifer_Point_1)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H00I_0192, "attack", udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Lucifer_Point_2)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(gg_unit_H00I_0192, "attack", udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Alucard_Patrol takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol, 120.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol, Condition(function Trig_Alucard_Patrol_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Alucard_Patrol, function Trig_Alucard_Patrol_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Angel Red
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Angel_Red_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_UtherTaunt2)
    call SetUnitLifePercentBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100)
    call SetUnitManaPercentBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 100)
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Angel_Spawn_One)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_EC00_0225, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

endfunction
