function Trig_Muse_Black_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Guard_Spawn_Three)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_HC11_0215, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Muse_Black takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Muse_Black=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Muse_Black, gg_unit_HC11_0215, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Muse_Black, function Trig_Muse_Black_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Muse Blue
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Muse_Blue_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(120.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Guard_Spawn_Four)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_HC10_0216, udg_Mob_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Muse_Blue takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Muse_Blue=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Muse_Blue, gg_unit_HC10_0216, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Muse_Blue, function Trig_Muse_Blue_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lord of the Arena Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death_Func004002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies)
    call TriggerSleepAction(360.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death_Func004002)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_H000_0501, udg_Transports_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "|c00646464" + GetHeroProperName(gg_unit_H000_0501) ) + ( "|r|c00646464:|r It's time for revenge!" ) ))
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death, gg_unit_H000_0501, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death, function Trig_Lord_of_the_Arena_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lord of The Arena Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies_Func009002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, 1.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemBJ(8), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemBJ(8), udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call TriggerSleepAction(360.00)
    set udg_Bosses_Temp_Location=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies_Func009002)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_H000_0501, udg_Bosses_Temp_Location, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Bosses_Temp_Location)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "|c00646464" + GetHeroProperName(gg_unit_H000_0501) ) + ( "|r|c00646464:|r I'm back for revenge!" ) ))
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_O05Cenarius27)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies)
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies, gg_unit_H000_0501, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies, function Trig_Lord_of_The_Arena_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Casting
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Casting_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A030' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Casting_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A030', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Casting_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A030', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Casting_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A030', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Casting_Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Casting_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Casting_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( Trig_Casting_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    if ( Trig_Casting_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h00V', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h013', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call GroupAddGroup(GetLastCreatedGroup(), udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
        call DoNothing()
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call TriggerSleepAction(60.00)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Army_Sheep_Group, function Trig_Casting_Func007002)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Army_Sheep_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Casting takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Casting=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Casting, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Casting, Condition(function Trig_Casting_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Casting, function Trig_Casting_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Earth Shattering New Instance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0ID' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position2=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_DPP=( 0.50 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, true)) )
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_DPP=( udg_Spell_EarthShattering_DPP * 0.20 )
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Damage=( 10000.00 + ( ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0ID', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit)) ) ) * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, true)) ) )
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Duration=4.00
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Period=0.20
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Radius=300.00
    set udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Range=700.00
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
    call s__EarthShattering_create(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Damage , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_DPP , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Period , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Duration , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Radius , udg_Spell_EarthShattering_Range , udg_Spells_Temp_Real)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance, Condition(function Trig_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance, function Trig_Earth_Shattering_New_Instance_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Homing Magic New Instance
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Homing_Magic_New_Instance_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0IG' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Homing_Magic_New_Instance_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit2=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_DPLAJ=0.05
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpAmount=GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IG', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit)
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpRange=500.00
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpDelay=0.35
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Damage=( ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IG', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit)) ) ) * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, true)) )
    // Time to roll for what color is this bad boy going to be!
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 8)
    if udg_Global_RandomChance == 1 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="BLNL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 2 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="RENL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 3 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="YENL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 4 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="GRNL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 5 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="FINL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 6 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="MYNL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 7 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="SPNL"
    elseif udg_Global_RandomChance == 8 then
    set udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning="WHNL"
    endif
    // And lasty, start the spell!
    call s__HomingMagic_create(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit , udg_Spells_Temp_Unit2 , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Damage , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_DPLAJ , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpRange , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpAmount , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_JumpDelay , udg_Spell_HomingMagic_Lightning)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Homing_Magic_New_Instance takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Homing_Magic_New_Instance=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Homing_Magic_New_Instance, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Homing_Magic_New_Instance, Condition(function Trig_Homing_Magic_New_Instance_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Homing_Magic_New_Instance, function Trig_Homing_Magic_New_Instance_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0IE' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_FS_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0I9', udg_Spells_Temp_FS_Caster)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Spell_Frost_Shiver_Timer, false, 15.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cast, function Trig_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0I9', udg_Spells_Temp_FS_Caster)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Remove_effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Remove_effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Remove_effect, udg_Spell_Frost_Shiver_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Remove_effect, function Trig_Remove_effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Never Die
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Never_Die_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H01P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Never_Die_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if BlzGetUnitAbilityCooldown(GetTriggerUnit(), 'A0I7', 1) > 0.00 then
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=R2I(( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) * 1.05 ))
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Integer)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Never_Die takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Never_Die=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Never_Die, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Never_Die, Condition(function Trig_Never_Die_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Never_Die, function Trig_Never_Die_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Initialize Caster
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Initialize_Caster_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0IB' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Initialize_Caster_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Charge_Caster=GetLearningUnit()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Initialize_Caster takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Initialize_Caster=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Initialize_Caster, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Initialize_Caster, Condition(function Trig_Initialize_Caster_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Initialize_Caster, function Trig_Initialize_Caster_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Charge Death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Charge_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Spells_Charge_Caster ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Death_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MANA, udg_Spells_Charge_Caster) == 0.00 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Charge_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Charge_Death_Func001C() ) then
        call KillUnit(udg_Spells_Charge_Caster)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Charge_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Charge_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Charge_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Charge_Death, Condition(function Trig_Charge_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Charge_Death, function Trig_Charge_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Below 0
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Below_0_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0IC' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Below_0_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit target= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    local unit caster= GetTriggerUnit()
    local real ArmorLoss= 0.00
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=target
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit2=caster
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( BlzGetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) * ( 0.25 + ( 0.05 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0IC', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit2)) ) ) )
    set ArmorLoss=udg_Spells_Temp_Real
    call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) - udg_Spells_Temp_Real ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Rejuvenation\\RejuvenationTarget.mdl")
    set udg_Spells_AP_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(15.00)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=target
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit2=caster
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=ArmorLoss
    call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) + udg_Spells_Temp_Real ))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_AP_SFX)
    set caster=null
    set target=null
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Below_0 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Below_0=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Below_0, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Below_0, Condition(function Trig_Below_0_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Below_0, function Trig_Below_0_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ice Slash Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ice_Slash_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0I8' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Slash_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position2=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spell_IceSlash_Angle=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
    set udg_Spell_IceSlash_ConeWidth=140.00
    set udg_Spell_IceSlash_Radius=700.00
    set udg_Spell_IceSlash_Damage=( ( 2.50 + ( 2.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) )
    call s__IceSlash_execute(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit , udg_Spell_IceSlash_Radius , udg_Spell_IceSlash_Angle , udg_Spell_IceSlash_ConeWidth , udg_Spell_IceSlash_Damage)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ice_Slash_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ice_Slash_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ice_Slash_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ice_Slash_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Ice_Slash_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ice_Slash_Cast, function Trig_Ice_Slash_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Overcharge Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0I4' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spell_MO_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Spell_MO_Timer, false, ( 5.00 + ( 5.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I4', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ))
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0I6', udg_Spell_MO_Caster)
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spell_MO_Caster, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spell_MO_Caster, 0) * ( 10 * R2I(I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I4', udg_Spell_MO_Caster))) ) ), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Overcharge_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Cast, function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Overcharge Shockwave
//
// This seems like it might be a problem if someone level's up the ability while it's executing.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spell_MO_Caster)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Func008Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spell_MO_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spell_MO_Caster)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FireNova2.mdx")
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0I6', udg_Spell_MO_Caster)
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spell_MO_Caster, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spell_MO_Caster, 0) / ( 10 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I4', udg_Spell_MO_Caster) ) ), 0)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Spell_MO_Caster, true)) * ( 5.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I4', udg_Spell_MO_Caster)) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(500.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Func008A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave, udg_Spell_MO_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave, function Trig_Magic_Overcharge_Shockwave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lightning Sword
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lightning_Sword_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0I5', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lightning_Sword_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lightning_Sword_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Lightning_Sword_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetAttacker(), true)) / 100.00 ) * 2.00 )
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGIC)
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Lightnings Long.mdx")
call s__effectTimed_create((GetLastCreatedEffectBJ() ) , (( 1.00)*1.0)) // INLINED!!
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lightning_Sword takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lightning_Sword=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lightning_Sword, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lightning_Sword, Condition(function Trig_Lightning_Sword_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lightning_Sword, function Trig_Lightning_Sword_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Magic Control
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Magic_Control_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()) == 'E00G' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Control_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Magic_Control_Func004Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Magic_Control_Boolean=true
        set udg_Arcane_Construct_Hero=GetEnumUnit()
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetEnumUnit(), true)) * ( 2.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HX', GetEnumUnit())) ) )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Control_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Magic_Control_Boolean == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Magic_Control_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Hero_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_MC_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Hero_Position)
    set udg_Magic_Control_Boolean=false
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_MC_Group, function Trig_Magic_Control_Func004A)
    if ( Trig_Magic_Control_Func005C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Arcane_Construct_Hero, GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_MC_Group)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Hero_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Magic_Control takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Magic_Control=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Magic_Control, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Magic_Control, function Trig_Magic_Control_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Absorb Impact Initialize
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Initialize_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DAMAGED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Absorb_Impact_Initialize takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Initialize=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Initialize, function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Initialize_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Absorb Impact Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0I2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Spells_AI_Timer, false, 4.00)
    set udg_Spells_AI_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_AI_Damage=0.00
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Absorb_Impact_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Cast, function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Absorb Impact Shockwave
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00L') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEventDamage() != 0.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00L') == true), (GetEventDamage() != 0.00)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_AI_Damage=( udg_Spells_AI_Damage + GetEventDamage() )
    call BlzSetEventDamage(0.0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave, Condition(function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave, function Trig_Absorb_Impact_Shockwave_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Absorb Impact End
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_AI_Caster)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Func005Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_AI_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_AI_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_AI_Caster)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\DarkNova.mdx")
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Func005A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Absorb_Impact_End takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_End=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_End, udg_Spells_AI_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_End, function Trig_Absorb_Impact_End_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Arcane Affinity
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Arcane_Affinity_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0I0' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Arcane_Affinity_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0I1', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Arcane_Affinity takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Arcane_Affinity=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Arcane_Affinity, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Arcane_Affinity, Condition(function Trig_Arcane_Affinity_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Arcane_Affinity, function Trig_Arcane_Affinity_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Discharge
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Discharge_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0HZ' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Discharge_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Discharge_Target=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Discharge_Damage=( ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster, true)) * 2.00 ) + ( 2.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HZ', udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster)) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster, udg_Spells_Discharge_Target, udg_Spells_Discharge_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Spells_Discharge_Caster) - ( udg_Spells_Discharge_Damage / 2.00 ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Discharge takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Discharge=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Discharge, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Discharge, Condition(function Trig_Discharge_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Discharge, function Trig_Discharge_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Lightning Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Lightning_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0I3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Lightning_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    set udg_Spells_LS_Damage=( ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * 0.50 ) + ( 0.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HX', GetTriggerUnit())) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_LS_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Lightning_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Lightning_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Lightning_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Lightning_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Lightning_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Lightning_Strike, function Trig_Lightning_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Soul Echo Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0HW' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_SE_Caster)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func006Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_SE_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_SE_Position, "war3mapImported\\NuclearExplosion.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_SE_Position)
    else
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_SE_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_SE_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_SE_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_SE_Damage=( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_SE_Caster, true)) * ( 1 + I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HW', udg_Spells_SE_Caster)) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(1000.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func006A)
    set udg_Spells_SE_Number_Units=CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    set udg_Spells_SE_Damage=( udg_Spells_SE_Damage * I2R(udg_Spells_SE_Number_Units) )
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Func009A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Soul_Echo_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Soul_Echo_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Soul_Echo_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Soul_Echo_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Soul_Echo_Cast, function Trig_Soul_Echo_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Doom Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Doom_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0HV' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Doom_Target=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Doom_Damage=( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Spells_Doom_Target) / 100.00 )
    set udg_Spells_Doom_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Doom_Counter=( 5 + ( 5 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HV', udg_Spells_Doom_Caster) ) )
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Doom_Loop)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Doom_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Doom_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Doom_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Doom_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Doom_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Doom_Cast, function Trig_Doom_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Doom Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Doom_Loop_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_Doom_Counter <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Doom_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Doom_Counter=( udg_Spells_Doom_Counter - 1 )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_Doom_Caster, udg_Spells_Doom_Target, udg_Spells_Doom_Damage, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    if ( Trig_Doom_Loop_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Doom_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Doom_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Doom_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Doom_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Doom_Loop, function Trig_Doom_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Scorged Ground Initialization
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Initialization_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0HU' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Initialization_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_SG_Caster=GetLearningUnit()
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Scorged_Ground_Initialization takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Initialization=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Initialization, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Initialization, Condition(function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Initialization_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Initialization, function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Initialization_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Scorged Ground Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Func003002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_SG_Caster)) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_SG_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_FIRE)
endfunction

function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_SG_Caster)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 0.15 * ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_SG_Caster, true)) * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HU', udg_Spells_SG_Caster)) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(300.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position, Condition(function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Func003002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Scorged_Ground_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Effect, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Scorged_Ground_Effect, function Trig_Scorged_Ground_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Destruction Orb Cast
//
// Fixed leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GV' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Func012Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_DO_Caster)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Func012A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Func012Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_DO_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local location temp= GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=temp
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spells_DO_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'uaco', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Spells_DO_Dummy=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( ( 0.50 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_Spells_DO_Caster, true)) ) + ( 0.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GV', udg_Spells_DO_Caster)) ) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=temp
    call KillUnit(udg_Spells_DO_Dummy)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Func012A)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Holy Light Nature.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Spells_DO_Dummy)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Destruction_Orb_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Destruction_Orb_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Destruction_Orb_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Destruction_Orb_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Destruction_Orb_Cast, function Trig_Destruction_Orb_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Infernal Strike
//
// Simplified Trigger.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Infernal_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0HF' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Infernal_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 1000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( - 0.20 + ( 0.40 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0HF', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call UnitDamagePointLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.50, 270.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position, udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Infernal_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Infernal_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Infernal_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Infernal_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Infernal_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Infernal_Strike, function Trig_Infernal_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starfall Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starfall_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0G2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Cast_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SF_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SF_Index=( udg_SF_Index + 1 )
    set udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Index]=10
    set udg_SF_Damage[udg_SF_Index]=( 1 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0G2', GetTriggerUnit()) )
    if ( Trig_Starfall_Cast_Func005C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Starfall_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starfall_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starfall_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Starfall_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Starfall_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Starfall_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starfall_Cast, function Trig_Starfall_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starfall Loop
//
// Fixed Leak cleaning (DestroyGroup() was placed at the end of trigger, bad practice. everything should be cleaned up as soon as it is over being used.)
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func006Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Void Rain.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func008Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SF_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_SF_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_SF_Loop_Integer > udg_SF_Index
        set udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Loop_Integer]=( udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Loop_Integer], true)) * I2R(udg_SF_Damage[udg_SF_Loop_Integer]) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(900.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func006A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
        if ( Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func008C() ) then
            set udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Loop_Integer]=udg_SF_Caster[udg_SF_Index]
            set udg_SF_Damage[udg_SF_Loop_Integer]=udg_SF_Damage[udg_SF_Index]
            set udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Loop_Integer]=udg_SF_Counter[udg_SF_Index]
            set udg_SF_Index=( udg_SF_Index - 1 )
            set udg_SF_Loop_Integer=( udg_SF_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Starfall_Loop_Func001Func008Func007C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_SF_Loop_Integer=udg_SF_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starfall_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starfall_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Starfall_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Starfall_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starfall_Loop, function Trig_Starfall_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Mother Earths Tranquility
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Mother_Earths_Tranquility_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CT' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Mother_Earths_Tranquility_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00O', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0CU', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call IssueImmediateOrderBJ(GetLastCreatedUnit(), "tranquility")
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(5.00, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Mother_Earths_Tranquility takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Mother_Earths_Tranquility=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Mother_Earths_Tranquility, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Mother_Earths_Tranquility, Condition(function Trig_Mother_Earths_Tranquility_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Mother_Earths_Tranquility, function Trig_Mother_Earths_Tranquility_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Divine Judgement
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Divine_Judgement_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0E1', GetAttacker()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Judgement_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Judgement_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Divine_Judgement_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttackedUnitBJ())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\HolyBolt\\HolyBoltSpecialArt.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 10000.00 ))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Divine_Judgement takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Divine_Judgement=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Divine_Judgement, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Divine_Judgement, Condition(function Trig_Divine_Judgement_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Divine_Judgement, function Trig_Divine_Judgement_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Blink Strike
//
// Removed 4 useless variables
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Blink_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0G9' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Blink_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( ( 0.50 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) ) + ( 0.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped(GetSpellAbilityId(), GetTriggerUnit())) ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Blink\\BlinkCaster.mdl")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Blink Nature Orange Target.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Blink_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Blink_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Blink_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Blink_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Blink_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Blink_Strike, function Trig_Blink_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Eclipse Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Eclipse_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0EY', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Eclipse_Power_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Eclipse_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Eclipse_Power_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0EY', GetAttacker())) ) ) + ( 0.10 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FN', GetAttacker())) ) ) )
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGIC)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Eclipse_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Eclipse_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Eclipse_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Eclipse_Power, Condition(function Trig_Eclipse_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Eclipse_Power, function Trig_Eclipse_Power_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Adrenaline Rush Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Func002Func004Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_AR_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Func002Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // This loop is to make sure every cast of Adrenaline Rush is accounted for
    set udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_AR_Index
        // Something happens every second
        set udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        // In this case the counter goes down by 1 second
        if ( Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Func002Func004C() ) then
            // Once the counter becomes 0 clean up
            call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0F2', udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer])
            set udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Index]
            set udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Index]
            set udg_Spells_AR_Index=( udg_Spells_AR_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            // Deallocate variables so that they do not reach the maximum array size
            if ( Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Func002Func004Func009C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop, function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Adrenaline Rush
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0EC' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_AR_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Store or "index" information for each Adrenaline Rush cast
    set udg_Spells_AR_Index=( udg_Spells_AR_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    // How long in seconds the Adrenaline Rush cast is
    set udg_Spells_AR_Counter[udg_Spells_AR_Index]=8
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0F2', udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Index])
    call SetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0F2', udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Index], GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0EC', udg_Spells_AR_Caster[udg_Spells_AR_Index]))
    // Turn on the loop trigger
    if ( Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Func009C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Adrenaline_Rush takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush, Condition(function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Adrenaline_Rush, function Trig_Adrenaline_Rush_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragons Rage Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Func001Func004Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DR_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Func001Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_DR_Index
        set udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer], ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer], 0) + udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer] ), 0)
        // This happens every 3 seconds
        if ( Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Func001Func004C() ) then
            // Once the counter becomes 0 clean up
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer], ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer], 0) - ( udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer] * 20 ) ), 0)
            set udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Index]
            set udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Index]
            set udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Index]
            set udg_Spells_DR_Index=( udg_Spells_DR_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Func001Func004Func009C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_DR_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragons_Rage_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragons_Rage_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage_Loop, 3.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage_Loop, function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragons Rage
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0F7' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DR_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_DR_Index=( udg_Spells_DR_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Index]=( ( GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), true) / 100 ) * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0F7', GetTriggerUnit()) )
    set udg_Spells_DR_Counter[udg_Spells_DR_Index]=19
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_DR_Caster[udg_Spells_DR_Index], ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 0) + udg_Spells_DR_Strength[udg_Spells_DR_Index] ), 0)
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Rage_Func008C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragons_Rage takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragons_Rage=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage, Condition(function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragons_Rage, function Trig_Dragons_Rage_Actions)
endfunction
