//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Bounty Hunter
//
// Shortened the trigger and fixed a gameplay bug.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FG', GetKillingUnitBJ()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Func001Func002C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Func001C() ) then
        call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(100, GetOwningPlayer(GetKillingUnitBJ()), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_LUMBER)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Bounty_Hunter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Bounty_Hunter=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Bounty_Hunter, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Bounty_Hunter, Condition(function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Bounty_Hunter, function Trig_Bounty_Hunter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fan of Knives
//
// Cleaned Up location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FL' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Player) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func006Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 1000000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FL', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Player=GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Func006A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fan_of_Knives takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, Condition(function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fan_of_Knives, function Trig_Fan_of_Knives_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Strike of Darkness
//
// Cleaned up location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FM', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetAttacker(), true)) * ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FM', GetAttacker())) ) ) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\ShadowAssault.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Strike_of_Darkness takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Strike_of_Darkness=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Strike_of_Darkness, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Strike_of_Darkness, Condition(function Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Strike_of_Darkness, function Trig_Strike_of_Darkness_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Holy Strike
//
// Fixed location leak. And replaced whatever Holy Strike's damage was, with what I assume should be correct?
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Holy_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FN', GetAttacker()) > 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Strike_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Holy_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Holy_Strike_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( ( 0.90 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetAttacker(), true)) ) + ( 0.10 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FN', GetAttacker())) ) ) )
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Stormfall Orange.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_MAGIC)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Holy_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Holy_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Holy_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Holy_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Holy_Strike, function Trig_Holy_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Purification
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Purification_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FP' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Purification_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( 1.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FP', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Divine Edict.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Purification=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Purification, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Purification, Condition(function Trig_Purification_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Purification, function Trig_Purification_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Light Bolt
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Light_Bolt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Light_Bolt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( 0.50 + ( I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FS', GetTriggerUnit())) * 0.50 ) ) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Light_Bolt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Light_Bolt, Condition(function Trig_Light_Bolt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Light_Bolt, function Trig_Light_Bolt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: The Chosen One
//===========================================================================
function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FU' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FU', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FU', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FU', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_TCO_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_TCO_Index=( udg_Spells_TCO_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_TCO_Caster[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=10
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "war3mapImported\\Divine Wings.mdx")
    set udg_Spells_TCO_SFX[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=5
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func009C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=7
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func010C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]=10
    else
    endif
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetSpellTargetUnit(), 0) * udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Index] ), 0)
    if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Func012C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_The_Chosen_One takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_The_Chosen_One=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One, Condition(function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One, function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: The Chosen One Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Func001Func002Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_TCO_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_TCO_Index
        set udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_TCO_Caster[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer], ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Spells_TCO_Caster[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer], 0) / udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer] ), 0)
            set udg_Spells_TCO_Caster[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_TCO_Caster[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]
            set udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_TCO_Damage[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]
            set udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_TCO_Counter[udg_Spells_TCO_Index]
            set udg_Spells_TCO_Index=( udg_Spells_TCO_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_TCO_SFX[udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer])
            if ( Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Func001Func002Func009C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_TCO_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_The_Chosen_One_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_The_Chosen_One_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_The_Chosen_One_Loop, function Trig_The_Chosen_One_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Archangels Protection
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Archangels_Protection_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FT' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archangels_Protection_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit target= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=target
    call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) + 1000000.00 ))
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\NightElf\\Rejuvenation\\RejuvenationTarget.mdl")
    set udg_Spells_AP_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=target
    call BlzSetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitArmor(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) - 1000000.00 ))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_AP_SFX)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Archangels_Protection takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Archangels_Protection=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Archangels_Protection, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Archangels_Protection, Condition(function Trig_Archangels_Protection_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Archangels_Protection, function Trig_Archangels_Protection_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Crippling Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Crippling_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FV' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Crippling_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit Target= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FV', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call UnitAddAbility(Target, 'Abun')
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call UnitRemoveAbility(Target, 'Abun')
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Crippling_Strike takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Crippling_Strike=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Crippling_Strike, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Crippling_Strike, Condition(function Trig_Crippling_Strike_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Crippling_Strike, function Trig_Crippling_Strike_Actions)
endfunction

// Trigger: Radiance Aura Initial
//===========================================================================

    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0FW' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Initial_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_RA_Caster=GetLearningUnit()
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Radiance_Aura_Initial takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Radiance_Aura_Initial=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Radiance_Aura_Initial, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Radiance_Aura_Initial, Condition(function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Initial_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Radiance_Aura_Initial, function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Initial_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Radiance Aura
//
// Simplified Trigger, fixed location leak, fixed damage not dealing to nearby hostile units.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_RA_Caster)) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Radiance_Aura_Func004Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_RA_Caster, GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_RA_Caster)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 0.15 * ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_Spells_RA_Caster, true)) * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FW', udg_Spells_RA_Caster)) ) )
    set udg_Radiance_aura_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Radiance_aura_Group, function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Func004A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Radiance_aura_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Radiance_Aura takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Radiance_Aura=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Radiance_Aura, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Radiance_Aura, function Trig_Radiance_Aura_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Devour Soul
//
// Simplified Trigger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Devour_Soul_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0FX' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Devour_Soul_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( ( 0.50 + ( 0.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FX', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) ) )
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Soul Discharge Purple.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + udg_Spells_Temp_Real ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Devour_Soul takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Devour_Soul=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Devour_Soul, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Devour_Soul, Condition(function Trig_Devour_Soul_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Devour_Soul, function Trig_Devour_Soul_Actions)
endfunction

// Simplified Trigger.
//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetSpellTargetUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Finger_of_Doom, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Finger_of_Doom, Condition(function Trig_Finger_of_Doom_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Finger_of_Doom, function Trig_Finger_of_Doom_Actions)

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Torrent
//
// Simplified Trigger.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Torrent_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0G1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Torrent_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 50000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( - 0.20 + ( 0.40 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0G1', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call UnitDamagePointLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), 0.50, 200.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position, udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Torrent takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Torrent=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Torrent, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Torrent, Condition(function Trig_Torrent_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Torrent, function Trig_Torrent_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Repel
//
// Simplified Trigger.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Repel_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0G4' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Repel_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit Target= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0G5', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0G6', GetSpellTargetUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("chest", GetSpellTargetUnit(), "Abilities\\Spells\\Human\\DivineShield\\DivineShieldTarget.mdl")
    set udg_Spells_R_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(( 2.50 + ( 0.50 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0G4', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ))
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_R_SFX)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=Target
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0G5', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0G6', udg_Spells_Temp_Unit)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Repel takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Repel=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Repel, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Repel, Condition(function Trig_Repel_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Repel, function Trig_Repel_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragons Heart Learn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0FI' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', GetTriggerUnit()) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', GetTriggerUnit()) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', GetTriggerUnit()) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_DH_Caster=GetLearningUnit()
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func002C() ) then
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0EX', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0EX', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GA', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Func004C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GA', GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GB', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragons_Heart_Learn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragons_Heart_Learn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dragons_Heart_Learn, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dragons_Heart_Learn, Condition(function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragons_Heart_Learn, function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Learn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dragons Heart
//
// Shortened Trigger, removed 1 variable
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', udg_Spells_DH_Caster) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', udg_Spells_DH_Caster) == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0FI', udg_Spells_DH_Caster) == 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_DH_Real=I2R(BlzGetUnitMaxHP(udg_Spells_DH_Caster))
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_DH_Real=( udg_Spells_DH_Real / 100.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_DH_Real=( udg_Spells_DH_Real / 50.00 )
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Dragons_Heart_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_DH_Real=( udg_Spells_DH_Real / 33.00 )
    else
    endif
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Spells_DH_Caster, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Spells_DH_Caster) + udg_Spells_DH_Real ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dragons_Heart takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dragons_Heart=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dragons_Heart, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dragons_Heart, function Trig_Dragons_Heart_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chaos Stomp Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GC' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CS_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_CS_Index=( udg_Spells_CS_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_CS_Caster[udg_Spells_CS_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Index]=2
    set udg_Spells_CS_Damage[udg_Spells_CS_Index]=( 2 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GC', GetTriggerUnit()) )
    if ( Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Func005C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Cast, function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chaos Stomp Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func008Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_CS_Caster[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func008Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_CS_Caster[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func010Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CS_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_CS_Index
        set udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_CS_Caster[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 200000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_Spells_CS_Caster[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer], true)) * I2R(udg_Spells_CS_Damage[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer]) ) )
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FireNova2.mdx")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func008A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
        if ( Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func010C() ) then
            set udg_Spells_CS_Damage[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CS_Damage[udg_Spells_CS_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CS_Counter[udg_Spells_CS_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CS_Index=( udg_Spells_CS_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Func001Func010Func005C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_CS_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Loop, 0.50)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chaos_Stomp_Loop, function Trig_Chaos_Stomp_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GD' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_A_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_A_Index=( udg_Spells_A_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Index]=1
    set udg_Spells_A_Damage[udg_Spells_A_Index]=( 2 * GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GD', GetTriggerUnit()) )
    if ( Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Func006C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Armageddon_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Armageddon_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Cast, function Trig_Armageddon_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Armageddon Loop
//
// Cleaned Up Location leaks.
// Fixed trigger issue if multiple units cast ability.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func001Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Index])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_A_Target_Count < 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func001Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func001Func007Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "Units\\Demon\\Infernal\\InfernalBirth.mdl")
        set udg_Spells_A_SFX[( ( 10 * udg_Spells_AR_Loop_Integer ) + udg_Spells_A_Target_Count )]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n05P', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Index]), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_A_Target_Count=( udg_Spells_A_Target_Count + 1 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func003Func002Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_A_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func003Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_A_Index
        set udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 200000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_Spells_A_Caster[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer], true)) * I2R(udg_Spells_A_Damage[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer]) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(3000.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_A_Target_Count=0
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func001Func007A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
        set udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_A_Index
        set udg_Spells_A_Target_Count=0
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Spells_A_Target_Count > 9
            call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_A_SFX[( ( 10 * udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer ) + udg_Spells_A_Target_Count )])
            set udg_Spells_A_Target_Count=udg_Spells_A_Target_Count + 1
        endloop
        if ( Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func003Func002C() ) then
            set udg_Spells_A_Damage[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_A_Damage[udg_Spells_A_Index]
            set udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_A_Counter[udg_Spells_A_Index]
            set udg_Spells_A_Index=( udg_Spells_A_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Func003Func002Func005C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_A_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Armageddon_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Armageddon_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Armageddon_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Armageddon_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Armageddon_Loop, function Trig_Armageddon_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Matter Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Matter_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GP' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Matter_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Dark_Matter, GetTriggerUnit(), EVENT_UNIT_DAMAGED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Matter_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Matter_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Matter_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Matter_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Matter_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Matter_Cast, function Trig_Dark_Matter_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Matter
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Matter_Func001001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00E') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Matter_Func001002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetEventDamage() != 0.00 )
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Matter_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not GetBooleanAnd((UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00E') == true), (GetEventDamage() != 0.00)) ) then // INLINED!!
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Matter_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + GetEventDamage() ))
    call BlzSetEventDamage(0.0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Matter takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Matter=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Matter, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Matter_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Matter, function Trig_Dark_Matter_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Haunt
//
// Fixed location leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Haunt_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GQ' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIllusionBJ(GetSpellTargetUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Haunt_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitX(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetX())
    call SetUnitY(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetY())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Haunt takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Haunt=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Haunt, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Haunt, Condition(function Trig_Haunt_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Haunt, function Trig_Haunt_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Into the Void
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Into_the_Void_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GR' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Into_the_Void_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Abun', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Apiv', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('Agho', GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_Temp_Integer > 4
        call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_MAX_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) / 10.00 ) ))
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=udg_Spells_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Abun', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Apiv', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('Agho', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Into_the_Void takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Into_the_Void=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Into_the_Void, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Into_the_Void, Condition(function Trig_Into_the_Void_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Into_the_Void, function Trig_Into_the_Void_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stifling Dagger
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stifling_Dagger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GS' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stifling_Dagger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit triggerUnit= GetSpellTargetUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) * ( 0.75 + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GS', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) ) )
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetSpellTargetUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(GetSpellTargetUnit(), ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(GetSpellTargetUnit()) / 2.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Unit=triggerUnit
    call SetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit, ( GetUnitMoveSpeed(udg_Spells_Temp_Unit) * 2.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stifling_Dagger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stifling_Dagger=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Stifling_Dagger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Stifling_Dagger, Condition(function Trig_Stifling_Dagger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stifling_Dagger, function Trig_Stifling_Dagger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Black Hole Cast
//
// Fixed leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GT' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func006002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Index])) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func007Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Index])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func007Func001C() ) then
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_BH_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GT', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func012C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GT', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GT', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GT', GetTriggerUnit()) == 9 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_BH_Index=( udg_Spells_BH_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hdhw', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Spells_BH_Dummy[udg_Spells_BH_Index]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position, Condition(function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func006002003))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func007A)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func009C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Loop)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func011C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Index]=3
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.00)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func012C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Index]=4
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(3.90)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Func013C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Index]=5
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetTriggerUnit())
        call TriggerSleepAction(4.90)
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Black_Hole_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Black_Hole_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Cast, function Trig_Black_Hole_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Black Hole Loop
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func004002003 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitEnemy(GetFilterUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer])) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func005Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func005Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func006Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_BH_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_BH_Index
        set udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( ( 0.50 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer], true)) ) * ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GT', udg_Spells_BH_Caster[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer])) ) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_BH_Dummy[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocMatching(700.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position, Condition(function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func004002003))
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func005A)
        if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func006C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(udg_Spells_BH_Dummy[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer])
            set udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_BH_Counter[udg_Spells_BH_Index]
            set udg_Spells_BH_Index=( udg_Spells_BH_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Func002Func006Func005C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_BH_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Black_Hole_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Black_Hole_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Black_Hole_Loop, function Trig_Black_Hole_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Portal Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'ANdp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DP_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hmpr', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Spells_DP_Index=( udg_Spells_DP_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_DP_Dummy[udg_Spells_DP_Index]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    set udg_Spells_DP_Caster[udg_Spells_DP_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Index]=10
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    if ( Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Func008C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Portal_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Cast, function Trig_Dark_Portal_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Dark Portal Loop
//
// Fixed leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func006Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_DP_Caster[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func006Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_DP_Caster[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func008Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DP_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_DP_Index
        set udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( ( 0.50 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_Spells_DP_Caster[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer], true)) ) * ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANdp', udg_Spells_DP_Caster[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer])) ) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_DP_Dummy[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func006A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
        if ( Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func008C() ) then
            call RemoveUnit(udg_Spells_DP_Dummy[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer])
            set udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_DP_Counter[udg_Spells_DP_Index]
            set udg_Spells_DP_Index=( udg_Spells_DP_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Func001Func008Func005C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_DP_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Dark_Portal_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Loop, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Dark_Portal_Loop, function Trig_Dark_Portal_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Liquid Doppelganger
//
// Cleaned up location leak, simplified trigger.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0GW' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'O010', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    set udg_Spells_LD_Dummy=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_Spells_LD_Dummy, GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()), false)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_Temp_Integer > 6
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped(GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Integer)), udg_Spells_LD_Dummy)
        call SetItemDroppableBJ(UnitItemInSlotBJ(udg_Spells_LD_Dummy, udg_Spells_Temp_Integer), false)
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=udg_Spells_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(( 5.00 + ( 5.00 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0GW', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ))
    call RemoveUnit(udg_Spells_LD_Dummy)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Liquid_Doppelganger takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger, Condition(function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger, function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Liquid Doppelganger No Nesting
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetLearnedSkillBJ() == 'A0GW' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Spells_LD_Dummy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GW', udg_Spells_LD_Dummy)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_SKILL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting, Condition(function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting, function Trig_Liquid_Doppelganger_No_Nesting_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Liquid Doppleganger Remove Kill
//
// Fixed this trigger not working for team2, and it won't remove 2 kills for team1 anymore.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetTriggerUnit() == udg_Spells_LD_Dummy ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 1 )
        call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Leaderboard, udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=( udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] - 1 )
        call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Leaderboard, udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill)
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill, Condition(function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill, function Trig_Liquid_Doppleganger_Remove_Kill_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WS Damage Reduction Initial
//===========================================================================
