    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DAMAGED)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Initial takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction_Initial=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction_Initial, function Trig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Initial_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: WS Damage Reduction
//===========================================================================
function Trig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasBuffBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'B00G') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetEventDamage(( GetEventDamage() / 2.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_WS_Damage_Reduction takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction, Condition(function Trig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction, function Trig_WS_Damage_Reduction_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Sphere Cast
//
// Honestly this would be better with locals or something, but I'm lazy and this probably wasn't a MUI spell to begin with.
// Removed WS_Index, serves no purpose.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Sphere_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0H0' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Sphere_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_WS_Caster=GetTriggerUnit()
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\cronosphere.mdx")
    set udg_Spells_WS_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GX', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GY', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('A0GZ', GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_WS_SFX)
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GX', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GY', GetTriggerUnit())
    call UnitRemoveAbilityBJ('A0GZ', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Sphere_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Sphere_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Water_Sphere_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Water_Sphere_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Water_Sphere_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Sphere_Cast, function Trig_Water_Sphere_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Freezing Field Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0H2' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_FF_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_FF_Index=( udg_Spells_FF_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Index]=10
    if ( Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Func004C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Freezing_Field_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Cast, function Trig_Freezing_Field_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Freezing Field Loop
//
// Fixed locations and leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func002Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func002Func002Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func003Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_FF_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_FF_Index
        set udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer])
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hmtm', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Index]), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
        call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=0
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Spells_Temp_Integer > 9
            set udg_Spells_FF_Location[( ( udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer * 10 ) + udg_Spells_Temp_Integer )]=PolarProjectionBJ(GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer]), GetRandomReal(0, 900.00), GetRandomReal(0, 360.00))
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00O', GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Index]), udg_Spells_FF_Location[( ( 10 * udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer ) + udg_Spells_Temp_Integer )], bj_UNIT_FACING)
            call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.50, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
            set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=udg_Spells_Temp_Integer + 1
        endloop
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.50)
    set udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_FF_Index
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 10000.00 + ( I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer], true)) * ( 0.22 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H2', udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer])) ) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=0
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Spells_Temp_Integer > 9
            set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(220.00, udg_Spells_FF_Location[( ( 10 * udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer ) + udg_Spells_Temp_Integer )])
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func002Func002A)
            call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
            call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_FF_Location[10 * udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer + udg_Spells_Temp_Integer])
            set udg_Spells_Temp_Integer=udg_Spells_Temp_Integer + 1
        endloop
        if ( Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func003C() ) then
            set udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_FF_Caster[udg_Spells_FF_Index]
            set udg_Spell_FF_Damage[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spell_FF_Damage[udg_Spells_FF_Index]
            set udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_FF_Counter[udg_Spells_FF_Index]
            set udg_Spells_FF_Index=( udg_Spells_FF_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Func003Func003Func007C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_FF_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Freezing_Field_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Loop, 1.30)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Freezing_Field_Loop, function Trig_Freezing_Field_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chilling Presence Cast
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0H3' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 5 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) <= 7 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', GetTriggerUnit()) >= 8 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CP_Index == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_CP_Index=( udg_Spells_CP_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func004C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Index]=1
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func005C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Index]=2
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func006C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Index]=3
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Index]=4
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Func008C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chilling_Presence_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Cast, function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chilling Presence Loop
//
// This is by no means a complete MUI spell, because unit group can pick an undefined amount of units, therefore you can't make a proper array setup for SFX.
// Fixed location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func001Func009Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func001Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func001Func009Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FrostNova.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_CP_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call PauseUnitBJ(true, GetEnumUnit())
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        set udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount=( udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount + 1 )
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func002Func001C() ) then
        call PauseUnitBJ(false, GetEnumUnit())
        set udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount=( udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount - 1 )
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_CP_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount])
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func004Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CP_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_CP_Index
        set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 50000.00 + ( ( 0.75 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer], true)) ) + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H3', udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])) ) ) )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(800.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FrostNova\\FrostNovaTarget.mdl")
        set udg_Spells_CP_Caster_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        set udg_Spells_CP_SFX_Amount=0
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer], function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func001Func009A)
        set udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    set udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_CP_Index
        call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Spells_CP_Caster_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer], function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func002A)
        call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer])
        if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func004C() ) then
            set udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CP_Caster[udg_Spells_CP_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CP_Counter[udg_Spells_CP_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CP_Caster_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CP_SFX[udg_Spells_CP_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_CP_UnitGroup[udg_Spells_CP_Index]
            set udg_Spells_CP_Index=( udg_Spells_CP_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Func003Func004Func008C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        set udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_CP_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chilling_Presence_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Loop, 5.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chilling_Presence_Loop, function Trig_Chilling_Presence_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Frost Orb Cast
//
// Cleaned up group leak, and location fuckup
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'ANdh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Func011Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Func011Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local group targetGroup= null
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    set targetGroup=udg_Spells_Temp_Group
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00R', GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Spells_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call UnitApplyTimedLifeBJ(1.70, 'BTLF', GetLastCreatedUnit())
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( ( 0.75 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) ) + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('ANdh', GetTriggerUnit())) ) ) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=targetGroup
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Func011A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Frost_Orb_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Frost_Orb_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Frost_Orb_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Frost_Orb_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Frost_Orb_Cast, function Trig_Frost_Orb_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Stream Cast
//
// fixed whatever ugly mess was with "intiger"
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0H1' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsTriggerEnabled(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Index=( udg_Spells_WS2_Index + 1 )
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]=20
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]=GetTriggerUnit()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetSpellTargetLoc()
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position2=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Angle[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]=AngleBetweenPoints(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2, udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Distance[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]=( 40.00 + I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H1', GetTriggerUnit())) )
    call ShowUnitHide(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Func011C() ) then
        call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Stream_Cast takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Stream_Cast=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Cast, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Cast, Condition(function Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Cast, function Trig_Water_Stream_Cast_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Water Stream Loop
//
// This entire trigger out of all in the spells section, was the one I spent the most time on, no doubt.
// It looked like mess and whole lot of confusion, so I re-arranged the entire thing to do what I guessed was the desired effect.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func004Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func004Func001C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer], GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    else
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func013C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_WS2_Index == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer] <= 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer=1
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer > udg_Spells_WS2_Index
        call ShowUnitHide(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer]=( udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer] - 1 )
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])
        set udg_Spells_Temp_Position2=PolarProjectionBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, udg_Spells_WS2_Distance[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer], udg_Spells_WS2_Angle[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer], udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2, "Objects\\Spawnmodels\\Naga\\NagaDeath\\NagaDeath.mdl")
        call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
        if ( Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009C() ) then
            call ShowUnitShow(udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])
            set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 100000.00 + ( ( 0.75 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer], true)) ) + ( 0.25 * I2R(GetUnitAbilityLevelSwapped('A0H1', udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer])) ) ) )
            set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRangeOfLocAll(300.00, udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
            call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func004A)
            call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2, "Abilities\\Spells\\Undead\\FrostNova\\FrostNovaTarget.mdl")
            call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_WS2_Counter[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Angle[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_WS2_Angle[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Distance[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_WS2_Distance[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer]=udg_Spells_WS2_Caster[udg_Spells_WS2_Index]
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Index=( udg_Spells_WS2_Index - 1 )
            set udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer=( udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer - 1 )
            if ( Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Func001Func009Func013C() ) then
                call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
            else
            endif
        else
        endif
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position2)
        set udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer=udg_Spells_WS2_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Water_Stream_Loop takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop, 0.03)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Water_Stream_Loop, function Trig_Water_Stream_Loop_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Enter Fire Area
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Enter_Fire_Area_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Enter_Fire_Area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_CA_Fire_Entrance_Point)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_015, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Enter_Fire_Area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Enter_Fire_Area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Enter_Fire_Area, gg_rct_portal_to_forgotten_world)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Enter_Fire_Area, Condition(function Trig_Enter_Fire_Area_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enter_Fire_Area, function Trig_Enter_Fire_Area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exit Fire Area
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exit_Fire_Area_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exit_Fire_Area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_005, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_Fire_Area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_Fire_Area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Exit_Fire_Area, gg_rct_boss1_exit)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Exit_Fire_Area, Condition(function Trig_Exit_Fire_Area_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_Fire_Area, function Trig_Exit_Fire_Area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Fire area
//
// This trigger had an IF block without a condition, I filled in what I assumed was the missing piece.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 300, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CA_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_Fire_area_Respawn, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func001002002))
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'H02Q', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Fire_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func003A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(8, 'H02P', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Fire_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func005A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'H02L', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Fire_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func007A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(2, 'H02R', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Fire_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Func002Func009A)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Fire_area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Fire_area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Respawn_Fire_area, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Fire_area, function Trig_Respawn_Fire_area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Enter Igloo Area
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Enter_Igloo_Area_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Enter_Igloo_Area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_CA_Igloo_Entrance_Point)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_009, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Enter_Igloo_Area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Enter_Igloo_Area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Enter_Igloo_Area, gg_rct_Igloo)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Enter_Igloo_Area, Condition(function Trig_Enter_Igloo_Area_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enter_Igloo_Area, function Trig_Enter_Igloo_Area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exit Igloo Area
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exit_Igloo_Area_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Exit_Igloo_Area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_005, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_Igloo_Area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_Igloo_Area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Exit_Igloo_Area, gg_rct_exit_igloo)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Exit_Igloo_Area, Condition(function Trig_Exit_Igloo_Area_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_Igloo_Area, function Trig_Exit_Igloo_Area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Igloo Area
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func004A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func006A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 150, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func008A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetEnumUnit(), 300, false)
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CA_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectMatching(gg_rct_igloo_respawn, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func001002002))
    if ( Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'Oshd', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Igloo_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func002A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(4, 'Hmkg', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Igloo_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func004A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'Hamg', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Igloo_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func006A)
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'Ucrl', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Igloo_Respawn_Point, 270.00)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetLastCreatedGroup(), function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Func002Func008A)
    else
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Igloo_Area takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Igloo_Area=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Respawn_Igloo_Area, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Igloo_Area, function Trig_Respawn_Igloo_Area_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Castle Areas
//
// Merged 4 triggers.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002002001 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return GetBooleanAnd((GetOwningPlayer(GetFilterUnit()) == Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)), (GetBooleanAnd((IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_STRUCTURE) != true), (IsUnitAliveBJ(GetFilterUnit()) == true)))) // INLINED!!
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_CA_Temp_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_CA_Temp_Integer > 3
        set udg_CA_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectMatching(udg_CA_Castle_Regions[udg_CA_Temp_Integer], Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func001002002))
        if ( Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Func001Func002C() ) then
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(6, 'h02M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Castle_Respawn_Points[udg_CA_Temp_Integer], 270.00)
            call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02N', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_CA_Castle_Respawn_Points[udg_CA_Temp_Integer], 270.00)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyGroup(udg_CA_Temp_Group)
        set udg_CA_Temp_Integer=udg_CA_Temp_Integer + 1
    endloop
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Castle_Areas takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Castle_Areas=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Respawn_Castle_Areas, 300.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Castle_Areas, function Trig_Respawn_Castle_Areas_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Burning Fighter Attacked
//
// Wasn't sure if attacking unit changes or not on this trigger event, so I did add some precationary actions.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Burning_Fighter_Attacked_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'H02Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Burning_Fighter_Attacked_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local unit attacker= GetAttacker()
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.50)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Unit=attacker
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(udg_Mob_Temp_Unit)
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Mob_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\MeteorStrike.mdx")
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    set udg_Mob_Burning_Fighter_SFX=GetLastCreatedEffectBJ()
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Unit=attacker
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(udg_Mob_Temp_Unit, ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, udg_Mob_Temp_Unit) - 300000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyEffectBJ(udg_Mob_Burning_Fighter_SFX)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Burning_Fighter_Attacked takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Burning_Fighter_Attacked=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Burning_Fighter_Attacked, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Burning_Fighter_Attacked, Condition(function Trig_Burning_Fighter_Attacked_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Burning_Fighter_Attacked, function Trig_Burning_Fighter_Attacked_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ice Golem Attacks
//
// Changed Attacked unit to Triggering Unit, because Triggering Unit is a known constant to trigger execution.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ice_Golem_Attacks_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetAttacker()) == 'Ucrl' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ice_Golem_Attacks_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 100000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 100000.00 ))
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) - 100000.00 ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ice_Golem_Attacks takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ice_Golem_Attacks=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Ice_Golem_Attacks, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ice_Golem_Attacks, Condition(function Trig_Ice_Golem_Attacks_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ice_Golem_Attacks, function Trig_Ice_Golem_Attacks_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Snake
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Snake_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('n05R', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Snake_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_snake)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n05R', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mob_Temp_Position, 270.00)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Snake takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Respawn_Snake=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Respawn_Snake, 8.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Respawn_Snake, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Snake_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Snake, function Trig_Respawn_Snake_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call TriggerSleepAction(80.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_newcreepright)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'e00M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mob_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Archer_Left, function Trig_Respawn_Archer_Left_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Archer Loot
//
// Deleted the drop archer left trigger and merged with this one, because this one seems more balanced, and the other one was more biased because of 2 items had swapped their drop chances. (cheeky)
// Fixed location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00M' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    if ( ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'e00N' ) ) then
        return true
    endif
    return false
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not Trig_Archer_Loot_Func001C() ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 15 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 16 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 21 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 25 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 26 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 30 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Archer_Loot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Archer_Loot_Func004C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('tdex', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archer_Loot_Func005C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('I003', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archer_Loot_Func006C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('I046', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archer_Loot_Func007C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('I043', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Archer_Loot_Func008C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('tst2', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Archer_Loot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Archer_Loot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Archer_Loot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Archer_Loot, Condition(function Trig_Archer_Loot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Archer_Loot, function Trig_Archer_Loot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Respawn Golden Golem Top
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n05E' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(600.00)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_golden_golem_top)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n05E', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mob_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top takes nothing returns nothing

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top, Condition(function Trig_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top, function Trig_Respawn_Golden_Golem_Top_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Imperial Guard Loot
//
// Cleaned up location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02M' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 50 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    if ( Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Func003C() ) then
        call CreateItemLoc('I00R', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    else
    endif
    call CreateItemLoc('IC93', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Imperial_Guard_Loot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Imperial_Guard_Loot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Imperial_Guard_Loot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Imperial_Guard_Loot, Condition(function Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Imperial_Guard_Loot, function Trig_Imperial_Guard_Loot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Judicator Loot
//
// Cleaned up location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Judicator_Loot_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'h02N' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Judicator_Loot_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc('IC93', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc('I036', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call CreateItemLoc('I005', udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Judicator_Loot takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Judicator_Loot=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Judicator_Loot, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Judicator_Loot, Condition(function Trig_Judicator_Loot_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Judicator_Loot, function Trig_Judicator_Loot_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Demonic Respawn 1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Demonic_Respawn_1_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('u00M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) < 6 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Demonic_Manifestation_Respawn == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Demonic_Respawn_1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'u00M', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Demonic_Respawn_P, 270.00)
endfunction

function Trig_Elite_Marine_Respawn_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'hrif', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_EliteMar_Respawn_P, 270.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Creep Dies
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Creep_Dies_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n005' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nowb' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n00Z' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n00D' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n018' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'n012' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'nspp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'Hamg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'Hmkg' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'Oshd' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'Ucrl' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'H02P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'H02L' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'H02R' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != 'H02Q' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 8) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Creep_Dies_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mob_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemBJ(6), udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Mob_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Creep_Dies takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Creep_Dies=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Creep_Dies, Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Creep_Dies, Condition(function Trig_Creep_Dies_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Creep_Dies, function Trig_Creep_Dies_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Next Creep Easy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_IsGamePaused == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsMiddleOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsHardOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[ModuloInteger(udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Easy, 24)])
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Easy=( udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Easy + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy, 1.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy, function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Easy_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Next Creep Middle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_IsGamePaused == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsMiddleOn == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsHardOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[ModuloInteger(udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Middle, 24)])
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Middle=( udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Middle + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle, 2.30)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle, function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Middle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Spawn Next Creep Hard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_IsGamePaused == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsMiddleOn == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( udg_Mobs_Normal_IsHardOn == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[ModuloInteger(udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Hard, 24)])
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Hard=( udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Hard + 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard, 4.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard, Condition(function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard, function Trig_Spawn_Next_Creep_Hard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Change Spawn Middle
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Change_Spawn_Middle_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_IsMiddleOn=true
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_IsHardOn=false
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Middle=0
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Middle)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Change_Spawn_Middle takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Middle=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Middle, 800.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Middle, function Trig_Change_Spawn_Middle_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Change Spawn Hard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Change_Spawn_Hard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_IsMiddleOn=false
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_IsHardOn=true
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Number_Hard=0
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Hard)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Change_Spawn_Hard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Hard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Hard, 1500.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Change_Spawn_Hard, function Trig_Change_Spawn_Hard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Activate Creep Elites
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Activate_Creep_Elites_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_7457")
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_FurldorgTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_OwlbearTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_RockTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_ReverantTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_DragonTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_RazormanTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_NerubianTen)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_LizardTen)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Activate_Creep_Elites takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Activate_Creep_Elites=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Activate_Creep_Elites, 2200.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Activate_Creep_Elites, function Trig_Activate_Creep_Elites_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Setup Creep Spawn Triggers Easy
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Easy_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[0]=gg_trg_FurlborgOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[1]=gg_trg_OwlbearOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[2]=gg_trg_RockOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[3]=gg_trg_ReverantOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[4]=gg_trg_NerubianOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[5]=gg_trg_RazormanOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[6]=gg_trg_LizardOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[7]=gg_trg_DragonOne
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[8]=gg_trg_FurlborgTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[9]=gg_trg_OwlbearTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[10]=gg_trg_RockTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[11]=gg_trg_ReverantTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[12]=gg_trg_NerubianTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[13]=gg_trg_RazormanTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[14]=gg_trg_LizardTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[15]=gg_trg_DragonTwo
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[16]=gg_trg_FurldorgThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[17]=gg_trg_OwlbearThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[18]=gg_trg_RockThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[19]=gg_trg_ReverantThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[20]=gg_trg_NerubianThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[21]=gg_trg_RazormanThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[22]=gg_trg_LizardThree
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Easy_Trg[23]=gg_trg_DragonThree
endfunction

    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[4]=gg_trg_NerubianFour
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[5]=gg_trg_RazormanFour
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[6]=gg_trg_LizardFour
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[7]=gg_trg_DragonFour
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[8]=gg_trg_FurlporgFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[9]=gg_trg_OwlbearFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[10]=gg_trg_RockFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[11]=gg_trg_ReverantFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[12]=gg_trg_NerubianFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[13]=gg_trg_RazormanFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[14]=gg_trg_LizardFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[15]=gg_trg_DragonFive
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[16]=gg_trg_FurldorgSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[17]=gg_trg_OwlbearSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[18]=gg_trg_RockSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[19]=gg_trg_ReverantSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[20]=gg_trg_NerubianSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[21]=gg_trg_RazormanSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[22]=gg_trg_LizardSix
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Medium_Trg[23]=gg_trg_DragonSix

// Trigger: Setup Creep Spawn Triggers Hard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Hard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[0]=gg_trg_FurldorgSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[1]=gg_trg_OwlbearSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[2]=gg_trg_RockSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[3]=gg_trg_ReverantSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[4]=gg_trg_NerubianSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[5]=gg_trg_RazormanSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[6]=gg_trg_LizardSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[7]=gg_trg_DragonSeven
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[8]=gg_trg_FurldorgEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[9]=gg_trg_OwlbearEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[10]=gg_trg_RockEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[11]=gg_trg_ReverantEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[12]=gg_trg_NerubianEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[13]=gg_trg_RazormanEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[14]=gg_trg_LizardEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[15]=gg_trg_DragonEight
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[16]=gg_trg_FurldorgNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[17]=gg_trg_OwlbearNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[18]=gg_trg_RockNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[19]=gg_trg_ReverantNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[20]=gg_trg_NerubianNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[21]=gg_trg_RazormanNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[22]=gg_trg_LizardNine
    set udg_Mobs_Normal_Spawn_Hard_Trg[23]=gg_trg_DragonNine
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Hard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Hard, function Trig_Setup_Creep_Spawn_Triggers_Hard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Mobs Top
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Mobs_Top_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitWakeUpBJ(udg_Mobs_T_New_Unit)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Mobs_T_New_Unit, "move", udg_Mobs_Top_Destination)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_Mobs_T_New_Unit, GetUnitTypeId(udg_Mobs_T_New_Unit), bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Mobs_Top takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Top=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Top, function Trig_Move_Mobs_Top_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: DragonOne
//===========================================================================
function Trig_DragonOne_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('n007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) < 4 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_DragonOne_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n007', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Top_Origin, 270.00)
    set udg_Mobs_T_New_Unit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Top)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_DragonOne takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_DragonOne=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DragonOne, Condition(function Trig_DragonOne_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DragonOne, function Trig_DragonOne_Actions)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_DragonTen, Condition(function Trig_DragonTen_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_DragonTen, function Trig_DragonTen_Actions)
endfunction

    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n02J', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Top2_Origin, 270.00)
    set udg_Mobs_T2_New_Unit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Move_Creep_Top_Two)

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_NerubianTen takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_NerubianTen=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_NerubianTen)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_NerubianTen, 240.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_NerubianTen, Condition(function Trig_NerubianTen_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_NerubianTen, function Trig_NerubianTen_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Creep Bottom
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Creep_Bottom_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitWakeUpBJ(udg_Mobs_B_New_Unit)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Mobs_B_New_Unit, "move", udg_Mobs_Bottom_Destination)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_Mobs_B_New_Unit, GetUnitTypeId(udg_Mobs_B_New_Unit), bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Creep_Bottom takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Creep_Bottom=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Creep_Bottom, function Trig_Move_Creep_Bottom_Actions)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_RazormanTen, Condition(function Trig_RazormanTen_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RazormanTen, function Trig_RazormanTen_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Mobs Top Left
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Mobs_Top_Left_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitWakeUpBJ(udg_Mobs_TL_New_Unit)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Mobs_TL_New_Unit, "move", udg_Mobs_Top_Left_Destination)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_Mobs_TL_New_Unit, GetUnitTypeId(udg_Mobs_TL_New_Unit), bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Top_Left=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Top_Left, function Trig_Move_Mobs_Top_Left_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_RockFour_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'n00G', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Bottom_Left_Origin, 270.00)
    set udg_Mobs_BL_New_Unit=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Left)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_RockTen, function Trig_RockTen_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Move Mobs Bottom Right
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Right_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitWakeUpBJ(udg_Mobs_BR_New_Unit)
    call IssuePointOrderLocBJ(udg_Mobs_BR_New_Unit, "move", udg_Mobs_Bottom_Right_Destination)
    call TriggerSleepAction(8.00)
    call ReplaceUnitBJ(udg_Mobs_BR_New_Unit, GetUnitTypeId(udg_Mobs_BR_New_Unit), bj_UNIT_STATE_METHOD_RELATIVE)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Right takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Right=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Right, function Trig_Move_Mobs_Bottom_Right_Actions)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fel_Orc_Two, function Trig_Fel_Orc_Two_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Turn On Fel Orcs Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn, 5)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn, function Trig_Turn_On_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fel Orcs Respawn
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h02F', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( CountLivingPlayerUnitsOfTypeId('h02G', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE)) < 3 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetRandomInt(1, 2) == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Func001C() ) then
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02F', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Fel_Orc_Respawn_P, 270.00)
    else
        call CreateNUnitsAtLoc(1, 'h02G', Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Mobs_Fel_Orc_Respawn_P, 270.00)
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn, 10.00)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn, Condition(function Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fel_Orcs_Respawn, function Trig_Fel_Orcs_Respawn_Actions)
endfunction

    endif
endfunction
