// Trigger: Kido Gauntlet
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I055') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Func003C() ) then
        call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 5000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_MELEE, DAMAGE_TYPE_FIRE)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kido_Gauntlet takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kido_Gauntlet=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Kido_Gauntlet, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Kido_Gauntlet, Condition(function Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kido_Gauntlet, function Trig_Kido_Gauntlet_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sword of Fire
//
// Fixed location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sword_of_Fire_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I06T' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Fire_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect swordEffect
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\s_RunningFlame Aura.mdx")
    set swordEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
    set udg_Items_SOF_Loop_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Items_SOF_Loop_Integer > 20
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitDamagePointLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 100.00, udg_Items_Temp_Position, 2500.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_SHADOW_STRIKE)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 2500.00 ))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
        set udg_Items_SOF_Loop_Integer=udg_Items_SOF_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call DestroyEffect(swordEffect)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sword_of_Fire takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sword_of_Fire=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sword_of_Fire, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sword_of_Fire, Condition(function Trig_Sword_of_Fire_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sword_of_Fire, function Trig_Sword_of_Fire_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sword of Death
//
// Fixed location leaks.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sword_of_Death_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I06U' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sword_of_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect swordEffect
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    call AddSpecialEffectTargetUnitBJ("origin", GetTriggerUnit(), "war3mapImported\\VoodooAura.mdx")
    set swordEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
    set udg_Items_SOD_Loop_Integer=0
    loop
        exitwhen udg_Items_SOD_Loop_Integer > 20
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
        call UnitDamagePointLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), 0, 450.00, udg_Items_Temp_Position, 5000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_CHAOS, DAMAGE_TYPE_SHADOW_STRIKE)
        call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetTriggerUnit()) + 5000.00 ))
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.10)
        set udg_Items_SOD_Loop_Integer=udg_Items_SOD_Loop_Integer + 1
    endloop
    call DestroyEffect(swordEffect)
    call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sword_of_Death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sword_of_Death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sword_of_Death, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sword_of_Death, Condition(function Trig_Sword_of_Death_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sword_of_Death, function Trig_Sword_of_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Tome of Power 100
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Tome_of_Power_100_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetSoldItem()) == 'I04F' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tome_of_Power_100_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetHeroLevelBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), ( GetHeroLevel(GetBuyingUnit()) + 100 ), false)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Tome_of_Power_100 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Tome_of_Power_100=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Tome_of_Power_100, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Tome_of_Power_100, Condition(function Trig_Tome_of_Power_100_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Tome_of_Power_100, function Trig_Tome_of_Power_100_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Angel Power Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I02W') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Func004Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 90 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect itemEffect
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Items_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FreezingRing.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        set itemEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Func004Func007C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 5000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyEffect(itemEffect)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_Power_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_Power_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Effect, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Effect, Condition(function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Effect, function Trig_Angel_Power_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Starry Power Effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetAttacker(), 'I050') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Func004Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect itemEffect
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Items_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FreezingRing.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        set itemEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        if ( Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Func004Func007C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 10000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        else
        endif
        call DestroyEffect(itemEffect)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Starry_Power_Effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Starry_Power_Effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Starry_Power_Effect, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Starry_Power_Effect, Condition(function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Starry_Power_Effect, function Trig_Starry_Power_Effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Fragments
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountUnitsInGroup(udg_Craft_Group) != 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Func003Func007002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I077', GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 1)) == 'I076' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 2)) == 'I076' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 3)) == 'I076' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Fire_Fragments_Func003C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetSoldItem())
        call RemoveItem(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 1))
        call RemoveItem(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 2))
        call RemoveItem(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 3))
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_convert, 100, gg_unit_hsor_0064)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Craft_Fragments), function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Func003Func007002)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetSoldItem())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Fragments takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Fragments=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Fire_Fragments, gg_unit_hsor_0064, EVENT_UNIT_SELL_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fire_Fragments, Condition(function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Fragments, function Trig_Fire_Fragments_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

        call RemoveItem(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 3))
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_convert, 100, gg_unit_hsor_0064)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Craft_Fragments), function Trig_Water_Fragments_Func003Func010002)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 'I073') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 'I075') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    if ( Trig_Water_Earth_Thunder_Fragments_Func003C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetSoldItem())
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 'I047'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 'I073'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetBuyingUnit(), 'I075'))
        call PlaySoundOnUnitBJ(gg_snd_convert, 100, gg_unit_hsor_0064)
        call ForGroupBJ(GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Craft_Fragments), function Trig_Water_Earth_Thunder_Fragments_Func003Func010002)
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetSoldItem())
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Remove item
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Remove_item_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetSoldItem())
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Remove_item=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Remove_item, gg_unit_hsor_0064, EVENT_UNIT_SELL_ITEM)

endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Untitled Trigger 002
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_002_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Craft_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(gg_rct_Craft_Fragments)
    call TriggerSleepAction(1.00)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Craft_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Untitled_Trigger_002 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_002=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_002, 2.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Untitled_Trigger_002, function Trig_Untitled_Trigger_002_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Fire Fragment
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Fire_Fragment_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I077' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Fire_Fragment_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Fire_Fragment_Unit=GetTriggerUnit()
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Fire_Fragment_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(GetTriggerUnit(), 0) * 10 ), 0)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call BlzSetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Fire_Fragment_Unit, ( BlzGetUnitBaseDamage(udg_Fire_Fragment_Unit, 0) / 10 ), 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Fire_Fragment takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Fire_Fragment=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Fire_Fragment, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Fire_Fragment, Condition(function Trig_Fire_Fragment_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Fire_Fragment, function Trig_Fire_Fragment_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Thunder Fragment
//
// Simplified Trigger.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I079' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func003Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetEnumUnit()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitIdType(GetUnitTypeId(GetEnumUnit()), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitEnemy(GetEnumUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetEnumUnit()), udg_Neutrals) == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func003Func001C() ) then
    else
        call GroupRemoveUnitSimple(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    endif
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetEnumUnit())
    call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\LightningWrath.mdx")
    call DestroyEffectBJ(GetLastCreatedEffectBJ())
    call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetEnumUnit(), udg_Spells_Temp_Real, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Spells_Temp_Position)
endfunction

function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Real=( 5.00 * I2R(GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, GetTriggerUnit(), true)) )
    set udg_Spells_Temp_Group=GetUnitsInRectAll(GetPlayableMapRect())
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Spells_Temp_Group, function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func003A)
    set udg_Random_Temp_Group=GetRandomSubGroup(2, udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Random_Temp_Group, function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Func005A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Spells_Temp_Group)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Random_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Thunder_Fragment takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Thunder_Fragment=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Thunder_Fragment, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_USE_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Thunder_Fragment, Condition(function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Thunder_Fragment, function Trig_Thunder_Fragment_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rune of Water Acquiers
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'I07A' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( 100 * GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) ) ))
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers, Condition(function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers, function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Acquiers_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Rune of Water Update
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Update_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I07A') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Update_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call BlzSetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit(), ( BlzGetUnitMaxHP(GetTriggerUnit()) + ( 100 * ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) - udg_Hero_Level[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) ) ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Rune_of_Water_Update takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Update=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Update, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Update, Condition(function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Update_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Rune_of_Water_Update, function Trig_Rune_of_Water_Update_Actions)
endfunction

    return true

    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_Acquiers_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Stone_of_Elements_Regen=( udg_Stone_of_Elements_Regen + ( 4 * GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) ) )
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

    set gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_Acquiers=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_Acquiers, function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_Acquiers_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    set udg_Stone_of_Elements_Regen=( udg_Stone_of_Elements_Regen + ( 4 * ( GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit()) - udg_Hero_Level[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))] ) ) )
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_Update, function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_Update_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stone of Elements start timer
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'ankh' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Stone_of_Elements_Timer, false, 1.00)
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer, Condition(function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer, function Trig_Stone_of_Elements_start_timer_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stone of element effect
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetFilterUnit(), 'ankh') == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Func002002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitLifeBJ(GetEnumUnit(), ( GetUnitStateSwap(UNIT_STATE_LIFE, GetEnumUnit()) + I2R(udg_Stone_of_Elements_Regen) ))
endfunction

function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Stone_of_Elements_Group=GetUnitsInRectMatching(GetPlayableMapRect(), Condition(function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Stone_of_Elements_Group, function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Func002002)
    call StartTimerBJ(udg_Stone_of_Elements_Timer, false, 1.00)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stone_of_element_effect takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stone_of_element_effect=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerExpireEventBJ(gg_trg_Stone_of_element_effect, udg_Stone_of_Elements_Timer)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stone_of_element_effect, function Trig_Stone_of_element_effect_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Upgrade Hero level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Upgrade_Hero_level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(0.01)
    set udg_Hero_Level[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))]=GetHeroLevel(GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Upgrade_Hero_level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Upgrade_Hero_level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Upgrade_Hero_level, EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Upgrade_Hero_level, function Trig_Upgrade_Hero_level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Reset Hero Previous Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Hero_Level[udg_Player_Temp_Integer]=1
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level, function Trig_Reset_Hero_Previous_Level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sacred protection
//
// Merged 2 triggers.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sacred_protection_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'glsk') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacred_protection_Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetAttacker()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacred_protection_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacred_protection_Func005Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetAttacker()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacred_protection_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance >= 90 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sacred_protection_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect itemEffect
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Sacred_protection_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Items_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Pillar of Flame Orange.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        set itemEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
        if ( Trig_Sacred_protection_Func004Func006C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), GetAttacker(), 50000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call DestroyEffect(itemEffect)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Sacred_protection_Func005C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Items_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\FreezingRing.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        set itemEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
        if ( Trig_Sacred_protection_Func005Func006C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttacker(), GetAttackedUnitBJ(), 50000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call DestroyEffect(itemEffect)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sacred_protection takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sacred_protection=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sacred_protection, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sacred_protection, Condition(function Trig_Sacred_protection_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sacred_protection, function Trig_Sacred_protection_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Supreme Cerebrus Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03T') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Func004Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitAliveBJ(GetAttacker()) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_RandomChance <= 10 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    local effect itemEffect
    set udg_Global_RandomChance=GetRandomInt(1, 100)
    if ( Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Func004C() ) then
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
        set udg_Items_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetAttacker())
        call AddSpecialEffectLocBJ(udg_Items_Temp_Position, "war3mapImported\\Rain of Fire III.mdx")
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Items_Temp_Position)
        set itemEffect=bj_lastCreatedEffect
        if ( Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Func004Func006C() ) then
            call UnitDamageTargetBJ(GetAttackedUnitBJ(), GetAttacker(), 10000.00, ATTACK_TYPE_NORMAL, DAMAGE_TYPE_UNIVERSAL)
        else
        endif
        call TriggerSleepAction(0.50)
        call DestroyEffect(itemEffect)
        call EnableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_ATTACKED)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power, Condition(function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power, function Trig_Supreme_Cerebrus_Power_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Divine Excalibur
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Divine_Excalibur_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I041') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05B') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03I') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04R') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04W') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Divine_Excalibur_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I041'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05B'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03I'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04R'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04W'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01Q', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_oneandonly)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " has obtained the |cffff8c00Divine Excalibur|r. He becomes nearly unstoppable. |c00ff0000BEWARE!!!|r" ))
endfunction

        return false

function Trig_Holy_Warfare_Weapon_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC92'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00Z'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00V'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01B'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01C', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_oneandonly)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " has obtained the |c00ffff00Holy Warfare|r. |c00ff0000BEWARE!!!|r" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================

    set gg_trg_Holy_Warfare_Weapon=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Holy_Warfare_Weapon, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Holy_Warfare_Weapon, Condition(function Trig_Holy_Warfare_Weapon_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Holy_Warfare_Weapon, function Trig_Holy_Warfare_Weapon_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Master Strike
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Master_Strike_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I018') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I016') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I019') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00V') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I017') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Master_Strike_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I018'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I016'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05H'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I019'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I00V'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I017'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I05I', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_oneandonly)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " has obtained the |c00ffff00Master Strike|r. |c00ff0000BEWARE!!!|r" ))
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Master_Strike, function Trig_Master_Strike_Actions)

        return false

        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I059') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05C') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true

    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05I'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I059'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I05C'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(2.00)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('k3m1', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_oneandonly)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " has obtained the |c00FF8000God's Radiance|r. |c00ff0000BEWARE!|r" ))

    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Zealot_Armor_Item_Manual, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Zealot_Armor_Item_Manual, Condition(function Trig_Zealot_Armor_Item_Manual_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Zealot_Armor_Item_Manual, function Trig_Zealot_Armor_Item_Manual_Actions)

        return false

    return true

    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03B', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01I') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC85') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC86') == true ) ) then
        return false

        return false

    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01I'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01H', GetTriggerUnit())

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02A'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I01P', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual, Condition(function Trig_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual, function Trig_Angel_Torture_Item_Manual_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Angel Torture Orb
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01P') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC88') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetForLoopIndexA())) == 'IC88' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Items_Temp_Integer >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=( udg_Items_Temp_Integer + 1 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Func005C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC88'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'IC88'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01P'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02U', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_Torture_Orb takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Orb=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Orb, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Orb, Condition(function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_Torture_Orb, function Trig_Angel_Torture_Orb_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_Power_Item_Manual takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_Power_Item_Manual=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Item_Manual, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Item_Manual, Condition(function Trig_Angel_Power_Item_Manual_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Item_Manual, function Trig_Angel_Power_Item_Manual_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Angel Power Orb
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01H') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02U') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02V') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01T') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02W') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Func002C() ) then
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_mk3_error)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "|c00ff0000ERROR!!!|r " + GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) + ( " has attempted to duplicate the |c0000ff00Angel Item Set.|r" + ( " You can only create one |c0000ff00Angel Item Set|r at a time." + ( " Please remove all of the Angel Power Orbs" + ( " from your inventory  in order to start Creating the |c0000ff00Angel Item Set.|r" ) ) ) ) ))
    else
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01T'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02V'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I01H'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02U'))
        call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I02W', GetTriggerUnit())
        call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_Warning)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( ( "|c00ff0000WARNING!|r " + GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) ) + " has obtained" ) + ( ( " all of the required items to complete the" ) + " |c0000ff00Angel Arena Item Set.|r" ) ))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_Power_Orb takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_Power_Orb=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Orb, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Orb, Condition(function Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_Power_Orb, function Trig_Angel_Power_Orb_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif

        return false
    endif
    return true

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Celestial Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Celestial_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02Z') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I007') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Power_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetForLoopIndexA())) == 'I007' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Power_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Items_Temp_Integer >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Celestial_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Celestial_Power_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=( udg_Items_Temp_Integer + 1 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Celestial_Power_Func005C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I007'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I007'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02Z'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I031', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Celestial_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Celestial_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Celestial_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Celestial_Power, Condition(function Trig_Celestial_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Celestial_Power, function Trig_Celestial_Power_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Cereberus Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I030') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02O') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Func002Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), GetForLoopIndexA())) == 'I02O' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Items_Temp_Integer >= 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=0
    set bj_forLoopAIndex=1
    set bj_forLoopAIndexEnd=6
    loop
        exitwhen bj_forLoopAIndex > bj_forLoopAIndexEnd
        if ( Trig_Cereberus_Power_Func002Func001C() ) then
            set udg_Items_Temp_Integer=( udg_Items_Temp_Integer + 1 )
        else
        endif
        set bj_forLoopAIndex=bj_forLoopAIndex + 1
    endloop
    if ( Trig_Cereberus_Power_Func005C() ) then
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02O'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I02O'))
        call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I030'))
        call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I032', GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Cereberus_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Cereberus_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Cereberus_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Cereberus_Power, Condition(function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Cereberus_Power, function Trig_Cereberus_Power_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true

    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03U'))
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I04U', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Item_Manual, Condition(function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Item_Manual_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Item_Manual, function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Item_Manual_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Supreme Celeberus Power
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04U') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03W') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I031') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( UnitHasItemOfTypeBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I032') == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I03W'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I031'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I032'))
    call RemoveItem(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'I04U'))
    call TriggerSleepAction(5.00)
    call UnitAddItemByIdSwapped('I03T', GetTriggerUnit())
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_oneandonly)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())) + " has obtained the |c00ffff00Supreme Celeberus Power|r. Their powers have been increased dramatically. |c00ff0000 BEWARE!!!|r" ))
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_PICKUP_ITEM)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power, Condition(function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Supreme_Celeberus_Power, function Trig_Supreme_Celeberus_Power_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Avatar, function Trig_Avatar_Actions)
endfunction

        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tome_of_Experience_Pickup_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetItemTypeId(GetManipulatedItem()) == 'texp' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Tome_of_Experience_Pickup_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Tome_of_Experience_Pickup_Func001C() ) then
        call UnitRemoveItemSwapped(GetItemOfTypeFromUnitBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), 'texp'), GetTriggerUnit())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Leave Game
//
// Combined 13 triggers into 1, cleaned group leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Leave_Game_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player_Temp=GetTriggerPlayer()
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Leave_Game)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Leave_Game takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Leave_Game=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Leave_Game, function Trig_Leave_Game_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Generic Leave Game
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func001002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( GetUnitTypeId(GetFilterUnit()) != 'n023' )
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call RemoveUnit(GetEnumUnit())
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_Team1) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func008C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( CountPlayersInForceBJ(udg_Team2) == 0 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(udg_Player_Temp, Condition(function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func001002002))
    call ForGroupBJ(udg_Player_Temp_Group, function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func002A)
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Player_Temp_Group)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemLabelBJ(udg_Player_Temp, udg_Leaderboard, "TRIGSTR_1474")
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_Player_Temp, udg_Team1)
    call ForceRemovePlayerSimple(udg_Player_Temp, udg_Team2)
    if ( Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func007C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="All players of Team 1 have left the game. The match is forfeited to Team 2!"
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Func008C() ) then
        set udg_GameMode_LosingTeam=udg_Team2
        set udg_GameMode_WinningTeam=udg_Team1
        set udg_GameMode_VictoryString="All players of Team 2 have left the game. The match is forfeited to Team 1!"
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Win_Sequence)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Generic_Leave_Game takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Generic_Leave_Game=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Generic_Leave_Game, function Trig_Generic_Leave_Game_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Sell All Items
//
// Combined 12 triggers.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Sell_All_Items_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CA' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) == 'n04P' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sell_All_Items_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Sell_All_Items_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Sell_All_Items_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Player_Temp_Integer > 6
            call UnitDropItemTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Player_Temp_Integer), gg_unit_hpea_0095)
            set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=udg_Player_Temp_Integer + 1
        endloop
    else
        set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Player_Temp_Integer > 6
            call UnitDropItemTargetBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), UnitItemInSlotBJ(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Player_Temp_Integer), gg_unit_hpea_0150)
            set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=udg_Player_Temp_Integer + 1
        endloop
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Sell_All_Items takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Sell_All_Items=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Sell_All_Items, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Sell_All_Items, Condition(function Trig_Sell_All_Items_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Sell_All_Items, function Trig_Sell_All_Items_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Stars Call
//
// Combined 2 triggers, fixed unit group leak.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Stars_Call_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'A0CB' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stars_Call_Func002002002 takes nothing returns boolean
    return ( IsUnitType(GetFilterUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true )
endfunction

function Trig_Stars_Call_Func003Func002A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Team2_Stash_Point)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_010, GetTriggerPlayer(), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Stars_Call_Func003Func003A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetEnumUnit(), udg_Team1_Stash_Point)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_008, GetTriggerPlayer(), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Stars_Call_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Stars_Call_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call TriggerSleepAction(4.00)
    set udg_Player_Temp_Group=GetUnitsOfPlayerMatching(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), Condition(function Trig_Stars_Call_Func002002002))
    if ( Trig_Stars_Call_Func003C() ) then
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Player_Temp_Group, function Trig_Stars_Call_Func003Func003A)
    else
        call ForGroupBJ(udg_Player_Temp_Group, function Trig_Stars_Call_Func003Func002A)
    endif
    call DestroyGroup(udg_Player_Temp_Group)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Stars_Call takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Stars_Call=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Stars_Call, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Stars_Call, Condition(function Trig_Stars_Call_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Stars_Call, function Trig_Stars_Call_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Give Teleport Ability
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Give_Teleport_Ability_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Give_Teleport_Ability_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call UnitAddAbilityBJ('AIxk', GetTriggerUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Give_Teleport_Ability takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(0), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(1), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(2), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(3), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(4), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(5), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(6), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(7), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(8), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(9), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(10), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerRegisterPlayerUnitEventSimple(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Player(11), EVENT_PLAYER_HERO_LEVEL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, Condition(function Trig_Give_Teleport_Ability_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Give_Teleport_Ability, function Trig_Give_Teleport_Ability_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Teleport
//
// Merged 24  triggers for this.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Teleport_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetSpellAbilityId() == 'AIxk' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Teleport_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Player_Magic_Storage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_Player_Temp_Position, bj_UNIT_FACING)
    call SetUnitInvulnerable(udg_Player_Magic_Storage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Player_Temp_Position)
    call TriggerSleepAction(10.00)
    call SetUnitPositionLocFacingBJ(udg_Player_Magic_Storage[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], udg_Player_Stash_Position[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()))], bj_UNIT_FACING)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Teleport takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Teleport=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Teleport, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SPELL_EFFECT)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Teleport, Condition(function Trig_Teleport_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Teleport, function Trig_Teleport_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Hero Chosen After
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()) == 'e00K' ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))] == false ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Func001C() ) then
        set udg_Player_Chooser=GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit())
        call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Random_Hero)
    else
    endif
    call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Hero_Chosen_After takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Hero_Chosen_After=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Hero_Chosen_After, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Hero_Chosen_After, Condition(function Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Hero_Chosen_After, function Trig_Hero_Chosen_After_Actions)
endfunction

    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_U00T_0045, 'A036')
    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_U00T_0045, 'A06M')
    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_U00T_0045, 'A04C')
    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_U00T_0045, 'A046')
    call SelectHeroSkill(gg_unit_U00T_0045, 'A000')
    call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
endfunction
