//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Random Hero
//
// Because, why have multiple copies of same actions on multiple triggers, when you can unify it all to 1 trigger, makes for easier bug-hunting/fixing.
// Add random-picking-no-hero protection.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Random_Hero_Func009A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetLastCreatedUnit()), false, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Random_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=GetRandomInt(1, udg_Player_MaxHeroes)
    set udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Player_Chooser)]=true
    set udg_Player_Temp_Position=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
    call CreateNUnitsAtLocFacingLocBJ(1, udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_Temp_Integer], udg_Player_Chooser, udg_Player_Temp_Position, udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(udg_Player_Chooser, udg_Player_Temp_Position, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Player_Temp_Position)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( GetPlayerName(udg_Player_Chooser) + " has randomed " ) + GetUnitName(GetLastCreatedUnit()) ))
    set udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_Player_Chooser)]=GetLastCreatedUnit()
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Random_Hero_Func009A)
    set udg_Player_MaxHeroes=( udg_Player_MaxHeroes - 1 )
    call ClearSelectionForPlayer(udg_Player_Chooser)
    call SelectUnitAddForPlayer(GetLastCreatedUnit(), udg_Player_Chooser)
    set udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_Temp_Integer]=udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_MaxHeroes]
    set udg_Player_MaxHeroes=( udg_Player_MaxHeroes - 1 )
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Random_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Random_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Random_Hero, function Trig_Random_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Pick Hero
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Pick_Hero_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetSoldUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002Func001Func001C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_Temp_Integer] == GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002Func011A takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerUnitAvailableBJ(GetUnitTypeId(GetSoldUnit()), false, GetEnumPlayer())
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))] == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Pick_Hero_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002C() ) then
        call RemoveUnit(GetSoldUnit())
    else
        set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=1
        loop
            exitwhen udg_Player_Temp_Integer > udg_Player_MaxHeroes
            if ( Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002Func001Func001C() ) then
                set udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_Temp_Integer]=udg_Tavern_Heroes[udg_Player_MaxHeroes]
                set udg_Player_MaxHeroes=( udg_Player_MaxHeroes - 1 )
            else
            endif
            set udg_Player_Temp_Integer=udg_Player_Temp_Integer + 1
        endloop
        set udg_Global_HasPlayerChosenHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))]=true
        set udg_Player_Temp_Position=GetRandomLocInRect(gg_rct_Hero_Start_Spawn)
        call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetSoldUnit(), udg_Player_Temp_Position)
        call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()), udg_Player_Temp_Position, 0)
        call RemoveLocation(udg_Player_Temp_Position)
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( GetPlayerName(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit())) + " has picked " ) + GetUnitName(GetSoldUnit()) ))
        set udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))]=GetSoldUnit()
        set udg_Player_Temp_Force=GetPlayersByMapControl(MAP_CONTROL_USER)
        call ForForce(udg_Player_Temp_Force, function Trig_Pick_Hero_Func002Func011A)
        call DestroyForce(udg_Player_Temp_Force)
        call ClearSelectionForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))
        call SelectUnitAddForPlayer(GetSoldUnit(), GetOwningPlayer(GetSoldUnit()))
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Pick_Hero takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Pick_Hero=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_Pick_Hero, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_SELL)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Pick_Hero, Condition(function Trig_Pick_Hero_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Pick_Hero, function Trig_Pick_Hero_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Upgraded Hero Register
//
// Merged all the extra hero pick triggers into this one + custom script above, cuz why not.
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Upgraded_Hero_Register_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Enigma
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H000'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I006'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // God
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='N000'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00C'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Holy Spirit
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00T'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00B'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Holy Avenger
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00O'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00D'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Lucifer
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='HC19'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00F'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Death Knight
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00B'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I008'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Death
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='HC33'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00H'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Hell Spawn
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00R'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00E'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Jesus
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='UC98'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I009'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Mother Earth
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00Q'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00G'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Nature
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00P'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00M'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Arch Angel
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='UC99'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00I'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Satan
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U000'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00A'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Sand Man
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='UC84'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00J'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Commander
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00S'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00K'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Fallen Angel
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='UC34'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00L'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Divine God
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='UC95'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00N'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Alucard
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H00I'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I05Y'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Upgraded_Hero_Register takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Upgraded_Hero_Register=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Upgraded_Hero_Register, function Trig_Upgraded_Hero_Register_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Upgraded New Hero Register
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    // Light Templar
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01F'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I026'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Fur Knight
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='N04S'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I00O'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Eclipe Elemental
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01W'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='gmfr'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Assassin of aC
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O014'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='jpnt'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // O'Dimm
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O013'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='ledg'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Priestess of Eclipse
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O012'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I05Z'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Rogue of the Eclipse
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O00Y'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I06N'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Spirit of the Sea
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O010'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I06P'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The God of Thieves
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O011'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I06R'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Dragon Elementalist
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O00Z'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I06O'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Dark Templar
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01E'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I027'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Zealot of Power
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01G'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I021'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Ulquiorra
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00C'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I034'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Golem King
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01H'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I035'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Master of Gates and Keys
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01I'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='mgtk'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Eclipse Knight
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00D'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I03E'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Twilight Wolf
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00E'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I03O'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Icy Illidan
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01O'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I03X'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Idl0w the Son Thunder
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='E00B'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I04A'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Creator Assistant
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='E00D'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I04B'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Creator
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='E00G'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I04G'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Light Templar
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00K'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I024'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Yara
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00F'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I04E'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Shiny Green
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='E00E'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I04D'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Angel
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='N044'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I023'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Holy King
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01S'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I01Y'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Gods Slayer
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='O00X'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I01X'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Destructor
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00J'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I025'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Corrupt God
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='N03R'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I01W'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Burst-Fire Lord
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='N047'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I02G'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // The Eclipse Guardian
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01T'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I01S'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Divine Knight
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01U'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I02C'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Mystic
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01V'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I022'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Ballistic
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='E00I'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I01V'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Ranger of Nightfall
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H01X'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='I02N'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Arcana767
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='H02H'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='engs'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
    // Spirit Guardian
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero='U00Q'
    set udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item='wtlg'
    call UpgradedHero_Register(udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero , udg_Player_Upgraded_Hero_Item)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register, function Trig_Upgraded_New_Hero_Register_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Kill LeaderBoard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 20 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 40 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func004C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 60 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func005C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 80 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func006C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 100 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func007C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_GameMode_Normal_Kill2Win == 120 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func002C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(23), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(20) + " Team Kills" ) ), 20)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func003C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(23), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(40) + " Team Kills" ) ), 40)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func004C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(23), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(60) + " Team Kills" ) ), 60)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func005C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(80) + " Team Kills" ) ), 80)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func006C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(100) + " Team Kills" ) ), 100)
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Func007C() ) then
        call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), ( "Win = " + ( I2S(120) + " Team Kills" ) ), 120)
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Kill_LeaderBoard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Kill_LeaderBoard=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Kill_LeaderBoard)
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventSingle(gg_trg_Kill_LeaderBoard, 30.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Kill_LeaderBoard, function Trig_Kill_LeaderBoard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Up Leaderboard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Func008002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Func012002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), GetPlayerName(GetEnumPlayer()), 0)
endfunction

function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call LeaderboardDisplayBJ(false, udg_Leaderboard)
    call DestroyLeaderboardBJ(udg_Leaderboard)
    call CreateLeaderboardBJ(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_091")
    set udg_Leaderboard=GetLastCreatedLeaderboard()
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), "TRIGSTR_506", 0)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemLabelColorBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueColorBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call ForForce(udg_Team1, function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Func008002)
    call LeaderboardAddItemBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), "TRIGSTR_507", 0)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemLabelColorBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueColorBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call ForForce(udg_Team2, function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Func012002)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemStyleBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), true, false, false)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemLabelColorBJ(Player(bj_PLAYER_NEUTRAL_VICTIM), GetLastCreatedLeaderboard(), 100, 100, 100, 0)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Up_Leaderboard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Up_Leaderboard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Up_Leaderboard, function Trig_Set_Up_Leaderboard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Update Leaderboard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Update_Leaderboard_Func001002 takes nothing returns nothing
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueBJ(GetEnumPlayer(), udg_Leaderboard, udg_Leaderboard_Kills[GetConvertedPlayerId(GetEnumPlayer())])
endfunction

function Trig_Update_Leaderboard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ForForce(GetPlayersAll(), function Trig_Update_Leaderboard_Func001002)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE), udg_Leaderboard, udg_GameMode_Classic_Team1_Kills)
    call LeaderboardSetPlayerItemValueBJ(Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_PASSIVE), udg_Leaderboard, udg_GameMode_Classic_Team2_Kills)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Update_Leaderboard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Update_Leaderboard, function Trig_Update_Leaderboard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Set Up Multiboard
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Set_Up_Multiboard_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call CreateMultiboardBJ(2, 2, "TRIGSTR_765")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNOrcCaptureFlag.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemIconBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 2, "ReplaceableTextures\\CommandButtons\\BTNHumanCaptureFlag.blp")
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 2, true, true)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemStyleBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 2, true, false)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, "TRIGSTR_766")
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 2, "TRIGSTR_816")
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 1, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 1, 2, 10.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, 5.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemWidthBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 2, 5.00)
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 1, I2S(udg_GameMode_CTF_Team1_Points))
    call MultiboardSetItemValueBJ(GetLastCreatedMultiboard(), 2, 2, I2S(udg_GameMode_CTF_Team2_Points))
    call MultiboardDisplayBJ(true, GetLastCreatedMultiboard())
    set udg_Multiboard=GetLastCreatedMultiboard()
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Set_Up_Multiboard takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Set_Up_Multiboard=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Set_Up_Multiboard, function Trig_Set_Up_Multiboard_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Enter Vault Team1
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Enter_Vault_Team1_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_264)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Enter_Vault_Team1 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Enter_Vault_Team1=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Enter_Vault_Team1, gg_rct_Region_266)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enter_Vault_Team1, function Trig_Enter_Vault_Team1_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Region_308, function Trig_Region_308_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Exit from Region 308
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Exit_from_Region_308_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Region_308_Out)
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_from_Region_308)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_from_Region_308 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_from_Region_308=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Exit_from_Region_308, gg_unit_nfgo_0466, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_from_Region_308, function Trig_Exit_from_Region_308_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Region 308 Out
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Region_308_Out_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Secret_Zone_In)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Region_308_Out takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Region_308_Out=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Region_308_Out)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Region_308_Out, gg_rct_Region_308)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Region_308_Out, function Trig_Region_308_Out_Actions)
endfunction

    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Map_Center_StartPoint)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Map_Center_StartPoint, 0)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_LotA, function Trig_Exit_LotA_Actions)

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Yara_site_to_sc, function Trig_Yara_site_to_sc_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Chicken Out 2
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Chicken_Out_2_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_Udea_0272) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_HC19_0353) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_Eevi_0348) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_H02Z_0055) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_U00T_0045) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_H00I_0354) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetTriggerUnit()) != GetUnitTypeId(gg_unit_H01P_0352) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Chicken_Out_2_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvent_SecretShop_Point1)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Chicken_Out_2 takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Chicken_Out_2=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Chicken_Out_2, gg_rct_Ellite_7)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Chicken_Out_2, Condition(function Trig_Chicken_Out_2_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Chicken_Out_2, function Trig_Chicken_Out_2_Actions)
endfunction

endfunction

//===========================================================================
function Trig_Shadow_Infernal_Death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call KillUnit(gg_unit_nfrm_0136)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_ATg3_3032)
    call KillDestructable(gg_dest_ATg3_3033)
endfunction

    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Shadow_Infernal_Death, function Trig_Shadow_Infernal_Death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Ulqiorra
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Ulqiorra_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Ulqiorra_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Region_224)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call CameraSetupApplyForPlayer(true, gg_cam_Camera_016, GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Ulqiorra takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Ulqiorra=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Ulqiorra, gg_rct_Ulqiorra_entrance)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Ulqiorra, Condition(function Trig_Ulqiorra_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Ulqiorra, function Trig_Ulqiorra_Actions)
endfunction

    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_GameEvent_SecretShop_Point1)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_GameEvent_SecretShop_Point1, 0)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Exit_from_Ballistic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Exit_from_Ballistic=CreateTrigger()
    call DisableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_from_Ballistic)
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Exit_from_Ballistic, gg_rct_Out_of_Ballistic)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Exit_from_Ballistic, function Trig_Exit_from_Ballistic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Enter to Ballistic
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Enter_to_Ballistic_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetEnteringUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Enter_to_Ballistic_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Ballistic)
    call SetUnitPositionLoc(GetTriggerUnit(), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call PanCameraToTimedLocForPlayer(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Transports_Temp_Position, 0)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Enter_to_Ballistic takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Enter_to_Ballistic=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterEnterRectSimple(gg_trg_Enter_to_Ballistic, gg_rct_To_Ballistic)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_Enter_to_Ballistic, Condition(function Trig_Enter_to_Ballistic_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Enter_to_Ballistic, function Trig_Enter_to_Ballistic_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Angel of Equilibrium death
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetUnitLoc(GetTriggerUnit())
    call CreateItemLoc(ChooseRandomItemBJ(8), udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
    call EnableTrigger(gg_trg_Exit_from_Angel_of_Equilibrium)
    call TriggerSleepAction(240.00)
    set udg_Transports_Temp_Position=GetRectCenter(gg_rct_Revive_Angel_of_Equilibrium)
    call ReviveHeroLoc(gg_unit_N049_0385, udg_Transports_Temp_Position, true)
    call RemoveLocation(udg_Transports_Temp_Position)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death, gg_unit_N049_0385, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death, function Trig_Angel_of_Equilibrium_death_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Open Eclipse Elemental Gate
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call ModifyGateBJ(bj_GATEOPERATION_OPEN, gg_dest_ATg4_0343)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterUnitEvent(gg_trg_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate, gg_unit_H01P_0352, EVENT_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate, function Trig_Open_Eclipse_Elemental_Gate_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Generic Tower Kills Action
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func005A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_ASCT_Gold_Compensation, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func007A takes nothing returns nothing
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction, GetEnumPlayer(), PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func010C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func011C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    call PlaySoundBJ(gg_snd_headshot)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "|c00ff0000YOU FOOL!|r " + GetPlayerName(udg_ASCT_Culprit) ) + ( " got OWNED by an Anti-Spawn Camp Tower that belongs to " + ( udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team_Name + "!" ) ) ))
    set udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero=udg_PlayerHero[GetConvertedPlayerId(udg_ASCT_Culprit)]
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "As a result, All players of " + udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team_Name ) + ( " receive " + ( I2S(udg_ASCT_Gold_Compensation) + " Gold Bonus." ) ) ))
    call ForForce(udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team, function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func005A)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "As for the punishment, " + udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team_Name ) + ( "players will each lose " + ( I2S(udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction) + " Gold." ) ) ))
    call ForForce(udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team, function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func007A)
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), ( ( "And the culprit who has started this whole mess shall lose an additional " + I2S(udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction_Cutprit) ) + "Gold!" ))
    call AdjustPlayerStateBJ(udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction_Cutprit, udg_ASCT_Culprit, PLAYER_STATE_RESOURCE_GOLD)
    if ( Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func010C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_494")
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SUB, IMinBJ(300, GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, false)))
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SUB, IMinBJ(300, GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, false)))
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SUB, IMinBJ(300, GetHeroStatBJ(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, false)))
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Func011C() ) then
        call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_495")
        call SetHeroLevelBJ(udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, 255, false)
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_STR, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SET, 1)
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_AGI, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SET, 1)
        call ModifyHeroStat(bj_HEROSTAT_INT, udg_ASCT_Temp_Hero, bj_MODIFYMETHOD_SET, 1)
    else
    endif
    call DisplayTextToForce(GetPlayersAll(), "TRIGSTR_508")
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action, function Trig_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: T1 Anti Spawncamp Tower Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team2) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == udg_Team1AntiTowerCreate ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team=udg_Team1
    set udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team=udg_Team2
    set udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team_Name="Team 1"
    set udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team_Name="Team 2"
    set udg_ASCT_Culprit=GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, Condition(function Trig_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, function Trig_T1_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: T2 Anti Spawncamp Tower Kills
//===========================================================================
function Trig_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Conditions takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( IsPlayerInForce(GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()), udg_Team1) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetUnitTypeId(GetKillingUnitBJ()) == udg_Team2AntiTowerCreate ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( IsUnitType(GetTriggerUnit(), UNIT_TYPE_HERO) == true ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    if ( not ( GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit()) != Player(PLAYER_NEUTRAL_AGGRESSIVE) ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team=udg_Team2
    set udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team=udg_Team1
    set udg_ASCT_Compensative_Team_Name="Team 2"
    set udg_ASCT_Deductive_Team_Name="Team 1"
    set udg_ASCT_Culprit=GetOwningPlayer(GetTriggerUnit())
    call TriggerExecute(gg_trg_Generic_Tower_Kills_Action)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterAnyUnitEventBJ(gg_trg_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, EVENT_PLAYER_UNIT_DEATH)
    call TriggerAddCondition(gg_trg_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, Condition(function Trig_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Conditions))
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills, function Trig_T2_Anti_Spawncamp_Tower_Kills_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
// Trigger: Anti SpawnCamp Tower Offense Level
//===========================================================================
function Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Func002C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense == 1 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Func003C takes nothing returns boolean
    if ( not ( udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense == 2 ) ) then
        return false
    endif
    return true
endfunction

function Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Actions takes nothing returns nothing
    set udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense=( udg_ASCT_Level_Of_Offense + 1 )
    if ( Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Func002C() ) then
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Compensation=15000
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction=- 30000
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction_Cutprit=- 30000
    else
    endif
    if ( Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Func003C() ) then
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Compensation=50000
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction=- 75000
        set udg_ASCT_Gold_Deduction_Cutprit=- 80000
        call DisableTrigger(GetTriggeringTrigger())
    else
    endif
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function InitTrig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level takes nothing returns nothing
    set gg_trg_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level=CreateTrigger()
    call TriggerRegisterTimerEventPeriodic(gg_trg_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level, 900.00)
    call TriggerAddAction(gg_trg_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level, function Trig_Anti_SpawnCamp_Tower_Offense_Level_Actions)
endfunction

//===========================================================================
function RunInitializationTriggers takes nothing returns nothing
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Initialization)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Weather_change)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_Absorb_Impact_Initialize)
    call ConditionalTriggerExecute(gg_trg_WS_Damage_Reduction_Initial)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  TechTree
//*
//***************************************************************************

function InitTechTree_Player0 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(0), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

function InitTechTree_Player1 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(1), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

function InitTechTree_Player2 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(2), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

function InitTechTree_Player3 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(3), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

function InitTechTree_Player4 takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(4), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(5), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(6), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(7), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(8), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(9), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(10), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(11), 'Adtn', false)
endfunction

function InitTechTree takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(0), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(1), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(2), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(3), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(4), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(5), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(6), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(7), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(8), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(9), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(10), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
    call SetPlayerAbilityAvailable(Player(11), 'Adtn', false) // INLINED!!
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Players

function InitCustomPlayerSlots takes nothing returns nothing

    // Player 0
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(0), ConvertPlayerColor(0))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(0), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(0), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(0), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 1
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(1), 1)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(1), ConvertPlayerColor(1))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(1), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(1), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(1), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 2
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(2), 2)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(2), ConvertPlayerColor(2))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(2), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(2), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(2), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 3
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(3), 3)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(3), ConvertPlayerColor(3))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(3), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(3), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(3), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 4
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(4), 4)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(4), ConvertPlayerColor(4))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(4), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(4), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(4), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 5
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(5), 5)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(5), ConvertPlayerColor(5))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(5), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(5), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(5), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 6
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(6), 6)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(6), ConvertPlayerColor(6))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(6), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(6), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(6), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 7
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(7), 7)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(7), ConvertPlayerColor(7))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(7), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(7), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(7), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 8
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(8), 8)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(8), ConvertPlayerColor(8))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(8), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(8), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(8), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 9
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(9), 9)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(9), ConvertPlayerColor(9))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(9), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(9), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(9), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 10
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(10), 10)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(10), ConvertPlayerColor(10))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(10), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(10), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(10), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

    // Player 11
    call SetPlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call ForcePlayerStartLocation(Player(11), 11)
    call SetPlayerColor(Player(11), ConvertPlayerColor(11))
    call SetPlayerRacePreference(Player(11), RACE_PREF_HUMAN)
    call SetPlayerRaceSelectable(Player(11), false)
    call SetPlayerController(Player(11), MAP_CONTROL_USER)

endfunction

function InitCustomTeams takes nothing returns nothing
    // Force: TRIGSTR_002
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(0), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(0), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(1), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(1), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(2), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(2), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(3), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(3), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(4), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(4), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(5), 0)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(5), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(0), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(1), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(2), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(3), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(4), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(5), Player(4), true)

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(0), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(1), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(2), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(4), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(3), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(4), Player(5), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(0), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(1), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(2), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(3), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(5), Player(4), true)

    // Force: TRIGSTR_058
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(6), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(6), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(7), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(7), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(8), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(8), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(9), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(9), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(10), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(10), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)
    call SetPlayerTeam(Player(11), 1)
    call SetPlayerState(Player(11), PLAYER_STATE_ALLIED_VICTORY, 1)

    //   Allied
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(6), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(6), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(6), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(6), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(6), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(7), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(7), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(7), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(7), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(7), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(8), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(8), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(8), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(8), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(8), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(9), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(9), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(9), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(9), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(9), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(10), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateAllyBJ(Player(11), Player(10), true)

    //   Shared Vision
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(6), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(6), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(6), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(6), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(6), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(7), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(7), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(7), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(7), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(7), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(8), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(8), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(8), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(8), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(8), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(9), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(9), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(9), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(9), Player(10), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(9), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(10), Player(11), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(6), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(7), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(8), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(9), true)
    call SetPlayerAllianceStateVisionBJ(Player(11), Player(10), true)

endfunction

function InitAllyPriorities takes nothing returns nothing

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(0, 3)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 0, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 1, 3, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(0, 2, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(1, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 0, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(1, 1, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(2, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(2, 1, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(3, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 0, 0, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 1, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 2, 8, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(3, 3, 9, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(4, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 0, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 1, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 2, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(4, 3, 11, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(5, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(5, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(5, 1, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(6, 4)
    call SetStartLocPrio(6, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(6, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(6, 2, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(6, 3, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(7, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(7, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(7, 1, 11, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(8, 1)
    call SetStartLocPrio(8, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(9, 2)
    call SetStartLocPrio(9, 0, 1, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(9, 1, 2, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(10, 3)
    call SetStartLocPrio(10, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(10, 1, 5, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(10, 2, 11, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)

    call SetStartLocPrioCount(11, 3)
    call SetStartLocPrio(11, 0, 4, MAP_LOC_PRIO_HIGH)
    call SetStartLocPrio(11, 1, 7, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
    call SetStartLocPrio(11, 2, 10, MAP_LOC_PRIO_LOW)
endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Main Initialization
//*
//***************************************************************************

//===========================================================================
function main takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetCameraBounds(- 11520.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), - 9984.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM), 11520.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), 14336.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), - 11520.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_LEFT), 14336.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_TOP), 11520.0 - GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_RIGHT), - 9984.0 + GetCameraMargin(CAMERA_MARGIN_BOTTOM))
    call SetDayNightModels("Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranTerrain\\DNCDalaranTerrain.mdl", "Environment\\DNC\\DNCDalaran\\DNCDalaranUnit\\DNCDalaranUnit.mdl")
    call NewSoundEnvironment("Default")
    call SetAmbientDaySound("DalaranRuinsDay")
    call SetAmbientNightSound("DalaranRuinsNight")
    call SetMapMusic("Music", true, 0)
    call InitSounds()
    call CreateRegions()
    call CreateCameras()
    call InitTechTree()
    call CreateAllDestructables()
    call CreateAllItems()
    call CreateAllUnits()
    call InitBlizzard()

call ExecuteFunc("jasshelper__initstructs33025484")
call ExecuteFunc("Playercolors__onInit")
call ExecuteFunc("SimpleTriggerData__onInit")
call ExecuteFunc("TimerUtils__init")
call ExecuteFunc("UpgradedHero__onInit")

    call InitGlobals()
    call InitCustomTriggers()
    call RunInitializationTriggers()

endfunction

//***************************************************************************
//*
//*  Map Configuration
//*
//***************************************************************************

function config takes nothing returns nothing
    call SetMapName("TRIGSTR_003")
    call SetMapDescription("TRIGSTR_738")
    call SetPlayers(12)
    call SetTeams(12)
    call SetGamePlacement(MAP_PLACEMENT_TEAMS_TOGETHER)

    call DefineStartLocation(0, - 8768.0, 128.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(1, - 8704.0, 0.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(2, - 8832.0, 64.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(3, - 8640.0, 128.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(4, 8640.0, 0.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(5, 8768.0, 0.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(6, 8704.0, - 128.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(7, 8576.0, - 64.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(8, - 8640.0, 0.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(9, - 8768.0, 0.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(10, 8704.0, 64.0)
    call DefineStartLocation(11, 8576.0, 64.0)

    // Player setup
    call InitCustomPlayerSlots()
    call InitCustomTeams()
    call InitAllyPriorities()
endfunction

function sa__HomingMagic_destroy takes nothing returns boolean
local integer this=f__arg_this
        call PauseTimer(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this])
        call DestroyGroup(s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this])
        call DestroyGroup(s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this])
        set s__HomingMagic_caster[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_target[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_targetGroup[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_tempTargetGroup[this]=null
        set s__HomingMagic_strikeDelay[this]=null
   return true
endfunction
function sa__EarthShattering_destroy takes nothing returns boolean
local integer this=f__arg_this
        call DestroyGroup(s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this])
        call RemoveRegion(s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this])
        call RemoveRect(s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this])
        call RemoveUnit(s__EarthShattering_dummy[this])
        call PauseTimer(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this])
        call PauseTimer(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this])
        call DestroyTimer(s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this])
        call DestroyTrigger(s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this])
        set s__EarthShattering_dummy[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_caster[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_spellTimer[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_damageTimer[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_targetGroup[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_collisionTrigger[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_dummyRect[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_damageRegion[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_enterRegion[this]=null
        set s__EarthShattering_leaveRegion[this]=null
        call s__EarthShattering_deallocate(this)
   return true
endfunction
function sa___prototype1_TimerUtils__init takes nothing returns boolean

     local integer i=0
     local integer o=- 1
     local boolean oops= false
        if ( TimerUtils__didinit ) then
    return true
        else
            set TimerUtils__didinit=true
        endif
            set TimerUtils__ht=InitHashtable()
            loop
                exitwhen ( i == TimerUtils__QUANTITY )
                set s__TimerUtils__tT[i]= CreateTimer()
                call SaveInteger(TimerUtils__ht, 0, GetHandleId((s__TimerUtils__tT[i] )), ( TimerUtils__HELD)) // INLINED!!
                set i=i + 1
            endloop
            set TimerUtils__tN=TimerUtils__QUANTITY
    return true
endfunction

    set st__HomingMagic_destroy=CreateTrigger()

    call TriggerAddCondition(st___prototype1[1],Condition(function sa___prototype1_TimerUtils__init))




























































    call ExecuteFunc("s__EarthShattering_onInit")
    call ExecuteFunc("s__HomingMagic_onInit")
    call ExecuteFunc("s__IceSlash_onInit")
